2201  $sql .= " ORDER BY date_price";
2202  $sql .= " DESC LIMIT 1) as price_by_qty";
2203  $selectFields .= ", price_rowid, price_by_qty";
2204  }
2205  $sql .= " FROM ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX."product as p";
2206  if (count($warehouseStatusArray))
2207  {
2208  $sql .= " LEFT JOIN ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX."product_stock as ps on ps.fk_product = p.rowid";
2209  $sql .= " LEFT JOIN ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX."entrepot as e on ps.fk_entrepot = e.rowid AND e.entity IN (".getEntity('stock').")";
2210  $sql .= ' AND e.statut IN ('.$this->db->sanitize($this->db->escape(implode(',', $warehouseStatusArray))).')'; // Return line if product is inside the selected stock. If not, an empty line will be returned so we will count 0.
2211  }
2212 
2213  // include search in supplier ref
2214  if (!empty($conf->global->MAIN_SEARCH_PRODUCT_BY_FOURN_REF))
2215  {
2216  $sql .= " LEFT JOIN ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX."product_fournisseur_price as pfp ON p.rowid = pfp.fk_product";
2217  }
2218 
2219  //Price by customer
2220  if (!empty($conf->global->PRODUIT_CUSTOMER_PRICES) && !empty($socid)) {
2221  $sql .= " LEFT JOIN ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX."product_customer_price as pcp ON pcp.fk_soc=".$socid." AND pcp.fk_product=p.rowid";
2222  }
2223  // Units
2224  if (!empty($conf->global->PRODUCT_USE_UNITS)) {
2225  $sql .= " LEFT JOIN ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX."c_units u ON u.rowid = p.fk_unit";
2226  }
2227  // Multilang : we add translation
2228  if (!empty($conf->global->MAIN_MULTILANGS))
2229  {
2230  $sql .= " LEFT JOIN ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX."product_lang as pl ON pl.fk_product = p.rowid AND pl.lang='".$this->db->escape($langs->getDefaultLang())."'";
2231  }
2232 
2233  if (!empty($conf->global->PRODUIT_ATTRIBUTES_HIDECHILD)) {
2234  $sql .= " LEFT JOIN ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX."product_attribute_combination pac ON pac.fk_product_child = p.rowid";
2235  }
2236 
2237  $sql .= ' WHERE p.entity IN ('.getEntity('product').')';
2238 
2239  if (!empty($conf->global->PRODUIT_ATTRIBUTES_HIDECHILD)) {
2240  $sql .= " AND pac.rowid IS NULL";
2241  }
2242 
2243  if ($finished == 0)
2244  {
2245  $sql .= " AND p.finished = ".$finished;
2246  } elseif ($finished == 1)
2247  {
2248  $sql .= " AND p.finished = ".$finished;
2249  if ($status >= 0) $sql .= " AND p.tosell = ".$status;
2250  } elseif ($status >= 0)
2251  {
2252  $sql .= " AND p.tosell = ".$status;
2253  }
2254  // Filter by product type
2255  if (strval($filtertype) != '') $sql .= " AND p.fk_product_type = ".$filtertype;
2256  elseif (empty($conf->product->enabled)) { // when product module is disabled, show services only
2257  $sql .= " AND p.fk_product_type = 1";
2258  } elseif (empty($conf->service->enabled)) { // when service module is disabled, show products only
2259  $sql .= " AND p.fk_product_type = 0";
2260  }
2261  // Add criteria on ref/label
2262  if ($filterkey != '')
2263  {
2264  $sql .= ' AND (';
2265  $prefix = empty($conf->global->PRODUCT_DONOTSEARCH_ANYWHERE) ? '%' : ''; // Can use index if PRODUCT_DONOTSEARCH_ANYWHERE is on
2266  // For natural search
2267  $scrit = explode(' ', $filterkey);
2268  $i = 0;
2269  if (count($scrit) > 1) $sql .= "(";
2270  foreach ($scrit as $crit)
2271  {
2272  if ($i > 0) $sql .= " AND ";
2273  $sql .= "(p.ref LIKE '".$this->db->escape($prefix.$crit)."%' OR p.label LIKE '".$this->db->escape($prefix.$crit)."%'";
2274  if (!empty($conf->global->MAIN_MULTILANGS)) $sql .= " OR pl.label LIKE '".$this->db->escape($prefix.$crit)."%'";
2275  if (!empty($conf->global->PRODUCT_AJAX_SEARCH_ON_DESCRIPTION))
2276  {
2277  $sql .= " OR p.description LIKE '".$this->db->escape($prefix.$crit)."%'";
2278  if (!empty($conf->global->MAIN_MULTILANGS)) $sql .= " OR pl.description LIKE '".$this->db->escape($prefix.$crit)."%'";
2279  }
2280  if (!empty($conf->global->MAIN_SEARCH_PRODUCT_BY_FOURN_REF)) $sql .= " OR pfp.ref_fourn LIKE '".$this->db->escape($prefix.$crit)."%'";
2281  $sql .= ")";
2282  $i++;
2283  }
2284  if (count($scrit) > 1) $sql .= ")";
2285  if (!empty($conf->barcode->enabled)) $sql .= " OR p.barcode LIKE '".$this->db->escape($prefix.$filterkey)."%'";
2286  $sql .= ')';
2287  }
2288  if (count($warehouseStatusArray))
2289  {
2290  $sql .= ' GROUP BY'.$selectFields;
2291  }
2292 
2293  //Sort by category
2294  if (!empty($conf->global->PRODUCT_SORT_BY_CATEGORY))
2295  {
2296  $sql .= " ORDER BY categorie_product_id ";
2297  //ASC OR DESC order
2298  ($conf->global->PRODUCT_SORT_BY_CATEGORY == 1) ? $sql .= "ASC" : $sql .= "DESC";
2299  } else {
2300  $sql .= $this->db->order("p.ref");
2301  }
2302 
2303  $sql .= $this->db->plimit($limit, 0);
2304 
2305  // Build output string
2306  dol_syslog(get_class($this)."::select_produits_list search products", LOG_DEBUG);
2307  $result = $this->db->query($sql);
2308  if ($result)
2309  {
2310  require_once DOL_DOCUMENT_ROOT.'/product/class/product.class.php';
2311  require_once DOL_DOCUMENT_ROOT.'/product/dynamic_price/class/price_parser.class.php';
2312  require_once DOL_DOCUMENT_ROOT.'/core/lib/product.lib.php';
2313 
2314  $num = $this->db->num_rows($result);
2315 
2316  $events = null;
2317 
2318  if (!$forcecombo)
2319  {
2320  include_once DOL_DOCUMENT_ROOT.'/core/lib/ajax.lib.php';
2321  $out .= ajax_combobox($htmlname, $events, $conf->global->PRODUIT_USE_SEARCH_TO_SELECT);
2322  }
2323 
2324  $out .= '<select class="flat'.($morecss ? ' '.$morecss : '').'" name="'.$htmlname.'" id="'.$htmlname.'">';
2325 
2326  $textifempty = '';
2327  // Do not use textifempty = ' ' or '&nbsp;' here, or search on key will search on ' key'.
2328  //if (! empty($conf->use_javascript_ajax) || $forcecombo) $textifempty='';
2329  if (!empty($conf->global->PRODUIT_USE_SEARCH_TO_SELECT))
2330  {
2331  if ($showempty && !is_numeric($showempty)) $textifempty = $langs->trans($showempty);
2332  else $textifempty .= $langs->trans("All");
2333  } else {
2334  if ($showempty && !is_numeric($showempty)) $textifempty = $langs->trans($showempty);
2335  }
2336  if ($showempty) $out .= '<option value="0" selected>'.$textifempty.'</option>';
2337 
2338  $i = 0;
2339  while ($num && $i < $num)
2340  {
2341  $opt = '';
2342  $optJson = array();
2343  $objp = $this->db->fetch_object($result);
2344 
2345  if ((!empty($conf->global->PRODUIT_CUSTOMER_PRICES_BY_QTY) || !empty($conf->global->PRODUIT_CUSTOMER_PRICES_BY_QTY_MULTIPRICES)) && !empty($objp->price_by_qty) && $objp->price_by_qty == 1)
2346  { // Price by quantity will return many prices for the same product
2347  $sql = "SELECT rowid, quantity, price, unitprice, remise_percent, remise, price_base_type";
2348  $sql .= " FROM ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX."product_price_by_qty";
2349  $sql .= " WHERE fk_product_price=".$objp->price_rowid;
2350  $sql .= " ORDER BY quantity ASC";
2351 
2352  dol_syslog(get_class($this)."::select_produits_list search prices by qty", LOG_DEBUG);
2353  $result2 = $this->db->query($sql);
2354  if ($result2)
2355  {
2356  $nb_prices = $this->db->num_rows($result2);
2357  $j = 0;
2358  while ($nb_prices && $j < $nb_prices) {
2359  $objp2 = $this->db->fetch_object($result2);
2360 
2361  $objp->price_by_qty_rowid = $objp2->rowid;
2362  $objp->price_by_qty_price_base_type = $objp2->price_base_type;
2363  $objp->price_by_qty_quantity = $objp2->quantity;
2364  $objp->price_by_qty_unitprice = $objp2->unitprice;
2365  $objp->price_by_qty_remise_percent = $objp2->remise_percent;
2366  // For backward compatibility
2367  $objp->quantity = $objp2->quantity;
2368  $objp->price = $objp2->price;
2369  $objp->unitprice = $objp2->unitprice;
2370  $objp->remise_percent = $objp2->remise_percent;
2371  $objp->remise = $objp2->remise;
2372 
2373  $this->constructProductListOption($objp, $opt, $optJson, 0, $selected, $hidepriceinlabel, $filterkey);
2374 
2375  $j++;
2376 
2377  // Add new entry
2378  // "key" value of json key array is used by jQuery automatically as selected value
2379  // "label" value of json key array is used by jQuery automatically as text for combo box
2380  $out .= $opt;
2381  array_push($outarray, $optJson);
2382  }
2383  }
2384  } else {
2385  if (!empty($conf->dynamicprices->enabled) && !empty($objp->fk_price_expression)) {
2386  $price_product = new Product($this->db);
2387  $price_product->fetch($objp->rowid, '', '', 1);
2388  $priceparser = new PriceParser($this->db);
2389  $price_result = $priceparser->parseProduct($price_product);
2390  if ($price_result >= 0) {
2391  $objp->price = $price_result;
2392  $objp->unitprice = $price_result;
2393  //Calculate the VAT
2394  $objp->price_ttc = price2num($objp->price) * (1 + ($objp->tva_tx / 100));
2395  $objp->price_ttc = price2num($objp->price_ttc, 'MU');
2396  }
2397  }
2398 
2399  $this->constructProductListOption($objp, $opt, $optJson, $price_level, $selected, $hidepriceinlabel, $filterkey);
2400  // Add new entry
2401  // "key" value of json key array is used by jQuery automatically as selected value
2402  // "label" value of json key array is used by jQuery automatically as text for combo box
2403  $out .= $opt;
2404  array_push($outarray, $optJson);
2405  }
2406 
2407  $i++;
2408  }
2409 
2410  $out .= '</select>';
2411 
2412  $this->db->free($result);
2413 
2414  if (empty($outputmode)) return $out;
2415  return $outarray;
2416  } else {
2417  dol_print_error($db);
2418  }
2419  }
2420 
2435  protected function constructProductListOption(&$objp, &$opt, &$optJson, $price_level, $selected, $hidepriceinlabel = 0, $filterkey = '', $novirtualstock = 0)
2436  {
2437  global $langs, $conf, $user, $db;
2438 
2439  $outkey = '';
2440  $outval = '';
2441  $outref = '';
2442  $outlabel = '';
2443  $outdesc = '';
2444  $outbarcode = '';
2445  $outorigin = '';
2446  $outtype = '';
2447  $outprice_ht = '';
2448  $outprice_ttc = '';
2449  $outpricebasetype = '';
2450  $outtva_tx = '';
2451  $outqty = 1;
2452  $outdiscount = 0;
2453 
2454  $maxlengtharticle = (empty($conf->global->PRODUCT_MAX_LENGTH_COMBO) ? 48 : $conf->global->PRODUCT_MAX_LENGTH_COMBO);
2455 
2456  $label = $objp->label;
2457  if (!empty($objp->label_translated)) $label = $objp->label_translated;
2458  if (!empty($filterkey) && $filterkey != '') $label = preg_replace('/('.preg_quote($filterkey, '/').')/i', '<strong>$1</strong>', $label, 1);
2459 
2460  $outkey = $objp->rowid;
2461  $outref = $objp->ref;
2462  $outlabel = $objp->label;
2463  $outdesc = $objp->description;
2464  $outbarcode = $objp->barcode;
2465  $outorigin = $objp->fk_country;
2466  $outpbq = empty($objp->price_by_qty_rowid) ? '' : $objp->price_by_qty_rowid;
2467 
2468  $outtype = $objp->fk_product_type;
2469  $outdurationvalue = $outtype == Product::TYPE_SERVICE ?substr($objp->duration, 0, dol_strlen($objp->duration) - 1) : '';
2470  $outdurationunit = $outtype == Product::TYPE_SERVICE ?substr($objp->duration, -1) : '';
2471 
2472  if ($outorigin && !empty($conf->global->PRODUCT_SHOW_ORIGIN_IN_COMBO)) require_once DOL_DOCUMENT_ROOT.'/core/lib/company.lib.php';
2473 
2474  // Units
2475  $outvalUnits = '';
2476  if (!empty($conf->global->PRODUCT_USE_UNITS)) {
2477  if (!empty($objp->unit_short)) {
2478  $outvalUnits .= ' - '.$objp->unit_short;
2479  }
2480  }
2481  if (!empty($conf->global->PRODUCT_SHOW_DIMENSIONS_IN_COMBO)) {
2482  if (!empty($objp->weight) && $objp->weight_units !== null) {
2483  $unitToShow = showDimensionInBestUnit($objp->weight, $objp->weight_units, 'weight', $langs);
2484  $outvalUnits .= ' - '.$unitToShow;
2485  }
2486  if ((!empty($objp->length) || !empty($objp->width) || !empty($objp->height)) && $objp->length_units !== null) {
2487  $unitToShow = $objp->length.' x '.$objp->width.' x '.$objp->height.' '.measuringUnitString(0, 'size', $objp->length_units);
2488  $outvalUnits .= ' - '.$unitToShow;
2489  }
2490  if (!empty($objp->surface) && $objp->surface_units !== null) {
2491  $unitToShow = showDimensionInBestUnit($objp->surface, $objp->surface_units, 'surface', $langs);
2492  $outvalUnits .= ' - '.$unitToShow;
2493  }
2494  if (!empty($objp->volume) && $objp->volume_units !== null) {
2495  $unitToShow = showDimensionInBestUnit($objp->volume, $objp->volume_units, 'volume', $langs);
2496  $outvalUnits .= ' - '.$unitToShow;
2497  }
2498  }
2499  if ($outdurationvalue && $outdurationunit) {
2500  $da = array(
2501  'h' => $langs->trans('Hour'),
2502  'd' => $langs->trans('Day'),
2503  'w' => $langs->trans('Week'),
2504  'm' => $langs->trans('Month'),
2505  'y' => $langs->trans('Year')
2506  );
2507  if (isset($da[$outdurationunit])) {
2508  $outvalUnits .= ' - '.$outdurationvalue.' '.$langs->transnoentities($da[$outdurationunit].($outdurationvalue > 1 ? 's' : ''));
2509  }
2510  }
2511 
2512  $opt = '<option value="'.$objp->rowid.'"';
2513  $opt .= ($objp->rowid == $selected) ? ' selected' : '';
2514  if (!empty($objp->price_by_qty_rowid) && $objp->price_by_qty_rowid > 0)
2515  {
2516  $opt .= ' pbq="'.$objp->price_by_qty_rowid.'" data-pbq="'.$objp->price_by_qty_rowid.'" data-pbqup="'.$objp->price_by_qty_unitprice.'" data-pbqbase="'.$objp->price_by_qty_price_base_type.'" data-pbqqty="'.$objp->price_by_qty_quantity.'" data-pbqpercent="'.$objp->price_by_qty_remise_percent.'"';
2517  }
2518  if (!empty($conf->stock->enabled) && isset($objp->stock) && ($objp->fk_product_type == Product::TYPE_PRODUCT || !empty($conf->global->STOCK_SUPPORTS_SERVICES)))
2519  {
2520  if (!empty($user->rights->stock->lire)) {
2521  if ($objp->stock > 0) $opt .= ' class="product_line_stock_ok"';
2522  elseif ($objp->stock <= 0) $opt .= ' class="product_line_stock_too_low"';
2523  }
2524  }
2525  $opt .= '>';
2526  $opt .= $objp->ref;
2527  if ($outbarcode) $opt .= ' ('.$outbarcode.')';
2528  $opt .= ' - '.dol_trunc($label, $maxlengtharticle);
2529  if ($outorigin && !empty($conf->global->PRODUCT_SHOW_ORIGIN_IN_COMBO)) $opt .= ' ('.getCountry($outorigin, 1).')';
2530 
2531  $objRef = $objp->ref;
2532  if (!empty($filterkey) && $filterkey != '') $objRef = preg_replace('/('.preg_quote($filterkey, '/').')/i', '<strong>$1</strong>', $objRef, 1);
2533  $outval .= $objRef;
2534  if ($outbarcode) $outval .= ' ('.$outbarcode.')';
2535  $outval .= ' - '.dol_trunc($label, $maxlengtharticle);
2536  if ($outorigin && !empty($conf->global->PRODUCT_SHOW_ORIGIN_IN_COMBO)) $outval .= ' ('.getCountry($outorigin, 1).')';
2537 
2538  // Units
2539  $opt .= $outvalUnits;
2540  $outval .= $outvalUnits;
2541 
2542  $found = 0;
2543 
2544  // Multiprice
2545  // If we need a particular price level (from 1 to 6)
2546  if (empty($hidepriceinlabel) && $price_level >= 1 && (!empty($conf->global->PRODUIT_MULTIPRICES) || !empty($conf->global->PRODUIT_CUSTOMER_PRICES_BY_QTY_MULTIPRICES)))
2547  {
2548  $sql = "SELECT price, price_ttc, price_base_type, tva_tx";
2549  $sql .= " FROM ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX."product_price";
2550  $sql .= " WHERE fk_product = ".((int) $objp->rowid);
2551  $sql .= " AND entity IN (".getEntity('productprice').")";
2552  $sql .= " AND price_level = ".((int) $price_level);
2553  $sql .= " ORDER BY date_price DESC, rowid DESC"; // Warning DESC must be both on date_price and rowid.
2554  $sql .= " LIMIT 1";
2555 
2556  dol_syslog(get_class($this).'::constructProductListOption search price for product '.$objp->rowid.' AND level '.$price_level.'', LOG_DEBUG);
2557  $result2 = $this->db->query($sql);
2558  if ($result2)
2559  {
2560  $objp2 = $this->db->fetch_object($result2);
2561  if ($objp2)
2562  {
2563  $found = 1;
2564  if ($objp2->price_base_type == 'HT')
2565  {
2566  $opt .= ' - '.price($objp2->price, 1, $langs, 0, 0, -1, $conf->currency).' '.$langs->trans("HT");
2567  $outval .= ' - '.price($objp2->price, 0, $langs, 0, 0, -1, $conf->currency).' '.$langs->transnoentities("HT");
2568  } else {
2569  $opt .= ' - '.price($objp2->price_ttc, 1, $langs, 0, 0, -1, $conf->currency).' '.$langs->trans("TTC");
2570  $outval .= ' - '.price($objp2->price_ttc, 0, $langs, 0, 0, -1, $conf->currency).' '.$langs->transnoentities("TTC");
2571  }
2572  $outprice_ht = price($objp2->price);
2573  $outprice_ttc = price($objp2->price_ttc);
2574  $outpricebasetype = $objp2->price_base_type;
2575  $outtva_tx = $objp2->tva_tx;
2576  }
2577  } else {
2578  dol_print_error($this->db);
2579  }
2580  }
2581 
2582  // Price by quantity
2583  if (empty($hidepriceinlabel) && !empty($objp->quantity) && $objp->quantity >= 1 && (!empty($conf->global->PRODUIT_CUSTOMER_PRICES_BY_QTY) || !empty($conf->global->PRODUIT_CUSTOMER_PRICES_BY_QTY_MULTIPRICES)))
2584  {
2585  $found = 1;
2586  $outqty = $objp->quantity;
2587  $outdiscount = $objp->remise_percent;
2588  if ($objp->quantity == 1)
2589  {
2590  $opt .= ' - '.price($objp->unitprice, 1, $langs, 0, 0, -1, $conf->currency)."/";
2591  $outval .= ' - '.price($objp->unitprice, 0, $langs, 0, 0, -1, $conf->currency)."/";
2592  $opt .= $langs->trans("Unit"); // Do not use strtolower because it breaks utf8 encoding
2593  $outval .= $langs->transnoentities("Unit");
2594  } else {
2595  $opt .= ' - '.price($objp->price, 1, $langs, 0, 0, -1, $conf->currency)."/".$objp->quantity;
2596  $outval .= ' - '.price($objp->price, 0, $langs, 0, 0, -1, $conf->currency)."/".$objp->quantity;
2597  $opt .= $langs->trans("Units"); // Do not use strtolower because it breaks utf8 encoding
2598  $outval .= $langs->transnoentities("Units");
2599  }
2600 
2601  $outprice_ht = price($objp->unitprice);
2602  $outprice_ttc = price($objp->unitprice * (1 + ($objp->tva_tx / 100)));
2603  $outpricebasetype = $objp->price_base_type;
2604  $outtva_tx = $objp->tva_tx;
2605  }
2606  if (empty($hidepriceinlabel) && !empty($objp->quantity) && $objp->quantity >= 1)
2607  {
2608  $opt .= " (".price($objp->unitprice, 1, $langs, 0, 0, -1, $conf->currency)."/".$langs->trans("Unit").")"; // Do not use strtolower because it breaks utf8 encoding
2609  $outval .= " (".price($objp->unitprice, 0, $langs, 0, 0, -1, $conf->currency)."/".$langs->transnoentities("Unit").")"; // Do not use strtolower because it breaks utf8 encoding
2610  }
2611  if (empty($hidepriceinlabel) && !empty($objp->remise_percent) && $objp->remise_percent >= 1)
2612  {
2613  $opt .= " - ".$langs->trans("Discount")." : ".vatrate($objp->remise_percent).' %';
2614  $outval .= " - ".$langs->transnoentities("Discount")." : ".vatrate($objp->remise_percent).' %';
2615  }
2616 
2617  // Price by customer
2618  if (empty($hidepriceinlabel) && !empty($conf->global->PRODUIT_CUSTOMER_PRICES))
2619  {
2620  if (!empty($objp->idprodcustprice))
2621  {
2622  $found = 1;
2623 
2624  if ($objp->custprice_base_type == 'HT')
2625  {
2626  $opt .= ' - '.price($objp->custprice, 1, $langs, 0, 0, -1, $conf->currency).' '.$langs->trans("HT");
2627  $outval .= ' - '.price($objp->custprice, 0, $langs, 0, 0, -1, $conf->currency).' '.$langs->transnoentities("HT");
2628  } else {
2629  $opt .= ' - '.price($objp->custprice_ttc, 1, $langs, 0, 0, -1, $conf->currency).' '.$langs->trans("TTC");
2630  $outval .= ' - '.price($objp->custprice_ttc, 0, $langs, 0, 0, -1, $conf->currency).' '.$langs->transnoentities("TTC");
2631  }
2632 
2633  $outprice_ht = price($objp->custprice);
2634  $outprice_ttc = price($objp->custprice_ttc);
2635  $outpricebasetype = $objp->custprice_base_type;
2636  $outtva_tx = $objp->custtva_tx;
2637  }
2638  }
2639 
2640  // If level no defined or multiprice not found, we used the default price
2641  if (empty($hidepriceinlabel) && !$found)
2642  {
2643  if ($objp->price_base_type == 'HT')
2644  {
2645  $opt .= ' - '.price($objp->price, 1, $langs, 0, 0, -1, $conf->currency).' '.$langs->trans("HT");
2646  $outval .= ' - '.price($objp->price, 0, $langs, 0, 0, -1, $conf->currency).' '.$langs->transnoentities("HT");
2647  } else {
2648  $opt .= ' - '.price($objp->price_ttc, 1, $langs, 0, 0, -1, $conf->currency).' '.$langs->trans("TTC");
2649  $outval .= ' - '.price($objp->price_ttc, 0, $langs, 0, 0, -1, $conf->currency).' '.$langs->transnoentities("TTC");
2650  }
2651  $outprice_ht = price($objp->price);
2652  $outprice_ttc = price($objp->price_ttc);
2653  $outpricebasetype = $objp->price_base_type;
2654  $outtva_tx = $objp->tva_tx;
2655  }
2656 
2657  if (!empty($conf->stock->enabled) && isset($objp->stock) && ($objp->fk_product_type == Product::TYPE_PRODUCT || !empty($conf->global->STOCK_SUPPORTS_SERVICES)))
2658  {
2659  if (!empty($user->rights->stock->lire)) {
2660  $opt .= ' - '.$langs->trans("Stock").': '.price(price2num($objp->stock, 'MS'));
2661 
2662  if ($objp->stock > 0) {
2663  $outval .= ' - <span class="product_line_stock_ok">';
2664  } elseif ($objp->stock <= 0) {
2665  $outval .= ' - <span class="product_line_stock_too_low">';
2666  }
2667  $outval .= $langs->transnoentities("Stock").': '.price(price2num($objp->stock, 'MS'));
2668  $outval .= '</span>';
2669  if (empty($novirtualstock) && !empty($conf->global->STOCK_SHOW_VIRTUAL_STOCK_IN_PRODUCTS_COMBO)) // Warning, this option may slow down combo list generation
2670  {
2671  $langs->load("stocks");
2672 
2673  $tmpproduct = new Product($this->db);
2674  $tmpproduct->fetch($objp->rowid, '', '', '', 1, 1, 1); // Load product without lang and prices arrays (we just need to make ->virtual_stock() after)
2675  $tmpproduct->load_virtual_stock();
2676  $virtualstock = $tmpproduct->stock_theorique;
2677 
2678  $opt .= ' - '.$langs->trans("VirtualStock").':'.$virtualstock;
2679 
2680  $outval .= ' - '.$langs->transnoentities("VirtualStock").':';
2681  if ($virtualstock > 0) {
2682  $outval .= '<span class="product_line_stock_ok">';
2683  } elseif ($virtualstock <= 0) {
2684  $outval .= '<span class="product_line_stock_too_low">';
2685  }
2686  $outval .= $virtualstock;
2687  $outval .= '</span>';
2688 
2689  unset($tmpproduct);
2690  }
2691  }
2692  }
2693 
2694  $opt .= "</option>\n";
2695  $optJson = array('key'=>$outkey, 'value'=>$outref, 'label'=>$outval, 'label2'=>$outlabel, 'desc'=>$outdesc, 'type'=>$outtype, 'price_ht'=>price2num($outprice_ht), 'price_ttc'=>price2num($outprice_ttc), 'pricebasetype'=>$outpricebasetype, 'tva_tx'=>$outtva_tx, 'qty'=>$outqty, 'discount'=>$outdiscount, 'duration_value'=>$outdurationvalue, 'duration_unit'=>$outdurationunit, 'pbq'=>$outpbq);
2696  }
2697 
2698  // phpcs:disable PEAR.NamingConventions.ValidFunctionName.ScopeNotCamelCaps
2713  public function select_produits_fournisseurs($socid, $selected = '', $htmlname = 'productid', $filtertype = '', $filtre = '', $ajaxoptions = array(), $hidelabel = 0, $alsoproductwithnosupplierprice = 0, $morecss = '')
2714  {
2715  // phpcs:enable
2716  global $langs, $conf;
2717  global $price_level, $status, $finished;
2718 
2719  $selected_input_value = '';
2720  if (!empty($conf->use_javascript_ajax) && !empty($conf->global->PRODUIT_USE_SEARCH_TO_SELECT))
2721  {
2722  if ($selected > 0)
2723  {
2724  require_once DOL_DOCUMENT_ROOT.'/product/class/product.class.php';
2725  $producttmpselect = new Product($this->db);
2726  $producttmpselect->fetch($selected);
2727  $selected_input_value = $producttmpselect->ref;
2728  unset($producttmpselect);
2729  }
2730 
2731  // mode=2 means suppliers products
2732  $urloption = ($socid > 0 ? 'socid='.$socid.'&' : '').'htmlname='.$htmlname.'&outjson=1&price_level='.$price_level.'&type='.$filtertype.'&mode=2&status='.$status.'&finished='.$finished.'&alsoproductwithnosupplierprice='.$alsoproductwithnosupplierprice;
2733  print ajax_autocompleter($selected, $htmlname, DOL_URL_ROOT.'/product/ajax/products.php', $urloption, $conf->global->PRODUIT_USE_SEARCH_TO_SELECT, 0, $ajaxoptions);
2734  print ($hidelabel ? '' : $langs->trans("RefOrLabel").' : ').'<input type="text" size="20" name="search_'.$htmlname.'" id="search_'.$htmlname.'" value="'.$selected_input_value.'">';
2735  } else {
2736  print $this->select_produits_fournisseurs_list($socid, $selected, $htmlname, $filtertype, $filtre, '', -1, 0, 0, $alsoproductwithnosupplierprice, $morecss);
2737  }
2738  }
2739 
2740  // phpcs:disable PEAR.NamingConventions.ValidFunctionName.ScopeNotCamelCaps
2758  public function select_produits_fournisseurs_list($socid, $selected = '', $htmlname = 'productid', $filtertype = '', $filtre = '', $filterkey = '', $statut = -1, $outputmode = 0, $limit = 100, $alsoproductwithnosupplierprice = 0, $morecss = '', $showstockinlist = 0)
2759  {
2760  // phpcs:enable
2761  global $langs, $conf, $db, $user;
2762 
2763  $out = '';
2764  $outarray = array();
2765 
2766  $maxlengtharticle = (empty($conf->global->PRODUCT_MAX_LENGTH_COMBO) ? 48 : $conf->global->PRODUCT_MAX_LENGTH_COMBO);
2767 
2768  $langs->load('stocks');
2769  // Units
2770  if (!empty($conf->global->PRODUCT_USE_UNITS)) {
2771  $langs->load('other');
2772  }
2773 
2774  $sql = "SELECT p.rowid, p.ref, p.label, p.price, p.duration, p.fk_product_type, p.stock,";
2775  $sql .= " pfp.ref_fourn, pfp.rowid as idprodfournprice, pfp.price as fprice, pfp.quantity, pfp.remise_percent, pfp.remise, pfp.unitprice,";
2776  $sql .= " pfp.fk_supplier_price_expression, pfp.fk_product, pfp.tva_tx, pfp.fk_soc, s.nom as name,";
2777  $sql .= " pfp.supplier_reputation";
2778  // Units
2779  if (!empty($conf->global->PRODUCT_USE_UNITS)) {
2780  $sql .= ", u.label as unit_long, u.short_label as unit_short, p.weight, p.weight_units, p.length, p.length_units, p.width, p.width_units, p.height, p.height_units, p.surface, p.surface_units, p.volume, p.volume_units";
2781  }
2782  if (!empty($conf->barcode->enabled)) $sql .= ", pfp.barcode";
2783  $sql .= " FROM ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX."product as p";
2784  $sql .= " LEFT JOIN ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX."product_fournisseur_price as pfp ON ( p.rowid = pfp.fk_product AND pfp.entity IN (".getEntity('product').") )";
2785  if ($socid) $sql .= " AND pfp.fk_soc = ".$socid;
2786  $sql .= " LEFT JOIN ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX."societe as s ON pfp.fk_soc = s.rowid";
2787  // Units
2788  if (!empty($conf->global->PRODUCT_USE_UNITS)) {
2789  $sql .= " LEFT JOIN ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX."c_units u ON u.rowid = p.fk_unit";
2790  }
2791  $sql .= " WHERE p.entity IN (".getEntity('product').")";
2792  $sql .= " AND p.tobuy = 1";
2793  if (strval($filtertype) != '') $sql .= " AND p.fk_product_type=".$this->db->escape($filtertype);
2794  if (!empty($filtre)) $sql .= " ".$filtre;
2795  // Add criteria on ref/label
2796  if ($filterkey != '')
2797  {
2798  $sql .= ' AND (';
2799  $prefix = empty($conf->global->PRODUCT_DONOTSEARCH_ANYWHERE) ? '%' : ''; // Can use index if PRODUCT_DONOTSEARCH_ANYWHERE is on
2800  // For natural search
2801  $scrit = explode(' ', $filterkey);
2802  $i = 0;
2803  if (count($scrit) > 1) $sql .= "(";
2804  foreach ($scrit as $crit)
2805  {
2806  if ($i > 0) $sql .= " AND ";
2807  $sql .= "(pfp.ref_fourn LIKE '".$this->db->escape($prefix.$crit)."%' OR p.ref LIKE '".$this->db->escape($prefix.$crit)."%' OR p.label LIKE '".$this->db->escape($prefix.$crit)."%')";
2808  $i++;
2809  }
2810  if (count($scrit) > 1) $sql .= ")";
2811  if (!empty($conf->barcode->enabled)) {
2812  $sql .= " OR p.barcode LIKE '".$this->db->escape($prefix.$filterkey)."%'";
2813  $sql .= " OR pfp.barcode LIKE '".$this->db->escape($prefix.$filterkey)."%'";
2814  }
2815  $sql .= ')';
2816  }
2817  $sql .= " ORDER BY pfp.ref_fourn DESC, pfp.quantity ASC";
2818  $sql .= $this->db->plimit($limit, 0);
2819 
2820  // Build output string
2821 
2822  dol_syslog(get_class($this)."::select_produits_fournisseurs_list", LOG_DEBUG);
2823  $result = $this->db->query($sql);
2824  if ($result)
2825  {
2826  require_once DOL_DOCUMENT_ROOT.'/product/dynamic_price/class/price_parser.class.php';
2827  require_once DOL_DOCUMENT_ROOT.'/core/lib/product.lib.php';
2828 
2829  $num = $this->db->num_rows($result);
2830 
2831  //$out.='<select class="flat" id="select'.$htmlname.'" name="'.$htmlname.'">'; // remove select to have id same with combo and ajax
2832  $out .= '<select class="flat maxwidthonsmartphone'.($morecss ? ' '.$morecss : '').'" id="'.$htmlname.'" name="'.$htmlname.'">';
2833  if (!$selected) $out .= '<option value="0" selected>&nbsp;</option>';
2834  else $out .= '<option value="0">&nbsp;</option>';
2835 
2836  $i = 0;
2837  while ($i < $num)
2838  {
2839  $objp = $this->db->fetch_object($result);
2840 
2841  $outkey = $objp->idprodfournprice; // id in table of price
2842  if (!$outkey && $alsoproductwithnosupplierprice) $outkey = 'idprod_'.$objp->rowid; // id of product
2843 
2844  $outref = $objp->ref;
2845  $outval = '';
2846  $outbarcode = $objp->barcode;
2847  $outqty = 1;
2848  $outdiscount = 0;
2849  $outtype = $objp->fk_product_type;
2850  $outdurationvalue = $outtype == Product::TYPE_SERVICE ?substr($objp->duration, 0, dol_strlen($objp->duration) - 1) : '';
2851  $outdurationunit = $outtype == Product::TYPE_SERVICE ?substr($objp->duration, -1) : '';
2852 
2853  // Units
2854  $outvalUnits = '';
2855  if (!empty($conf->global->PRODUCT_USE_UNITS)) {
2856  if (!empty($objp->unit_short)) {
2857  $outvalUnits .= ' - '.$objp->unit_short;
2858  }
2859  if (!empty($objp->weight) && $objp->weight_units !== null) {
2860  $unitToShow = showDimensionInBestUnit($objp->weight, $objp->weight_units, 'weight', $langs);
2861  $outvalUnits .= ' - '.$unitToShow;
2862  }
2863  if ((!empty($objp->length) || !empty($objp->width) || !empty($objp->height)) && $objp->length_units !== null) {
2864  $unitToShow = $objp->length.' x '.$objp->width.' x '.$objp->height.' '.measuringUnitString(0, 'size', $objp->length_units);
2865  $outvalUnits .= ' - '.$unitToShow;
2866  }
2867  if (!empty($objp->surface) && $objp->surface_units !== null) {
2868  $unitToShow = showDimensionInBestUnit($objp->surface, $objp->surface_units, 'surface', $langs);
2869  $outvalUnits .= ' - '.$unitToShow;
2870  }
2871  if (!empty($objp->volume) && $objp->volume_units !== null) {
2872  $unitToShow = showDimensionInBestUnit($objp->volume, $objp->volume_units, 'volume', $langs);
2873  $outvalUnits .= ' - '.$unitToShow;
2874  }
2875  if ($outdurationvalue && $outdurationunit) {
2876  $da = array(
2877  'h' => $langs->trans('Hour'),
2878  'd' => $langs->trans('Day'),
2879  'w' => $langs->trans('Week'),
2880  'm' => $langs->trans('Month'),
2881  'y' => $langs->trans('Year')
2882  );
2883  if (isset($da[$outdurationunit])) {
2884  $outvalUnits .= ' - '.$outdurationvalue.' '.$langs->transnoentities($da[$outdurationunit].($outdurationvalue > 1 ? 's' : ''));
2885  }
2886  }
2887  }
2888 
2889  $objRef = $objp->ref;
2890  if ($filterkey && $filterkey != '') $objRef = preg_replace('/('.preg_quote($filterkey, '/').')/i', '<strong>$1</strong>', $objRef, 1);
2891  $objRefFourn = $objp->ref_fourn;
2892  if ($filterkey && $filterkey != '') $objRefFourn = preg_replace('/('.preg_quote($filterkey, '/').')/i', '<strong>$1</strong>', $objRefFourn, 1);
2893  $label = $objp->label;
2894  if ($filterkey && $filterkey != '') $label = preg_replace('/('.preg_quote($filterkey, '/').')/i', '<strong>$1</strong>', $label, 1);
2895 
2896  $optlabel = $objp->ref;
2897  if (!empty($objp->idprodfournprice) && ($objp->ref != $objp->ref_fourn)) {
2898  $optlabel .= ' <span class=\'opacitymedium\'>('.$objp->ref_fourn.')</span>';
2899  }
2900  if (!empty($conf->barcode->enabled) && !empty($objp->barcode)) {
2901  $optlabel .= ' ('.$outbarcode.')';
2902  }
2903  $optlabel .= ' - '.dol_trunc($label, $maxlengtharticle);
2904 
2905  $outvallabel = $objRef;
2906  if (!empty($objp->idprodfournprice) && ($objp->ref != $objp->ref_fourn)) {
2907  $outvallabel .= ' ('.$objRefFourn.')';
2908  }
2909  if (!empty($conf->barcode->enabled) && !empty($objp->barcode)) {
2910  $outvallabel .= ' ('.$outbarcode.')';
2911  }
2912  $outvallabel .= ' - '.dol_trunc($label, $maxlengtharticle);
2913 
2914  // Units
2915  $optlabel .= $outvalUnits;
2916  $outvallabel .= $outvalUnits;
2917 
2918  if (!empty($objp->idprodfournprice))
2919  {
2920  $outqty = $objp->quantity;
2921  $outdiscount = $objp->remise_percent;
2922  if (!empty($conf->dynamicprices->enabled) && !empty($objp->fk_supplier_price_expression)) {
2923  $prod_supplier = new ProductFournisseur($this->db);
2924  $prod_supplier->product_fourn_price_id = $objp->idprodfournprice;
2925  $prod_supplier->id = $objp->fk_product;
2926  $prod_supplier->fourn_qty = $objp->quantity;
2927  $prod_supplier->fourn_tva_tx = $objp->tva_tx;
2928  $prod_supplier->fk_supplier_price_expression = $objp->fk_supplier_price_expression;
2929  $priceparser = new PriceParser($this->db);
2930  $price_result = $priceparser->parseProductSupplier($prod_supplier);
2931  if ($price_result >= 0) {
2932  $objp->fprice = $price_result;
2933  if ($objp->quantity >= 1)
2934  {
2935  $objp->unitprice = $objp->fprice / $objp->quantity; // Replace dynamically unitprice
2936  }
2937  }
2938  }
2939  if ($objp->quantity == 1)
2940  {
2941  $optlabel .= ' - '.price($objp->fprice * (!empty($conf->global->DISPLAY_DISCOUNTED_SUPPLIER_PRICE) ? (1 - $objp->remise_percent / 100) : 1), 1, $langs, 0, 0, -1, $conf->currency)."/";
2942  $outvallabel .= ' - '.price($objp->fprice * (!empty($conf->global->DISPLAY_DISCOUNTED_SUPPLIER_PRICE) ? (1 - $objp->remise_percent / 100) : 1), 0, $langs, 0, 0, -1, $conf->currency)."/";
2943  $optlabel .= $langs->trans("Unit"); // Do not use strtolower because it breaks utf8 encoding
2944  $outvallabel .= $langs->transnoentities("Unit");
2945  } else {
2946  $optlabel .= ' - '.price($objp->fprice * (!empty($conf->global->DISPLAY_DISCOUNTED_SUPPLIER_PRICE) ? (1 - $objp->remise_percent / 100) : 1), 1, $langs, 0, 0, -1, $conf->currency)."/".$objp->quantity;
2947  $outvallabel .= ' - '.price($objp->fprice * (!empty($conf->global->DISPLAY_DISCOUNTED_SUPPLIER_PRICE) ? (1 - $objp->remise_percent / 100) : 1), 0, $langs, 0, 0, -1, $conf->currency)."/".$objp->quantity;
2948  $optlabel .= ' '.$langs->trans("Units"); // Do not use strtolower because it breaks utf8 encoding
2949  $outvallabel .= ' '.$langs->transnoentities("Units");
2950  }
2951 
2952  if ($objp->quantity > 1)
2953  {
2954  $optlabel .= " (".price($objp->unitprice * (!empty($conf->global->DISPLAY_DISCOUNTED_SUPPLIER_PRICE) ? (1 - $objp->remise_percent / 100) : 1), 1, $langs, 0, 0, -1, $conf->currency)."/".$langs->trans("Unit").")"; // Do not use strtolower because it breaks utf8 encoding
2955  $outvallabel .= " (".price($objp->unitprice * (!empty($conf->global->DISPLAY_DISCOUNTED_SUPPLIER_PRICE) ? (1 - $objp->remise_percent / 100) : 1), 0, $langs, 0, 0, -1, $conf->currency)."/".$langs->transnoentities("Unit").")"; // Do not use strtolower because it breaks utf8 encoding
2956  }
2957  if ($objp->remise_percent >= 1)
2958  {
2959  $optlabel .= " - ".$langs->trans("Discount")." : ".vatrate($objp->remise_percent).' %';
2960  $outvallabel .= " - ".$langs->transnoentities("Discount")." : ".vatrate($objp->remise_percent).' %';
2961  }
2962  if ($objp->duration)
2963  {
2964  $optlabel .= " - ".$objp->duration;
2965  $outvallabel .= " - ".$objp->duration;
2966  }
2967  if (!$socid)
2968  {
2969  $optlabel .= " - ".dol_trunc($objp->name, 8);
2970  $outvallabel .= " - ".dol_trunc($objp->name, 8);
2971  }
2972  if ($objp->supplier_reputation)
2973  {
2974  //TODO dictionary
2975  $reputations = array(''=>$langs->trans('Standard'), 'FAVORITE'=>$langs->trans('Favorite'), 'NOTTHGOOD'=>$langs->trans('NotTheGoodQualitySupplier'), 'DONOTORDER'=>$langs->trans('DoNotOrderThisProductToThisSupplier'));
2976 
2977  $optlabel .= " - ".$reputations[$objp->supplier_reputation];
2978  $outvallabel .= " - ".$reputations[$objp->supplier_reputation];
2979  }
2980  } else {
2981  if (empty($alsoproductwithnosupplierprice)) // No supplier price defined for couple product/supplier
2982  {
2983  $optlabel .= " - <span class='opacitymedium'>".$langs->trans("NoPriceDefinedForThisSupplier").'</span>';
2984  $outvallabel .= ' - '.$langs->transnoentities("NoPriceDefinedForThisSupplier");
2985  } else // No supplier price defined for product, even on other suppliers
2986  {
2987  $optlabel .= " - <span class='opacitymedium'>".$langs->trans("NoPriceDefinedForThisSupplier").'</span>';
2988  $outvallabel .= ' - '.$langs->transnoentities("NoPriceDefinedForThisSupplier");
2989  }
2990  }
2991 
2992  if (!empty($conf->stock->enabled) && $showstockinlist && isset($objp->stock) && ($objp->fk_product_type == Product::TYPE_PRODUCT || !empty($conf->global->STOCK_SUPPORTS_SERVICES)))
2993  {
2994  $novirtualstock = ($showstockinlist == 2);
2995 
2996  if (!empty($user->rights->stock->lire)) {
2997  $outvallabel .= ' - '.$langs->trans("Stock").': '.price(price2num($objp->stock, 'MS'));
2998 
2999  if ($objp->stock > 0) {
3000  $optlabel .= ' - <span class="product_line_stock_ok">';
3001  } elseif ($objp->stock <= 0) {
3002  $optlabel .= ' - <span class="product_line_stock_too_low">';
3003  }
3004  $optlabel .= $langs->transnoentities("Stock").':'.price(price2num($objp->stock, 'MS'));
3005  $optlabel .= '</span>';
3006  if (empty($novirtualstock) && !empty($conf->global->STOCK_SHOW_VIRTUAL_STOCK_IN_PRODUCTS_COMBO)) // Warning, this option may slow down combo list generation
3007  {
3008  $langs->load("stocks");
3009 
3010  $tmpproduct = new Product($this->db);
3011  $tmpproduct->fetch($objp->rowid, '', '', '', 1, 1, 1); // Load product without lang and prices arrays (we just need to make ->virtual_stock() after)
3012  $tmpproduct->load_virtual_stock();
3013  $virtualstock = $tmpproduct->stock_theorique;
3014 
3015  $outvallabel .= ' - '.$langs->trans("VirtualStock").':'.$virtualstock;
3016 
3017  $optlabel .= ' - '.$langs->transnoentities("VirtualStock").':';
3018  if ($virtualstock > 0) {
3019  $optlabel .= '<span class="product_line_stock_ok">';
3020  } elseif ($virtualstock <= 0) {
3021  $optlabel .= '<span class="product_line_stock_too_low">';
3022  }
3023  $optlabel .= $virtualstock;
3024  $optlabel .= '</span>';
3025 
3026  unset($tmpproduct);
3027  }
3028  }
3029  }
3030 
3031  $opt = '<option value="'.$outkey.'"';
3032  if ($selected && $selected == $objp->idprodfournprice) $opt .= ' selected';
3033  if (empty($objp->idprodfournprice) && empty($alsoproductwithnosupplierprice)) $opt .= ' disabled';
3034  if (!empty($objp->idprodfournprice) && $objp->idprodfournprice > 0)
3035  {
3036  $opt .= ' pbq="'.$objp->idprodfournprice.'" data-pbq="'.$objp->idprodfournprice.'" data-pbqqty="'.$objp->quantity.'" data-pbqup="'.$objp->unitprice.'" data-pbqpercent="'.$objp->remise_percent.'"';
3037  }
3038  $opt .= ' data-html="'.dol_escape_htmltag($optlabel).'"';
3039  $opt .= '>';
3040 
3041  $opt .= $optlabel;
3042  $outval .= $outvallabel;
3043 
3044  $opt .= "</option>\n";
3045 
3046 
3047  // Add new entry
3048  // "key" value of json key array is used by jQuery automatically as selected value. Example: 'type' = product or service, 'price_ht' = unit price without tax
3049  // "label" value of json key array is used by jQuery automatically as text for combo box
3050  $out .= $opt;
3051  array_push($outarray, array('key'=>$outkey, 'value'=>$outref, 'label'=>$outval, 'qty'=>$outqty, 'price_ht'=>price2num($objp->unitprice, 'MT'), 'up'=>price2num($objp->unitprice, 'MT'), 'discount'=>$outdiscount, 'type'=>$outtype, 'duration_value'=>$outdurationvalue, 'duration_unit'=>$outdurationunit, 'disabled'=>(empty($objp->idprodfournprice) ?true:false)));
3052  // Exemple of var_dump $outarray
3053  // array(1) {[0]=>array(6) {[key"]=>string(1) "2" ["value"]=>string(3) "ppp"
3054  // ["label"]=>string(76) "ppp (<strong>f</strong>ff2) - ppp - 20,00 Euros/1unité (20,00 Euros/unité)"
3055  // ["qty"]=>string(1) "1" ["discount"]=>string(1) "0" ["disabled"]=>bool(false)
3056  //}
3057  //var_dump($outval); var_dump(utf8_check($outval)); var_dump(json_encode($outval));
3058  //$outval=array('label'=>'ppp (<strong>f</strong>ff2) - ppp - 20,00 Euros/ Unité (20,00 Euros/unité)');
3059  //var_dump($outval); var_dump(utf8_check($outval)); var_dump(json_encode($outval));
3060 
3061  $i++;
3062  }
3063  $out .= '</select>';
3064 
3065  $this->db->free($result);
3066 
3067  include_once DOL_DOCUMENT_ROOT.'/core/lib/ajax.lib.php';
3068  $out .= ajax_combobox($htmlname);
3069 
3070  if (empty($outputmode)) return $out;
3071  return $outarray;
3072  } else {
3073  dol_print_error($this->db);
3074  }
3075  }
3076 
3077  // phpcs:disable PEAR.NamingConventions.ValidFunctionName.ScopeNotCamelCaps
3086  public function select_product_fourn_price($productid, $htmlname = 'productfournpriceid', $selected_supplier = '')
3087  {
3088  // phpcs:enable
3089  global $langs, $conf;
3090 
3091  $langs->load('stocks');
3092 
3093  $sql = "SELECT p.rowid, p.ref, p.label, p.price, p.duration, pfp.fk_soc,";
3094  $sql .= " pfp.ref_fourn, pfp.rowid as idprodfournprice, pfp.price as fprice, pfp.remise_percent, pfp.quantity, pfp.unitprice,";
3095  $sql .= " pfp.fk_supplier_price_expression, pfp.fk_product, pfp.tva_tx, s.nom as name";
3096  $sql .= " FROM ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX."product as p";
3097  $sql .= " LEFT JOIN ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX."product_fournisseur_price as pfp ON p.rowid = pfp.fk_product";
3098  $sql .= " LEFT JOIN ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX."societe as s ON pfp.fk_soc = s.rowid";
3099  $sql .= " WHERE pfp.entity IN (".getEntity('productsupplierprice').")";
3100  $sql .= " AND p.tobuy = 1";
3101  $sql .= " AND s.fournisseur = 1";
3102  $sql .= " AND p.rowid = ".$productid;
3103  $sql .= " ORDER BY s.nom, pfp.ref_fourn DESC";
3104 
3105  dol_syslog(get_class($this)."::select_product_fourn_price", LOG_DEBUG);
3106  $result = $this->db->query($sql);
3107 
3108  if ($result)
3109  {
3110  $num = $this->db->num_rows($result);
3111 
3112  $form = '<select class="flat" id="select_'.$htmlname.'" name="'.$htmlname.'">';
3113 
3114  if (!$num)
3115  {
3116  $form .= '<option value="0">-- '.$langs->trans("NoSupplierPriceDefinedForThisProduct").' --</option>';
3117  } else {
3118  require_once DOL_DOCUMENT_ROOT.'/product/dynamic_price/class/price_parser.class.php';
3119  $form .= '<option value="0">&nbsp;</option>';
3120 
3121  $i = 0;
3122  while ($i < $num)
3123  {
3124  $objp = $this->db->fetch_object($result);
3125 
3126  $opt = '<option value="'.$objp->idprodfournprice.'"';
3127  //if there is only one supplier, preselect it
3128  if ($num == 1 || ($selected_supplier > 0 && $objp->fk_soc == $selected_supplier)) {
3129  $opt .= ' selected';
3130  }
3131  $opt .= '>'.$objp->name.' - '.$objp->ref_fourn.' - ';
3132 
3133  if (!empty($conf->dynamicprices->enabled) && !empty($objp->fk_supplier_price_expression)) {
3134  $prod_supplier = new ProductFournisseur($this->db);
3135  $prod_supplier->product_fourn_price_id = $objp->idprodfournprice;
3136  $prod_supplier->id = $productid;
3137  $prod_supplier->fourn_qty = $objp->quantity;
3138  $prod_supplier->fourn_tva_tx = $objp->tva_tx;
3139  $prod_supplier->fk_supplier_price_expression = $objp->fk_supplier_price_expression;
3140  $priceparser = new PriceParser($this->db);
3141  $price_result = $priceparser->parseProductSupplier($prod_supplier);
3142  if ($price_result >= 0) {
3143  $objp->fprice = $price_result;
3144  if ($objp->quantity >= 1)
3145  {
3146  $objp->unitprice = $objp->fprice / $objp->quantity;
3147  }
3148  }
3149  }
3150  if ($objp->quantity == 1)
3151  {
3152  $opt .= price($objp->fprice * (!empty($conf->global->DISPLAY_DISCOUNTED_SUPPLIER_PRICE) ? (1 - $objp->remise_percent / 100) : 1), 1, $langs, 0, 0, -1, $conf->currency)."/";
3153  }
3154 
3155  $opt .= $objp->quantity.' ';
3156 
3157  if ($objp->quantity == 1)
3158  {
3159  $opt .= $langs->trans("Unit");
3160  } else {
3161  $opt .= $langs->trans("Units");
3162  }
3163  if ($objp->quantity > 1)
3164  {
3165  $opt .= " - ";
3166  $opt .= price($objp->unitprice * (!empty($conf->global->DISPLAY_DISCOUNTED_SUPPLIER_PRICE) ? (1 - $objp->remise_percent / 100) : 1), 1, $langs, 0, 0, -1, $conf->currency)."/".$langs->trans("Unit");
3167  }
3168  if ($objp->duration) $opt .= " - ".$objp->duration;
3169  $opt .= "</option>\n";
3170 
3171  $form .= $opt;
3172  $i++;
3173  }
3174  }
3175 
3176  $form .= '</select>';
3177  $this->db->free($result);
3178  return $form;
3179  } else {
3180  dol_print_error($this->db);
3181  }
3182  }
3183 
3184  // phpcs:disable PEAR.NamingConventions.ValidFunctionName.ScopeNotCamelCaps
3194  public function select_address($selected, $socid, $htmlname = 'address_id', $showempty = 0)
3195  {
3196  // phpcs:enable
3197  // looking for users
3198  $sql = "SELECT a.rowid, a.label";
3199  $sql .= " FROM ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX."societe_address as a";
3200  $sql .= " WHERE a.fk_soc = ".$socid;
3201  $sql .= " ORDER BY a.label ASC";
3202 
3203  dol_syslog(get_class($this)."::select_address", LOG_DEBUG);
3204  $resql = $this->db->query($sql);
3205  if ($resql)
3206  {
3207  print '<select class="flat" id="select_'.$htmlname.'" name="'.$htmlname.'">';
3208  if ($showempty) print '<option value="0">&nbsp;</option>';
3209  $num = $this->db->num_rows($resql);
3210  $i = 0;
3211  if ($num)
3212  {
3213  while ($i < $num)
3214  {
3215  $obj = $this->db->fetch_object($resql);
3216 
3217  if ($selected && $selected == $obj->rowid)
3218  {
3219  print '<option value="'.$obj->rowid.'" selected>'.$obj->label.'</option>';
3220  } else {
3221  print '<option value="'.$obj->rowid.'">'.$obj->label.'</option>';
3222  }
3223  $i++;
3224  }
3225  }
3226  print '</select>';
3227  return $num;
3228  } else {
3229  dol_print_error($this->db);
3230  }
3231  }

3234  // phpcs:disable PEAR.NamingConventions.ValidFunctionName.ScopeNotCamelCaps
3240  public function load_cache_conditions_paiements()
3241  {
3242  // phpcs:enable
3243  global $langs;
3244 
3245  $num = count($this->cache_conditions_paiements);
3246  if ($num > 0) return 0; // Cache already loaded
3247 
3248  dol_syslog(__METHOD__, LOG_DEBUG);
3249 
3250  $sql = "SELECT rowid, code, libelle as label";
3251  $sql .= " FROM ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX.'c_payment_term';
3252  $sql .= " WHERE entity IN (".getEntity('c_payment_term').")";
3253  $sql .= " AND active > 0";
3254  $sql .= " ORDER BY sortorder";
3255 
3256  $resql = $this->db->query($sql);
3257  if ($resql)
3258  {
3259  $num = $this->db->num_rows($resql);
3260  $i = 0;
3261  while ($i < $num)
3262  {
3263  $obj = $this->db->fetch_object($resql);
3264 
3265  // Si traduction existe, on l'utilise, sinon on prend le libelle par defaut
3266  $label = ($langs->trans("PaymentConditionShort".$obj->code) != ("PaymentConditionShort".$obj->code) ? $langs->trans("PaymentConditionShort".$obj->code) : ($obj->label != '-' ? $obj->label : ''));
3267  $this->cache_conditions_paiements[$obj->rowid]['code'] = $obj->code;
3268  $this->cache_conditions_paiements[$obj->rowid]['label'] = $label;
3269  $i++;
3270  }
3271 
3272  //$this->cache_conditions_paiements=dol_sort_array($this->cache_conditions_paiements, 'label', 'asc', 0, 0, 1); // We use the field sortorder of table
3273 
3274  return $num;
3275  } else {
3276  dol_print_error($this->db);
3277  return -1;
3278  }
3279  }

3281  // phpcs:disable PEAR.NamingConventions.ValidFunctionName.ScopeNotCamelCaps
3287  public function load_cache_availability()
3288  {
3289  // phpcs:enable
3290  global $langs;
3291 
3292  $num = count($this->cache_availability);
3293  if ($num > 0) return 0; // Cache already loaded
3294 
3295  dol_syslog(__METHOD__, LOG_DEBUG);
3296 
3297  $langs->load('propal');
3298 
3299  $sql = "SELECT rowid, code, label";
3300  $sql .= " FROM ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX.'c_availability';
3301  $sql .= " WHERE active > 0";
3302 
3303  $resql = $this->db->query($sql);
3304  if ($resql)
3305  {
3306  $num = $this->db->num_rows($resql);
3307  $i = 0;
3308  while ($i < $num)
3309  {
3310  $obj = $this->db->fetch_object($resql);
3311 
3312  // Si traduction existe, on l'utilise, sinon on prend le libelle par defaut
3313  $label = ($langs->trans("AvailabilityType".$obj->code) != ("AvailabilityType".$obj->code) ? $langs->trans("AvailabilityType".$obj->code) : ($obj->label != '-' ? $obj->label : ''));
3314  $this->cache_availability[$obj->rowid]['code'] = $obj->code;
3315  $this->cache_availability[$obj->rowid]['label'] = $label;
3316  $i++;
3317  }
3318 
3319  $this->cache_availability = dol_sort_array($this->cache_availability, 'label', 'asc', 0, 0, 1);
3320 
3321  return $num;
3322  } else {
3323  dol_print_error($this->db);
3324  return -1;
3325  }
3326  }

3344

3348  {
3349  if ($selected == $id)
3350  {
3351  print '<option value="'.$id.'" selected>';
3352  } else {
3353  print '<option value="'.$id.'">';
3354  }
3355  print $arrayavailability['label'];
3356  print '</option>';
3357  }
3358  print '</select>';

3360  print ajax_combobox($htmlname);

3368  public function loadCacheInputReason()
3369  {
3370  global $langs;
3371 
3372  $num = count($this->cache_demand_reason);
3373  if ($num > 0) return 0; // Cache already loaded
3374 
3375  $sql = "SELECT rowid, code, label";
3376  $sql .= " FROM ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX.'c_input_reason';
3377  $sql .= " WHERE active > 0";
3378 
3379  $resql = $this->db->query($sql);
3380  if ($resql)
3381  {
3382  $num = $this->db->num_rows($resql);
3383  $i = 0;
3384  $tmparray = array();
3385  while ($i < $num)
3386  {
3387  $obj = $this->db->fetch_object($resql);
3388 
3389  // Si traduction existe, on l'utilise, sinon on prend le libelle par defaut
3390  $label = ($obj->label != '-' ? $obj->label : '');
3391  if ($langs->trans("DemandReasonType".$obj->code) != ("DemandReasonType".$obj->code)) $label = $langs->trans("DemandReasonType".$obj->code); // So translation key DemandReasonTypeSRC_XXX will work
3392  if ($langs->trans($obj->code) != $obj->code) $label = $langs->trans($obj->code); // So translation key SRC_XXX will work
3393 
3394  $tmparray[$obj->rowid]['id'] = $obj->rowid;
3395  $tmparray[$obj->rowid]['code'] = $obj->code;
3396  $tmparray[$obj->rowid]['label'] = $label;
3397  $i++;
3398  }
3399 
3400  $this->cache_demand_reason = dol_sort_array($tmparray, 'label', 'asc', 0, 0, 1);
3401 
3402  unset($tmparray);
3403  return $num;
3404  } else {
3405  dol_print_error($this->db);
3406  return -1;
3407  }
3408  }
3409 
3420  public function selectInputReason($selected = '', $htmlname = 'demandreasonid', $exclude = '', $addempty = 0)
3421  {
3422  global $langs, $user;
3423 
3424  $this->loadCacheInputReason();
3425 
3426  print '<select class="flat" id="select_'.$htmlname.'" name="'.$htmlname.'">';
3427  if ($addempty) print '<option value="0"'.(empty($selected) ? ' selected' : '').'>&nbsp;</option>';
3428  foreach ($this->cache_demand_reason as $id => $arraydemandreason)
3429  {
3430  if ($arraydemandreason['code'] == $exclude) continue;
3431 
3432  if ($selected && ($selected == $arraydemandreason['id'] || $selected == $arraydemandreason['code']))
3433  {
3434  print '<option value="'.$arraydemandreason['id'].'" selected>';
3435  } else {
3436  print '<option value="'.$arraydemandreason['id'].'">';
3437  }
3438  $label = $arraydemandreason['label']; // Translation of label was already done into the ->loadCacheInputReason
3439  print $langs->trans($label);
3440  print '</option>';
3441  }
3442  print '</select>';
3443  if ($user->admin) print info_admin($langs->trans("YouCanChangeValuesForThisListFromDictionarySetup"), 1);
3444  print ajax_combobox('select_'.$htmlname);
3445  }

3447  // phpcs:disable PEAR.NamingConventions.ValidFunctionName.ScopeNotCamelCaps
3453  public function load_cache_types_paiements()
3454  {
3455  // phpcs:enable
3456  global $langs;
3457 
3458  $num = count($this->cache_types_paiements);
3459  if ($num > 0) return $num; // Cache already loaded
3460 
3461  dol_syslog(__METHOD__, LOG_DEBUG);
3462 
3463  $this->cache_types_paiements = array();
3464 
3465  $sql = "SELECT id, code, libelle as label, type, active";
3466  $sql .= " FROM ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX."c_paiement";
3467  $sql .= " WHERE entity IN (".getEntity('c_paiement').")";
3468  //if ($active >= 0) $sql.= " AND active = ".$active;
3469 
3470  $resql = $this->db->query($sql);
3471  if ($resql)
3472  {
3473  $num = $this->db->num_rows($resql);
3474  $i = 0;
3475  while ($i < $num)
3476  {
3477  $obj = $this->db->fetch_object($resql);
3478 
3479  // Si traduction existe, on l'utilise, sinon on prend le libelle par defaut
3480  $label = ($langs->transnoentitiesnoconv("PaymentTypeShort".$obj->code) != ("PaymentTypeShort".$obj->code) ? $langs->transnoentitiesnoconv("PaymentTypeShort".$obj->code) : ($obj->label != '-' ? $obj->label : ''));
3481  $this->cache_types_paiements[$obj->id]['id'] = $obj->id;
3482  $this->cache_types_paiements[$obj->id]['code'] = $obj->code;
3483  $this->cache_types_paiements[$obj->id]['label'] = $label;
3484  $this->cache_types_paiements[$obj->id]['type'] = $obj->type;
3485  $this->cache_types_paiements[$obj->id]['active'] = $obj->active;
3486  $i++;
3487  }
3488 
3489  $this->cache_types_paiements = dol_sort_array($this->cache_types_paiements, 'label', 'asc', 0, 0, 1);
3490 
3491  return $num;
3492  } else {
3493  dol_print_error($this->db);
3494  return -1;
3495  }
3496  }

3499  // phpcs:disable PEAR.NamingConventions.ValidFunctionName.ScopeNotCamelCaps
3513  public function select_conditions_paiements($selected = 0, $htmlname = 'condid', $filtertype = -1, $addempty = 0, $noinfoadmin = 0, $morecss = '')
3514  {
3515  // phpcs:enable
3516  global $langs, $user, $conf;
3517 
3518  dol_syslog(__METHOD__." selected=".$selected.", htmlname=".$htmlname, LOG_DEBUG);
3519 
3520  $this->load_cache_conditions_paiements();
3521 
3522  // Set default value if not already set by caller
3523  if (empty($selected) && !empty($conf->global->MAIN_DEFAULT_PAYMENT_TERM_ID)) $selected = $conf->global->MAIN_DEFAULT_PAYMENT_TERM_ID;
3524 
3525  print '<select id="'.$htmlname.'" class="flat selectpaymentterms'.($morecss ? ' '.$morecss : '').'" name="'.$htmlname.'">';
3526  if ($addempty) print '<option value="0">&nbsp;</option>';
3527  foreach ($this->cache_conditions_paiements as $id => $arrayconditions)
3528  {
3529  if ($selected == $id)
3530  {
3531  print '<option value="'.$id.'" selected>';
3532  } else {
3533  print '<option value="'.$id.'">';
3534  }
3535  print $arrayconditions['label'];
3536  print '</option>';
3537  }
3538  print '</select>';
3539  if ($user->admin && empty($noinfoadmin)) print info_admin($langs->trans("YouCanChangeValuesForThisListFromDictionarySetup"), 1);
3540  print ajax_combobox($htmlname);
3541  }

3543 
3544  // phpcs:disable PEAR.NamingConventions.ValidFunctionName.ScopeNotCamelCaps
3560  public function select_types_paiements($selected = '', $htmlname = 'paiementtype', $filtertype = '', $format = 0, $empty = 1, $noadmininfo = 0, $maxlength = 0, $active = 1, $morecss = '')
3561  {
3562  // phpcs:enable
3563  global $langs, $user, $conf;
3564 
3565  dol_syslog(__METHOD__." ".$selected.", ".$htmlname.", ".$filtertype.", ".$format, LOG_DEBUG);
3566 
3567  $filterarray = array();
3568  if ($filtertype == 'CRDT') $filterarray = array(0, 2, 3);
3569  elseif ($filtertype == 'DBIT') $filterarray = array(1, 2, 3);
3570  elseif ($filtertype != '' && $filtertype != '-1') $filterarray = explode(',', $filtertype);
3571 
3572  $this->load_cache_types_paiements();
3573 
3574  // Set default value if not already set by caller
3575  if (empty($selected) && !empty($conf->global->MAIN_DEFAULT_PAYMENT_TYPE_ID)) $selected = $conf->global->MAIN_DEFAULT_PAYMENT_TYPE_ID;
3576 
3577  print '<select id="select'.$htmlname.'" class="flat selectpaymenttypes'.($morecss ? ' '.$morecss : '').'" name="'.$htmlname.'">';
3578  if ($empty) print '<option value="">&nbsp;</option>';
3579  foreach ($this->cache_types_paiements as $id => $arraytypes)
3580  {
3581  // If not good status
3582  if ($active >= 0 && $arraytypes['active'] != $active) continue;
3583 
3584  // On passe si on a demande de filtrer sur des modes de paiments particuliers
3585  if (count($filterarray) && !in_array($arraytypes['type'], $filterarray)) continue;
3586 
3587  // We discard empty line if showempty is on because an empty line has already been output.
3588  if ($empty && empty($arraytypes['code'])) continue;
3589 
3590  if ($format == 0) print '<option value="'.$id.'"';
3591  elseif ($format == 1) print '<option value="'.$arraytypes['code'].'"';
3592  elseif ($format == 2) print '<option value="'.$arraytypes['code'].'"';
3593  elseif ($format == 3) print '<option value="'.$id.'"';
3594  // Print attribute selected or not
3595  if ($format == 1 || $format == 2) {
3596  if ($selected == $arraytypes['code']) print ' selected';
3597  } else {
3598  if ($selected == $id) print ' selected';
3599  }
3600  print '>';
3601  if ($format == 0) $value = ($maxlength ?dol_trunc($arraytypes['label'], $maxlength) : $arraytypes['label']);
3602  elseif ($format == 1) $value = $arraytypes['code'];
3603  elseif ($format == 2) $value = ($maxlength ?dol_trunc($arraytypes['label'], $maxlength) : $arraytypes['label']);
3604  elseif ($format == 3) $value = $arraytypes['code'];
3605  print $value ? $value : '&nbsp;';
3606  print '</option>';
3607  }
3608  print '</select>';
3609  if ($user->admin && !$noadmininfo) print info_admin($langs->trans("YouCanChangeValuesForThisListFromDictionarySetup"), 1);
3610  print ajax_combobox('select'.$htmlname);
3611  }
3612 
3613 
3622  public function selectPriceBaseType($selected = '', $htmlname = 'price_base_type', $addjscombo = 0)
3623  {
3624  global $langs;
3625 
3626  $return = '<select class="flat maxwidth100" id="select_'.$htmlname.'" name="'.$htmlname.'">';
3627  $options = array(
3628  'HT'=>$langs->trans("HT"),
3629  'TTC'=>$langs->trans("TTC")
3630  );
3631  foreach ($options as $id => $value)
3632  {
3633  if ($selected == $id)
3634  {
3635  $return .= '<option value="'.$id.'" selected>'.$value;
3636  } else {
3637  $return .= '<option value="'.$id.'">'.$value;
3638  }
3639  $return .= '</option>';
3640  }
3641  $return .= '</select>';
3642  if ($addjscombo) $return .= ajax_combobox('select_'.$htmlname);
3643 
3644  return $return;
3645  }
3646 
3647  // phpcs:disable PEAR.NamingConventions.ValidFunctionName.ScopeNotCamelCaps
3653  public function load_cache_transport_mode()
3654  {
3655  // phpcs:enable
3656  global $langs;
3657 
3658  $num = count($this->cache_transport_mode);
3659  if ($num > 0) return $num; // Cache already loaded
3660 
3661  dol_syslog(__METHOD__, LOG_DEBUG);
3662 
3663  $this->cache_transport_mode = array();
3664 
3665  $sql = "SELECT rowid, code, label, active";
3666  $sql .= " FROM ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX."c_transport_mode";
3667  $sql .= " WHERE entity IN (".getEntity('c_transport_mode').")";
3668  //if ($active >= 0) $sql.= " AND active = ".$active;
3669 
3670  $resql = $this->db->query($sql);
3671  if ($resql)
3672  {
3673  $num = $this->db->num_rows($resql);
3674  $i = 0;
3675  while ($i < $num)
3676  {
3677  $obj = $this->db->fetch_object($resql);
3678 
3679  // If traduction exist, we use it else we take the default label
3680  $label = ($langs->transnoentitiesnoconv("PaymentTypeShort".$obj->code) != ("PaymentTypeShort".$obj->code) ? $langs->transnoentitiesnoconv("PaymentTypeShort".$obj->code) : ($obj->label != '-' ? $obj->label : ''));
3681  $this->cache_transport_mode[$obj->rowid]['rowid'] = $obj->rowid;
3682  $this->cache_transport_mode[$obj->rowid]['code'] = $obj->code;
3683  $this->cache_transport_mode[$obj->rowid]['label'] = $label;
3684  $this->cache_transport_mode[$obj->rowid]['active'] = $obj->active;
3685  $i++;
3686  }
3687 
3688  $this->cache_transport_mode = dol_sort_array($this->cache_transport_mode, 'label', 'asc', 0, 0, 1);
3689 
3690  return $num;
3691  }
3692  else {
3693  dol_print_error($this->db);
3694  return -1;
3695  }
3696  }
3697 
3711  public function selectTransportMode($selected = '', $htmlname = 'transportmode', $format = 0, $empty = 1, $noadmininfo = 0, $maxlength = 0, $active = 1, $morecss = '')
3712  {
3713  global $langs, $user;
3714 
3715  dol_syslog(__METHOD__." ".$selected.", ".$htmlname.", ".$format, LOG_DEBUG);
3716 
3717  $this->load_cache_transport_mode();
3718 
3719  print '<select id="select'.$htmlname.'" class="flat selectmodetransport'.($morecss ? ' '.$morecss : '').'" name="'.$htmlname.'">';
3720  if ($empty) print '<option value="">&nbsp;</option>';
3721  foreach ($this->cache_transport_mode as $id => $arraytypes)
3722  {
3723  // If not good status
3724  if ($active >= 0 && $arraytypes['active'] != $active) continue;
3725 
3726  // We discard empty line if showempty is on because an empty line has already been output.
3727  if ($empty && empty($arraytypes['code'])) continue;
3728 
3729  if ($format == 0) print '<option value="'.$id.'"';
3730  elseif ($format == 1) print '<option value="'.$arraytypes['code'].'"';
3731  elseif ($format == 2) print '<option value="'.$arraytypes['code'].'"';
3732  elseif ($format == 3) print '<option value="'.$id.'"';
3733  // If text is selected, we compare with code, else with id
3734  if (preg_match('/[a-z]/i', $selected) && $selected == $arraytypes['code']) print ' selected';
3735  elseif ($selected == $id) print ' selected';
3736  print '>';
3737  if ($format == 0) $value = ($maxlength ?dol_trunc($arraytypes['label'], $maxlength) : $arraytypes['label']);
3738  elseif ($format == 1) $value = $arraytypes['code'];
3739  elseif ($format == 2) $value = ($maxlength ?dol_trunc($arraytypes['label'], $maxlength) : $arraytypes['label']);
3740  elseif ($format == 3) $value = $arraytypes['code'];
3741  print $value ? $value : '&nbsp;';
3742  print '</option>';
3743  }
3744  print '</select>';
3745  if ($user->admin && !$noadmininfo) print info_admin($langs->trans("YouCanChangeValuesForThisListFromDictionarySetup"), 1);
3746  }
3747 
3758  public function selectShippingMethod($selected = '', $htmlname = 'shipping_method_id', $filtre = '', $useempty = 0, $moreattrib = '')
3759  {
3760  global $langs, $conf, $user;
3761 
3762  $langs->load("admin");
3763  $langs->load("deliveries");
3764 
3765  $sql = "SELECT rowid, code, libelle as label";
3766  $sql .= " FROM ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX."c_shipment_mode";
3767  $sql .= " WHERE active > 0";
3768  if ($filtre) $sql .= " AND ".$filtre;
3769  $sql .= " ORDER BY libelle ASC";
3770 
3771  dol_syslog(get_class($this)."::selectShippingMode", LOG_DEBUG);
3772  $result = $this->db->query($sql);
3773  if ($result) {
3774  $num = $this->db->num_rows($result);
3775  $i = 0;
3776  if ($num) {
3777  print '<select id="select'.$htmlname.'" class="flat selectshippingmethod" name="'.$htmlname.'"'.($moreattrib ? ' '.$moreattrib : '').'>';
3778  if ($useempty == 1 || ($useempty == 2 && $num > 1)) {
3779  print '<option value="-1">&nbsp;</option>';
3780  }
3781  while ($i < $num) {
3782  $obj = $this->db->fetch_object($result);
3783  if ($selected == $obj->rowid) {
3784  print '<option value="'.$obj->rowid.'" selected>';
3785  } else {
3786  print '<option value="'.$obj->rowid.'">';
3787  }
3788  print ($langs->trans("SendingMethod".strtoupper($obj->code)) != "SendingMethod".strtoupper($obj->code)) ? $langs->trans("SendingMethod".strtoupper($obj->code)) : $obj->label;
3789  print '</option>';
3790  $i++;
3791  }
3792  print "</select>";
3793  if ($user->admin) print info_admin($langs->trans("YouCanChangeValuesForThisListFromDictionarySetup"), 1);
3794 
3795  print ajax_combobox('select'.$htmlname);
3796  } else {
3797  print $langs->trans("NoShippingMethodDefined");
3798  }
3799  } else {
3800  dol_print_error($this->db);
3801  }
3802  }
3803 
3813  public function formSelectShippingMethod($page, $selected = '', $htmlname = 'shipping_method_id', $addempty = 0)
3814  {
3815  global $langs, $db;
3816 
3817  $langs->load("deliveries");
3818 
3819  if ($htmlname != "none") {
3820  print '<form method="POST" action="'.$page.'">';
3821  print '<input type="hidden" name="action" value="setshippingmethod">';
3822  print '<input type="hidden" name="token" value="'.newToken().'">';
3823  $this->selectShippingMethod($selected, $htmlname, '', $addempty);
3824  print '<input type="submit" class="button valignmiddle" value="'.$langs->trans("Modify").'">';
3825  print '</form>';
3826  } else {
3827  if ($selected) {
3828  $code = $langs->getLabelFromKey($db, $selected, 'c_shipment_mode', 'rowid', 'code');
3829  print $langs->trans("SendingMethod".strtoupper($code));
3830  } else {
3831  print "&nbsp;";
3832  }
3833  }
3834  }
3835 
3844  public function selectSituationInvoices($selected = '', $socid = 0)
3845  {
3846  global $langs;
3847 
3848  $langs->load('bills');
3849 
3850  $opt = '<option value ="" selected></option>';
3851  $sql = 'SELECT rowid, ref, situation_cycle_ref, situation_counter, situation_final, fk_soc';
3852  $sql .= ' FROM '.MAIN_DB_PREFIX.'facture';
3853  $sql .= ' WHERE entity IN ('.getEntity('invoice').')';
3854  $sql .= ' AND situation_counter >= 1';
3855  $sql .= ' AND fk_soc = '.(int) $socid;
3856  $sql .= ' AND type <> 2';
3857  $sql .= ' ORDER by situation_cycle_ref, situation_counter desc';
3858  $resql = $this->db->query($sql);
3859 
3860  if ($resql && $this->db->num_rows($resql) > 0) {
3861  // Last seen cycle
3862  $ref = 0;
3863  while ($obj = $this->db->fetch_object($resql)) {
3864  //Same cycle ?
3865  if ($obj->situation_cycle_ref != $ref) {
3866  // Just seen this cycle
3867  $ref = $obj->situation_cycle_ref;
3868  //not final ?
3869  if ($obj->situation_final != 1) {
3870  //Not prov?
3871  if (substr($obj->ref, 1, 4) != 'PROV') {
3872  if ($selected == $obj->rowid) {
3873  $opt .= '<option value="'.$obj->rowid.'" selected>'.$obj->ref.'</option>';
3874  } else {
3875  $opt .= '<option value="'.$obj->rowid.'">'.$obj->ref.'</option>';
3876  }
3877  }
3878  }
3879  }
3880  }
3881  } else {
3882  dol_syslog("Error sql=".$sql.", error=".$this->error, LOG_ERR);
3883  }
3884  if ($opt == '<option value ="" selected></option>')
3885  {
3886  $opt = '<option value ="0" selected>'.$langs->trans('NoSituations').'</option>';
3887  }
3888  return $opt;
3889  }
3890 
3899  public function selectUnits($selected = '', $htmlname = 'units', $showempty = 0)
3900  {
3901  global $langs;
3902 
3903  $langs->load('products');
3904 
3905  $return = '<select class="flat" id="'.$htmlname.'" name="'.$htmlname.'">';
3906 
3907  $sql = 'SELECT rowid, label, code from '.MAIN_DB_PREFIX.'c_units';
3908  $sql .= ' WHERE active > 0';
3909 
3910  $resql = $this->db->query($sql);
3911  if ($resql && $this->db->num_rows($resql) > 0)
3912  {
3913  if ($showempty) $return .= '<option value="none"></option>';
3914 
3915  while ($res = $this->db->fetch_object($resql))
3916  {
3917  $unitLabel = $res->label;
3918  if (!empty($langs->tab_translate['unit'.$res->code])) // check if Translation is available before
3919  {
3920  $unitLabel = $langs->trans('unit'.$res->code) != $res->label ? $langs->trans('unit'.$res->code) : $res->label;
3921  }
3922 
3923  if ($selected == $res->rowid)
3924  {
3925  $return .= '<option value="'.$res->rowid.'" selected>'.$unitLabel.'</option>';
3926  } else {
3927  $return .= '<option value="'.$res->rowid.'">'.$unitLabel.'</option>';
3928  }
3929  }
3930  $return .= '</select>';
3931  }
3932  return $return;
3933  }
3934 
3935  // phpcs:disable PEAR.NamingConventions.ValidFunctionName.ScopeNotCamelCaps
3950  public function select_comptes($selected = '', $htmlname = 'accountid', $status = 0, $filtre = '', $useempty = 0, $moreattrib = '', $showcurrency = 0, $morecss = '', $nooutput = 0)
3951  {
3952  // phpcs:enable
3953  global $langs, $conf;
3954 
3955  $out = '';
3956 
3957  $langs->load("admin");
3958  $num = 0;
3959 
3960  $sql = "SELECT rowid, label, bank, clos as status, currency_code";
3961  $sql .= " FROM ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX."bank_account";
3962  $sql .= " WHERE entity IN (".getEntity('bank_account').")";
3963  if ($status != 2) $sql .= " AND clos = ".(int) $status;
3964  if ($filtre) $sql .= " AND ".$filtre;
3965  $sql .= " ORDER BY label";
3966 
3967  dol_syslog(get_class($this)."::select_comptes", LOG_DEBUG);
3968  $result = $this->db->query($sql);
3969  if ($result)
3970  {
3971  $num = $this->db->num_rows($result);
3972  $i = 0;
3973  if ($num)
3974  {
3975  $out .= '<select id="select'.$htmlname.'" class="flat selectbankaccount'.($morecss ? ' '.$morecss : '').'" name="'.$htmlname.'"'.($moreattrib ? ' '.$moreattrib : '').'>';
3976  if ($useempty == 1 || ($useempty == 2 && $num > 1))
3977  {
3978  $out .= '<option value="-1">&nbsp;</option>';
3979  }
3980 
3981  while ($i < $num)
3982  {
3983  $obj = $this->db->fetch_object($result);
3984  if ($selected == $obj->rowid || ($useempty == 2 && $num == 1 && empty($selected)))
3985  {
3986  $out .= '<option value="'.$obj->rowid.'" selected>';
3987  } else {
3988  $out .= '<option value="'.$obj->rowid.'">';
3989  }
3990  $out .= trim($obj->label);
3991  if ($showcurrency) $out .= ' ('.$obj->currency_code.')';
3992  if ($status == 2 && $obj->status == 1) $out .= ' ('.$langs->trans("Closed").')';
3993  $out .= '</option>';
3994  $i++;
3995  }
3996  $out .= "</select>";
3997  $out .= ajax_combobox('select'.$htmlname);
3998  } else {
3999  if ($status == 0) $out .= '<span class="opacitymedium">'.$langs->trans("NoActiveBankAccountDefined").'</span>';
4000  else $out .= '<span class="opacitymedium">'.$langs->trans("NoBankAccountFound").'</span>';
4001  }
4002  } else {
4003  dol_print_error($this->db);
4004  }
4005 
4006  // Output or return
4007  if (empty($nooutput)) print $out;
4008  else return $out;
4009 
4010  return $num;
4011  }
4012 
4024  public function selectEstablishments($selected = '', $htmlname = 'entity', $status = 0, $filtre = '', $useempty = 0, $moreattrib = '')
4025  {
4026  // phpcs:enable
4027  global $langs, $conf;
4028 
4029  $langs->load("admin");
4030  $num = 0;
4031 
4032  $sql = "SELECT rowid, name, fk_country, status, entity";
4033  $sql .= " FROM ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX."establishment";
4034  $sql .= " WHERE 1=1";
4035  if ($status != 2) $sql .= " AND status = ".(int) $status;
4036  if ($filtre) $sql .= " AND ".$filtre;
4037  $sql .= " ORDER BY name";
4038 
4039  dol_syslog(get_class($this)."::select_establishment", LOG_DEBUG);
4040  $result = $this->db->query($sql);
4041  if ($result)
4042  {
4043  $num = $this->db->num_rows($result);
4044  $i = 0;
4045  if ($num)
4046  {
4047  print '<select id="select'.$htmlname.'" class="flat selectestablishment" name="'.$htmlname.'"'.($moreattrib ? ' '.$moreattrib : '').'>';
4048  if ($useempty == 1 || ($useempty == 2 && $num > 1))
4049  {
4050  print '<option value="-1">&nbsp;</option>';
4051  }
4052 
4053  while ($i < $num)
4054  {
4055  $obj = $this->db->fetch_object($result);
4056  if ($selected == $obj->rowid)
4057  {
4058  print '<option value="'.$obj->rowid.'" selected>';
4059  } else {
4060  print '<option value="'.$obj->rowid.'">';
4061  }
4062  print trim($obj->name);
4063  if ($status == 2 && $obj->status == 1) print ' ('.$langs->trans("Closed").')';
4064  print '</option>';
4065  $i++;
4066  }
4067  print "</select>";
4068  } else {
4069  if ($status == 0) print '<span class="opacitymedium">'.$langs->trans("NoActiveEstablishmentDefined").'</span>';
4070  else print '<span class="opacitymedium">'.$langs->trans("NoEstablishmentFound").'</span>';
4071  }
4072  } else {
4073  dol_print_error($this->db);
4074  }
4075  }

4086  public function formSelectAccount($page, $selected = '', $htmlname = 'fk_account', $addempty = 0)
4087  {
4088  global $langs;
4089  if ($htmlname != "none") {
4090  print '<form method="POST" action="'.$page.'">';
4091  print '<input type="hidden" name="action" value="setbankaccount">';
4092  print '<input type="hidden" name="token" value="'.newToken().'">';
4093  $nbaccountfound = $this->select_comptes($selected, $htmlname, 0, '', $addempty);
4094  if ($nbaccountfound > 0) print '<input type="submit" class="button valignmiddle" value="'.$langs->trans("Modify").'">';
4095  print '</form>';
4096  } else {
4097  $langs->load('banks');
4098 
4099  if ($selected) {
4100  require_once DOL_DOCUMENT_ROOT.'/compta/bank/class/account.class.php';
4101  $bankstatic = new Account($this->db);
4102  $result = $bankstatic->fetch($selected);
4103  if ($result) print $bankstatic->getNomUrl(1);
4104  } else {
4105  print "&nbsp;";
4106  }
4107  }
4108  }
