4110  // phpcs:disable PEAR.NamingConventions.ValidFunctionName.ScopeNotCamelCaps
4129  public function select_all_categories($type, $selected = '', $htmlname = "parent", $maxlength = 64, $markafterid = 0, $outputmode = 0, $include = 0, $morecss = '')
4130  {
4131  // phpcs:enable
4132  global $conf, $langs;
4133  $langs->load("categories");
4134 
4135  include_once DOL_DOCUMENT_ROOT.'/categories/class/categorie.class.php';
4136 
4137  // For backward compatibility
4138  if (is_numeric($type))
4139  {
4140  dol_syslog(__METHOD__.': using numeric value for parameter type is deprecated. Use string code instead.', LOG_WARNING);
4141  }
4142 
4143  if ($type === Categorie::TYPE_BANK_LINE)
4144  {
4145  // TODO Move this into common category feature
4146  $cate_arbo = array();
4147  $sql = "SELECT c.label, c.rowid";
4148  $sql .= " FROM ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX."bank_categ as c";
4149  $sql .= " WHERE entity = ".$conf->entity;
4150  $sql .= " ORDER BY c.label";
4151  $result = $this->db->query($sql);
4152  if ($result)
4153  {
4154  $num = $this->db->num_rows($result);
4155  $i = 0;
4156  while ($i < $num)
4157  {
4158  $objp = $this->db->fetch_object($result);
4159  if ($objp) $cate_arbo[$objp->rowid] = array('id'=>$objp->rowid, 'fulllabel'=>$objp->label);
4160  $i++;
4161  }
4162  $this->db->free($result);
4163  } else dol_print_error($this->db);
4164  } else {
4165  $cat = new Categorie($this->db);
4166  $cate_arbo = $cat->get_full_arbo($type, $markafterid, $include);
4167  }
4168 
4169  $output = '<select class="flat'.($morecss ? ' '.$morecss : '').'" name="'.$htmlname.'" id="'.$htmlname.'">';
4170  $outarray = array();
4171  if (is_array($cate_arbo))
4172  {
4173  if (!count($cate_arbo)) $output .= '<option value="-1" disabled>'.$langs->trans("NoCategoriesDefined").'</option>';
4174  else {
4175  $output .= '<option value="-1">&nbsp;</option>';
4176  foreach ($cate_arbo as $key => $value)
4177  {
4178  if ($cate_arbo[$key]['id'] == $selected || ($selected === 'auto' && count($cate_arbo) == 1))
4179  {
4180  $add = 'selected ';
4181  } else {
4182  $add = '';
4183  }
4184  $output .= '<option '.$add.'value="'.$cate_arbo[$key]['id'].'">'.dol_trunc($cate_arbo[$key]['fulllabel'], $maxlength, 'middle').'</option>';
4185 
4186  $outarray[$cate_arbo[$key]['id']] = $cate_arbo[$key]['fulllabel'];
4187  }
4188  }
4189  }
4190  $output .= '</select>';
4191  $output .= "\n";
4192 
4193  if ($outputmode) return $outarray;
4194  return $output;
4195  }
4196 
4197  // phpcs:disable PEAR.NamingConventions.ValidFunctionName.ScopeNotCamelCaps
4214  public function form_confirm($page, $title, $question, $action, $formquestion = '', $selectedchoice = "", $useajax = 0, $height = 170, $width = 500)
4215  {
4216  // phpcs:enable
4217  dol_syslog(__METHOD__.': using form_confirm is deprecated. Use formconfim instead.', LOG_WARNING);
4218  print $this->formconfirm($page, $title, $question, $action, $formquestion, $selectedchoice, $useajax, $height, $width);
4219  }
4220 
4245  public function formconfirm($page, $title, $question, $action, $formquestion = '', $selectedchoice = '', $useajax = 0, $height = 0, $width = 500, $disableformtag = 0)
4246  {
4247  global $langs, $conf;
4248 
4249  $more = '<!-- formconfirm for page='.dol_escape_htmltag($page).' -->';
4250  $formconfirm = '';
4251  $inputok = array();
4252  $inputko = array();
4253 
4254  // Clean parameters
4255  $newselectedchoice = empty($selectedchoice) ? "no" : $selectedchoice;
4256  if ($conf->browser->layout == 'phone') $width = '95%';
4257 
4258  // Set height automatically if not defined
4259  if (empty($height)) {
4260  $height = 220;
4261  if (is_array($formquestion) && count($formquestion) > 2) {
4262  $height += ((count($formquestion) - 2) * 24);
4263  }
4264  }
4265 
4266  if (is_array($formquestion) && !empty($formquestion))
4267  {
4268  // First add hidden fields and value
4269  foreach ($formquestion as $key => $input)
4270  {
4271  if (is_array($input) && !empty($input))
4272  {
4273  if ($input['type'] == 'hidden')
4274  {
4275  $more .= '<input type="hidden" id="'.$input['name'].'" name="'.$input['name'].'" value="'.dol_escape_htmltag($input['value']).'">'."\n";
4276  }
4277  }
4278  }
4279 
4280  // Now add questions
4281  $moreonecolumn = '';
4282  $more .= '<div class="tagtable paddingtopbottomonly centpercent noborderspacing">'."\n";
4283  foreach ($formquestion as $key => $input)
4284  {
4285  if (is_array($input) && !empty($input))
4286  {
4287  $size = (!empty($input['size']) ? ' size="'.$input['size'].'"' : '');
4288  $moreattr = (!empty($input['moreattr']) ? ' '.$input['moreattr'] : '');
4289  $morecss = (!empty($input['morecss']) ? ' '.$input['morecss'] : '');
4290 
4291  if ($input['type'] == 'text')
4292  {
4293  $more .= '<div class="tagtr"><div class="tagtd'.(empty($input['tdclass']) ? '' : (' '.$input['tdclass'])).'">'.$input['label'].'</div><div class="tagtd"><input type="text" class="flat'.$morecss.'" id="'.$input['name'].'" name="'.$input['name'].'"'.$size.' value="'.$input['value'].'"'.$moreattr.' /></div></div>'."\n";
4294  } elseif ($input['type'] == 'password')
4295  {
4296  $more .= '<div class="tagtr"><div class="tagtd'.(empty($input['tdclass']) ? '' : (' '.$input['tdclass'])).'">'.$input['label'].'</div><div class="tagtd"><input type="password" class="flat'.$morecss.'" id="'.$input['name'].'" name="'.$input['name'].'"'.$size.' value="'.$input['value'].'"'.$moreattr.' /></div></div>'."\n";
4297  } elseif ($input['type'] == 'select')
4298  {
4299  $show_empty = isset($input['select_show_empty']) ? $input['select_show_empty'] : 1;
4300  $key_in_label = isset($input['select_key_in_label']) ? $input['select_key_in_label'] : 0;
4301  $value_as_key = isset($input['select_value_as_key']) ? $input['select_value_as_key'] : 0;
4302  $translate = isset($input['select_translate']) ? $input['select_translate'] : 0;
4303  $maxlen = isset($input['select_maxlen']) ? $input['select_maxlen'] : 0;
4304  $disabled = isset($input['select_disabled']) ? $input['select_disabled'] : 0;
4305  $sort = isset($input['select_sort']) ? $input['select_sort'] : '';
4306 
4307  $more .= '<div class="tagtr"><div class="tagtd'.(empty($input['tdclass']) ? '' : (' '.$input['tdclass'])).'">';
4308  if (!empty($input['label'])) $more .= $input['label'].'</div><div class="tagtd left">';
4309  $more .= $this->selectarray($input['name'], $input['values'], $input['default'], $show_empty, $key_in_label, $value_as_key, $moreattr, $translate, $maxlen, $disabled, $sort, $morecss);
4310  $more .= '</div></div>'."\n";
4311  } elseif ($input['type'] == 'checkbox')
4312  {
4313  $more .= '<div class="tagtr">';
4314  $more .= '<div class="tagtd'.(empty($input['tdclass']) ? '' : (' '.$input['tdclass'])).'">'.$input['label'].' </div><div class="tagtd">';
4315  $more .= '<input type="checkbox" class="flat'.$morecss.'" id="'.$input['name'].'" name="'.$input['name'].'"'.$moreattr;
4316  if (!is_bool($input['value']) && $input['value'] != 'false' && $input['value'] != '0') $more .= ' checked';
4317  if (is_bool($input['value']) && $input['value']) $more .= ' checked';
4318  if (isset($input['disabled'])) $more .= ' disabled';
4319  $more .= ' /></div>';
4320  $more .= '</div>'."\n";
4321  } elseif ($input['type'] == 'radio')
4322  {
4323  $i = 0;
4324  foreach ($input['values'] as $selkey => $selval)
4325  {
4326  $more .= '<div class="tagtr">';
4327  if ($i == 0) $more .= '<div class="tagtd'.(empty($input['tdclass']) ? ' tdtop' : (' tdtop '.$input['tdclass'])).'">'.$input['label'].'</div>';
4328  else $more .= '<div clas="tagtd'.(empty($input['tdclass']) ? '' : (' "'.$input['tdclass'])).'">&nbsp;</div>';
4329  $more .= '<div class="tagtd'.($i == 0 ? ' tdtop' : '').'"><input type="radio" class="flat'.$morecss.'" id="'.$input['name'].$selkey.'" name="'.$input['name'].'" value="'.$selkey.'"'.$moreattr;
4330  if ($input['disabled']) $more .= ' disabled';
4331  if (isset($input['default']) && $input['default'] === $selkey) $more .= ' checked="checked"';
4332  $more .= ' /> ';
4333  $more .= '<label for="'.$input['name'].$selkey.'">'.$selval.'</label>';
4334  $more .= '</div></div>'."\n";
4335  $i++;
4336  }
4337  } elseif ($input['type'] == 'date')
4338  {
4339  $more .= '<div class="tagtr"><div class="tagtd'.(empty($input['tdclass']) ? '' : (' '.$input['tdclass'])).'">'.$input['label'].'</div>';
4340  $more .= '<div class="tagtd">';
4341  $more .= $this->selectDate($input['value'], $input['name'], 0, 0, 0, '', 1, 0);
4342  $more .= '</div></div>'."\n";
4343  $formquestion[] = array('name'=>$input['name'].'day');
4344  $formquestion[] = array('name'=>$input['name'].'month');
4345  $formquestion[] = array('name'=>$input['name'].'year');
4346  $formquestion[] = array('name'=>$input['name'].'hour');
4347  $formquestion[] = array('name'=>$input['name'].'min');
4348  } elseif ($input['type'] == 'other')
4349  {
4350  $more .= '<div class="tagtr"><div class="tagtd'.(empty($input['tdclass']) ? '' : (' '.$input['tdclass'])).'">';
4351  if (!empty($input['label'])) $more .= $input['label'].'</div><div class="tagtd">';
4352  $more .= $input['value'];
4353  $more .= '</div></div>'."\n";
4354  } elseif ($input['type'] == 'onecolumn')
4355  {
4356  $moreonecolumn .= '<div class="margintoponly">';
4357  $moreonecolumn .= $input['value'];
4358  $moreonecolumn .= '</div>'."\n";
4359  }
4360  }
4361  }
4362  $more .= '</div>'."\n";
4363  $more .= $moreonecolumn;
4364  }
4365 
4366  // JQUI method dialog is broken with jmobile, we use standard HTML.
4367  // Note: When using dol_use_jmobile or no js, you must also check code for button use a GET url with action=xxx and check that you also output the confirm code when action=xxx
4368  // See page product/card.php for example
4369  if (!empty($conf->dol_use_jmobile)) $useajax = 0;
4370  if (empty($conf->use_javascript_ajax)) $useajax = 0;
4371 
4372  if ($useajax)
4373  {
4374  $autoOpen = true;
4375  $dialogconfirm = 'dialog-confirm';
4376  $button = '';
4377  if (!is_numeric($useajax))
4378  {
4379  $button = $useajax;
4380  $useajax = 1;
4381  $autoOpen = false;
4382  $dialogconfirm .= '-'.$button;
4383  }
4384  $pageyes = $page.(preg_match('/\?/', $page) ? '&' : '?').'action='.$action.'&confirm=yes';
4385  $pageno = ($useajax == 2 ? $page.(preg_match('/\?/', $page) ? '&' : '?').'confirm=no' : '');
4386  // Add input fields into list of fields to read during submit (inputok and inputko)
4387  if (is_array($formquestion))
4388  {
4389  foreach ($formquestion as $key => $input)
4390  {
4391  //print "xx ".$key." rr ".is_array($input)."<br>\n";
4392  if (is_array($input) && isset($input['name'])) array_push($inputok, $input['name']);
4393  if (isset($input['inputko']) && $input['inputko'] == 1) array_push($inputko, $input['name']);
4394  }
4395  }
4396  // Show JQuery confirm box.
4397  $formconfirm .= '<div id="'.$dialogconfirm.'" title="'.dol_escape_htmltag($title).'" style="display: none;">';
4398  if (is_array($formquestion) && !empty($formquestion['text'])) {
4399  $formconfirm .= '<div class="confirmtext">'.$formquestion['text'].'</div>'."\n";
4400  }
4401  if (!empty($more)) {
4402  $formconfirm .= '<div class="confirmquestions">'.$more.'</div>'."\n";
4403  }
4404  $formconfirm .= ($question ? '<div class="confirmmessage">'.img_help('', '').' '.$question.'</div>' : '');
4405  $formconfirm .= '</div>'."\n";
4406 
4407  $formconfirm .= "\n<!-- begin ajax formconfirm page=".$page." -->\n";
4408  $formconfirm .= '<script type="text/javascript">'."\n";
4409  $formconfirm .= 'jQuery(document).ready(function() {
4410  $(function() {
4411  $( "#'.$dialogconfirm.'" ).dialog(
4412  {
4413  autoOpen: '.($autoOpen ? "true" : "false").',';
4414  if ($newselectedchoice == 'no')
4415  {
4416  $formconfirm .= '
4417  open: function() {
4418  $(this).parent().find("button.ui-button:eq(2)").focus();
4419  },';
4420  }
4421  $formconfirm .= '
4422  resizable: false,
4423  height: "'.$height.'",
4424  width: "'.$width.'",
4425  modal: true,
4426  closeOnEscape: false,
4427  buttons: {
4428  "'.dol_escape_js($langs->transnoentities("Yes")).'": function() {
4429  var options = "&token='.urlencode(newToken()).'";
4430  var inputok = '.json_encode($inputok).'; /* List of fields into form */
4431  var pageyes = "'.dol_escape_js(!empty($pageyes) ? $pageyes : '').'";
4432  if (inputok.length>0) {
4433  $.each(inputok, function(i, inputname) {
4434  var more = "";
4435  var inputvalue;
4436  if ($("input[name=\'" + inputname + "\']").attr("type") == "radio") {
4437  inputvalue = $("input[name=\'" + inputname + "\']:checked").val();
4438  } else {
4439  if ($("#" + inputname).attr("type") == "checkbox") { more = ":checked"; }
4440  inputvalue = $("#" + inputname + more).val();
4441  }
4442  if (typeof inputvalue == "undefined") { inputvalue=""; }
4443  console.log("check inputname="+inputname+" inputvalue="+inputvalue);
4444  options += "&" + inputname + "=" + encodeURIComponent(inputvalue);
4445  });
4446  }
4447  var urljump = pageyes + (pageyes.indexOf("?") < 0 ? "?" : "") + options;
4448  if (pageyes.length > 0) { location.href = urljump; }
4449  $(this).dialog("close");
4450  },
4451  "'.dol_escape_js($langs->transnoentities("No")).'": function() {
4452  var options = "&token='.urlencode(newToken()).'";
4453  var inputko = '.json_encode($inputko).'; /* List of fields into form */
4454  var pageno="'.dol_escape_js(!empty($pageno) ? $pageno : '').'";
4455  if (inputko.length>0) {
4456  $.each(inputko, function(i, inputname) {
4457  var more = "";
4458  if ($("#" + inputname).attr("type") == "checkbox") { more = ":checked"; }
4459  var inputvalue = $("#" + inputname + more).val();
4460  if (typeof inputvalue == "undefined") { inputvalue=""; }
4461  options += "&" + inputname + "=" + encodeURIComponent(inputvalue);
4462  });
4463  }
4464  var urljump=pageno + (pageno.indexOf("?") < 0 ? "?" : "") + options;
4465  //alert(urljump);
4466  if (pageno.length > 0) { location.href = urljump; }
4467  $(this).dialog("close");
4468  }
4469  }
4470  }
4471  );
4472 
4473  var button = "'.$button.'";
4474  if (button.length > 0) {
4475  $( "#" + button ).click(function() {
4476  $("#'.$dialogconfirm.'").dialog("open");
4477  });
4478  }
4479  });
4480  });
4481  </script>';
4482  $formconfirm .= "<!-- end ajax formconfirm -->\n";
4483  } else {
4484  $formconfirm .= "\n<!-- begin formconfirm page=".dol_escape_htmltag($page)." -->\n";
4485 
4486  if (empty($disableformtag)) $formconfirm .= '<form method="POST" action="'.$page.'" class="notoptoleftroright">'."\n";
4487 
4488  $formconfirm .= '<input type="hidden" name="action" value="'.$action.'">'."\n";
4489  $formconfirm .= '<input type="hidden" name="token" value="'.newToken().'">'."\n";
4490 
4491  $formconfirm .= '<table class="valid centpercent">'."\n";
4492 
4493  // Line title
4494  $formconfirm .= '<tr class="validtitre"><td class="validtitre" colspan="3">'.img_picto('', 'recent').' '.$title.'</td></tr>'."\n";
4495 
4496  // Line text
4497  if (is_array($formquestion) && !empty($formquestion['text'])) {
4498  $formconfirm .= '<tr class="valid"><td class="valid" colspan="3">'.$formquestion['text'].'</td></tr>'."\n";
4499  }
4500 
4501  // Line form fields
4502  if ($more)
4503  {
4504  $formconfirm .= '<tr class="valid"><td class="valid" colspan="3">'."\n";
4505  $formconfirm .= $more;
4506  $formconfirm .= '</td></tr>'."\n";
4507  }
4508 
4509  // Line with question
4510  $formconfirm .= '<tr class="valid">';
4511  $formconfirm .= '<td class="valid">'.$question.'</td>';
4512  $formconfirm .= '<td class="valid">';
4513  $formconfirm .= $this->selectyesno("confirm", $newselectedchoice);
4514  $formconfirm .= '</td>';
4515  $formconfirm .= '<td class="valid center"><input class="button valignmiddle confirmvalidatebutton" type="submit" value="'.$langs->trans("Validate").'"></td>';
4516  $formconfirm .= '</tr>'."\n";
4517 
4518  $formconfirm .= '</table>'."\n";
4519 
4520  if (empty($disableformtag)) $formconfirm .= "</form>\n";
4521  $formconfirm .= '<br>';
4522 
4523  if (empty($conf->use_javascript_ajax)) {
4524  $formconfirm .= '<!-- code to disable button to avoid double clic -->';
4525  $formconfirm .= '<script type="text/javascript">'."\n";
4526  $formconfirm .= '
4527  $(document).ready(function () {
4528  $(".confirmvalidatebutton").on("click", function() {
4529  console.log("We click on button");
4530  $(this).attr("disabled", "disabled");
4531  setTimeout(\'$(".confirmvalidatebutton").removeAttr("disabled")\', 3000);
4532  //console.log($(this).closest("form"));
4533  $(this).closest("form").submit();
4534  });
4535  });
4536  ';
4537  $formconfirm .= '</script>'."\n";
4538  }
4539 
4540  $formconfirm .= "<!-- end formconfirm -->\n";
4541  }
4542 
4543  return $formconfirm;
4544  }
4545

4547  // phpcs:disable PEAR.NamingConventions.ValidFunctionName.ScopeNotCamelCaps
4561  public function form_project($page, $socid, $selected = '', $htmlname = 'projectid', $discard_closed = 0, $maxlength = 20, $forcefocus = 0, $nooutput = 0)
4562  {
4563  // phpcs:enable
4564  global $langs;
4565 
4566  require_once DOL_DOCUMENT_ROOT.'/core/lib/project.lib.php';
4567  require_once DOL_DOCUMENT_ROOT.'/core/class/html.formprojet.class.php';
4568 
4569  $out = '';
4570 
4571  $formproject = new FormProjets($this->db);
4572 
4573  $langs->load("project");
4574  if ($htmlname != "none")
4575  {
4576  $out .= "\n";
4577  $out .= '<form method="post" action="'.$page.'">';
4578  $out .= '<input type="hidden" name="action" value="classin">';
4579  $out .= '<input type="hidden" name="token" value="'.newToken().'">';
4580  $out .= $formproject->select_projects($socid, $selected, $htmlname, $maxlength, 0, 1, $discard_closed, $forcefocus, 0, 0, '', 1);
4581  $out .= '<input type="submit" class="button smallpaddingimp" value="'.$langs->trans("Modify").'">';
4582  $out .= '</form>';
4583  } else {
4584  if ($selected)
4585  {
4586  $projet = new Project($this->db);
4587  $projet->fetch($selected);
4588  //print '<a href="'.DOL_URL_ROOT.'/projet/card.php?id='.$selected.'">'.$projet->title.'</a>';
4589  $out .= $projet->getNomUrl(0, '', 1);
4590  } else {
4591  $out .= "&nbsp;";
4592  }
4593  }
4594 
4595  if (empty($nooutput))
4596  {
4597  print $out;
4598  return '';
4599  }
4600  return $out;
4601  }

4679  public function formInputReason($page, $selected = '', $htmlname = 'demandreason', $addempty = 0)
4680  {
4681  global $langs;
4682  if ($htmlname != "none")
4683  {
4684  print '<form method="post" action="'.$page.'">';
4685  print '<input type="hidden" name="action" value="setdemandreason">';
4686  print '<input type="hidden" name="token" value="'.newToken().'">';
4687  $this->selectInputReason($selected, $htmlname, -1, $addempty);
4688  print '<input type="submit" class="button smallpaddingimp" value="'.$langs->trans("Modify").'">';
4689  print '</form>';
4690  } else {
4691  if ($selected)
4692  {
4693  $this->loadCacheInputReason();
4694  foreach ($this->cache_demand_reason as $key => $val)
4695  {
4696  if ($val['id'] == $selected)
4697  {
4698  print $val['label'];
4699  break;
4700  }
4701  }
4702  } else {
4703  print "&nbsp;";
4704  }
4705  }
4706  }

4708  // phpcs:disable PEAR.NamingConventions.ValidFunctionName.ScopeNotCamelCaps
4721  public function form_date($page, $selected, $htmlname, $displayhour = 0, $displaymin = 0, $nooutput = 0)
4722  {
4723  // phpcs:enable
4724  global $langs;
4725 
4726  $ret = '';
4727 
4728  if ($htmlname != "none")
4729  {
4730  $ret .= '<form method="post" action="'.$page.'" name="form'.$htmlname.'">';
4731  $ret .= '<input type="hidden" name="action" value="set'.$htmlname.'">';
4732  $ret .= '<input type="hidden" name="token" value="'.newToken().'">';
4733  $ret .= '<table class="nobordernopadding" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0">';
4734  $ret .= '<tr><td>';
4735  $ret .= $this->selectDate($selected, $htmlname, $displayhour, $displaymin, 1, 'form'.$htmlname, 1, 0);
4736  $ret .= '</td>';
4737  $ret .= '<td class="left"><input type="submit" class="button smallpaddingimp" value="'.$langs->trans("Modify").'"></td>';
4738  $ret .= '</tr></table></form>';
4739  } else {
4740  if ($displayhour) $ret .= dol_print_date($selected, 'dayhour');
4741  else $ret .= dol_print_date($selected, 'day');
4742  }
4743 
4744  if (empty($nooutput)) print $ret;
4745  return $ret;
4746  }

4882  // phpcs:disable PEAR.NamingConventions.ValidFunctionName.ScopeNotCamelCaps
4892  public function form_multicurrency_rate($page, $rate = '', $htmlname = 'multicurrency_tx', $currency = '')
4893  {
4894  // phpcs:enable
4895  global $langs, $mysoc, $conf;
4896 
4897  if ($htmlname != "none")
4898  {
4899  print '<form method="POST" action="'.$page.'">';
4900  print '<input type="hidden" name="action" value="setmulticurrencyrate">';
4901  print '<input type="hidden" name="token" value="'.newToken().'">';
4902  print '<input type="text" class="maxwidth100" name="'.$htmlname.'" value="'.(!empty($rate) ? price(price2num($rate, 'CU')) : 1).'" /> ';
4903  print '<select name="calculation_mode">';
4904  print '<option value="1">Change '.$langs->trans("PriceUHT").' of lines</option>';
4905  print '<option value="2">Change '.$langs->trans("PriceUHTCurrency").' of lines</option>';
4906  print '</select> ';
4907  print '<input type="submit" class="button smallpaddingimp valignmiddle" value="'.$langs->trans("Modify").'">';
4908  print '</form>';
4909  } else {
4910  if (!empty($rate))
4911  {
4912  print price($rate, 1, $langs, 1, 0);
4913  if ($currency && $rate != 1) print ' &nbsp; ('.price($rate, 1, $langs, 1, 0).' '.$currency.' = 1 '.$conf->currency.')';
4914  } else {
4915  print 1;
4916  }
4917  }
4918  }
4919 
4920 
4921  // phpcs:disable PEAR.NamingConventions.ValidFunctionName.ScopeNotCamelCaps
4937  public function form_remise_dispo($page, $selected, $htmlname, $socid, $amount, $filter = '', $maxvalue = 0, $more = '', $hidelist = 0, $discount_type = 0)
4938  {
4939  // phpcs:enable
4940  global $conf, $langs;
4941  if ($htmlname != "none")
4942  {
4943  print '<form method="post" action="'.$page.'">';
4944  print '<input type="hidden" name="action" value="setabsolutediscount">';
4945  print '<input type="hidden" name="token" value="'.newToken().'">';
4946  print '<div class="inline-block">';
4947  if (!empty($discount_type)) {
4948  if (!empty($conf->global->FACTURE_DEPOSITS_ARE_JUST_PAYMENTS))
4949  {
4950  if (!$filter || $filter == "fk_invoice_supplier_source IS NULL") $translationKey = 'HasAbsoluteDiscountFromSupplier'; // If we want deposit to be substracted to payments only and not to total of final invoice
4951  else $translationKey = 'HasCreditNoteFromSupplier';
4952  } else {
4953  if (!$filter || $filter == "fk_invoice_supplier_source IS NULL OR (description LIKE '(DEPOSIT)%' AND description NOT LIKE '(EXCESS PAID)%')") $translationKey = 'HasAbsoluteDiscountFromSupplier';
4954  else $translationKey = 'HasCreditNoteFromSupplier';
4955  }
4956  } else {
4957  if (!empty($conf->global->FACTURE_DEPOSITS_ARE_JUST_PAYMENTS))
4958  {
4959  if (!$filter || $filter == "fk_facture_source IS NULL") $translationKey = 'CompanyHasAbsoluteDiscount'; // If we want deposit to be substracted to payments only and not to total of final invoice
4960  else $translationKey = 'CompanyHasCreditNote';
4961  } else {
4962  if (!$filter || $filter == "fk_facture_source IS NULL OR (description LIKE '(DEPOSIT)%' AND description NOT LIKE '(EXCESS RECEIVED)%')") $translationKey = 'CompanyHasAbsoluteDiscount';
4963  else $translationKey = 'CompanyHasCreditNote';
4964  }
4965  }
4966  print $langs->trans($translationKey, price($amount, 0, $langs, 0, 0, -1, $conf->currency));
4967  if (empty($hidelist)) print ': ';
4968  print '</div>';
4969  if (empty($hidelist))
4970  {
4971  print '<div class="inline-block" style="padding-right: 10px">';
4972  $newfilter = 'discount_type='.intval($discount_type);
4973  if (!empty($discount_type)) {
4974  $newfilter .= ' AND fk_invoice_supplier IS NULL AND fk_invoice_supplier_line IS NULL'; // Supplier discounts available
4975  } else {
4976  $newfilter .= ' AND fk_facture IS NULL AND fk_facture_line IS NULL'; // Customer discounts available
4977  }
4978  if ($filter) $newfilter .= ' AND ('.$filter.')';
4979  $nbqualifiedlines = $this->select_remises($selected, $htmlname, $newfilter, $socid, $maxvalue);
4980  if ($nbqualifiedlines > 0)
4981  {
4982  print ' &nbsp; <input type="submit" class="button smallpaddingimp" value="'.dol_escape_htmltag($langs->trans("UseLine")).'"';
4983  if (!empty($discount_type) && $filter && $filter != "fk_invoice_supplier_source IS NULL OR (description LIKE '(DEPOSIT)%' AND description NOT LIKE '(EXCESS PAID)%')")
4984  print ' title="'.$langs->trans("UseCreditNoteInInvoicePayment").'"';
4985  if (empty($discount_type) && $filter && $filter != "fk_facture_source IS NULL OR (description LIKE '(DEPOSIT)%' AND description NOT LIKE '(EXCESS RECEIVED)%')")
4986  print ' title="'.$langs->trans("UseCreditNoteInInvoicePayment").'"';
4987 
4988  print '>';
4989  }
4990  print '</div>';
4991  }
4992  if ($more)
4993  {
4994  print '<div class="inline-block">';
4995  print $more;
4996  print '</div>';
4997  }
4998  print '</form>';
4999  } else {
5000  if ($selected)
5001  {
5002  print $selected;
5003  } else {
5004  print "0";
5005  }
5006  }
5007  }
5008 
5009 
5010  // phpcs:disable PEAR.NamingConventions.ValidFunctionName.ScopeNotCamelCaps
5020  public function form_contacts($page, $societe, $selected = '', $htmlname = 'contactid')
5021  {
5022  // phpcs:enable
5023  global $langs, $conf;
5024 
5025  if ($htmlname != "none")
5026  {
5027  print '<form method="post" action="'.$page.'">';
5028  print '<input type="hidden" name="action" value="set_contact">';
5029  print '<input type="hidden" name="token" value="'.newToken().'">';
5030  print '<table class="nobordernopadding" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0">';
5031  print '<tr><td>';
5032  print $this->selectcontacts($societe->id, $selected, $htmlname);
5033  $num = $this->num;
5034  if ($num == 0)
5035  {
5036  $addcontact = (!empty($conf->global->SOCIETE_ADDRESSES_MANAGEMENT) ? $langs->trans("AddContact") : $langs->trans("AddContactAddress"));
5037  print '<a href="'.DOL_URL_ROOT.'/contact/card.php?socid='.$societe->id.'&amp;action=create&amp;backtoreferer=1">'.$addcontact.'</a>';
5038  }
5039  print '</td>';
5040  print '<td class="left"><input type="submit" class="button smallpaddingimp" value="'.$langs->trans("Modify").'"></td>';
5041  print '</tr></table></form>';
5042  } else {
5043  if ($selected)
5044  {
5045  require_once DOL_DOCUMENT_ROOT.'/contact/class/contact.class.php';
5046  $contact = new Contact($this->db);
5047  $contact->fetch($selected);
5048  print $contact->getFullName($langs);
5049  } else {
5050  print "&nbsp;";
5051  }
5052  }
5053  }
5054 
5055  // phpcs:disable PEAR.NamingConventions.ValidFunctionName.ScopeNotCamelCaps
5070  public function form_thirdparty($page, $selected = '', $htmlname = 'socid', $filter = '', $showempty = 0, $showtype = 0, $forcecombo = 0, $events = array(), $nooutput = 0)
5071  {
5072  // phpcs:enable
5073  global $langs;
5074 
5075  $out = '';
5076  if ($htmlname != "none")
5077  {
5078  $out .= '<form method="post" action="'.$page.'">';
5079  $out .= '<input type="hidden" name="action" value="set_thirdparty">';
5080  $out .= '<input type="hidden" name="token" value="'.newToken().'">';
5081  $out .= $this->select_company($selected, $htmlname, $filter, $showempty, $showtype, $forcecombo, $events);
5082  $out .= '<input type="submit" class="button smallpaddingimp valignmiddle" value="'.$langs->trans("Modify").'">';
5083  $out .= '</form>';
5084  } else {
5085  if ($selected)
5086  {
5087  require_once DOL_DOCUMENT_ROOT.'/societe/class/societe.class.php';
5088  $soc = new Societe($this->db);
5089  $soc->fetch($selected);
5090  $out .= $soc->getNomUrl($langs);
5091  } else {
5092  $out .= "&nbsp;";
5093  }
5094  }
5095 
5096  if ($nooutput) return $out;
5097  else print $out;
5098  }
5099 
5100  // phpcs:disable PEAR.NamingConventions.ValidFunctionName.ScopeNotCamelCaps
5109  public function select_currency($selected = '', $htmlname = 'currency_id')
5110  {
5111  // phpcs:enable
5112  print $this->selectCurrency($selected, $htmlname);
5113  }
5114 
5123  public function selectCurrency($selected = '', $htmlname = 'currency_id', $mode = 0)
5124  {
5125  global $conf, $langs, $user;
5126 
5127  $langs->loadCacheCurrencies('');
5128 
5129  $out = '';
5130 
5131  if ($selected == 'euro' || $selected == 'euros') $selected = 'EUR'; // Pour compatibilite
5132 
5133  $out .= '<select class="flat maxwidth200onsmartphone minwidth300" name="'.$htmlname.'" id="'.$htmlname.'">';
5134  foreach ($langs->cache_currencies as $code_iso => $currency)
5135  {
5136  $labeltoshow = $currency['label'];
5137  if ($mode == 1)
5138  {
5139  $labeltoshow .= ' <span class="opacitymedium">('.$code_iso.')</span>';
5140  } else {
5141  $labeltoshow .= ' <span class="opacitymedium">('.$langs->getCurrencySymbol($code_iso).')</span>';
5142  }
5143 
5144  if ($selected && $selected == $code_iso)
5145  {
5146  $out .= '<option value="'.$code_iso.'" selected data-html="'.dol_escape_htmltag($labeltoshow).'">';
5147  } else {
5148  $out .= '<option value="'.$code_iso.'" data-html="'.dol_escape_htmltag($labeltoshow).'">';
5149  }
5150  $out .= $labeltoshow;
5151  $out .= '</option>';
5152  }
5153  $out .= '</select>';
5154  if ($user->admin) $out .= info_admin($langs->trans("YouCanChangeValuesForThisListFromDictionarySetup"), 1);
5155 
5156  // Make select dynamic
5157  include_once DOL_DOCUMENT_ROOT.'/core/lib/ajax.lib.php';
5158  $out .= ajax_combobox($htmlname);
5159 
5160  return $out;
5161  }
5162 
5173  public function selectMultiCurrency($selected = '', $htmlname = 'multicurrency_code', $useempty = 0, $filter = '', $excludeConfCurrency = false)
5174  {
5175  global $db, $conf, $langs, $user;
5176 
5177  $langs->loadCacheCurrencies(''); // Load ->cache_currencies
5178 
5179  $TCurrency = array();
5180 
5181  $sql = 'SELECT code FROM '.MAIN_DB_PREFIX.'multicurrency';
5182  $sql .= " WHERE entity IN ('".getEntity('mutlicurrency')."')";
5183  if ($filter) $sql .= " AND ".$filter;
5184  $resql = $this->db->query($sql);
5185  if ($resql)
5186  {
5187  while ($obj = $this->db->fetch_object($resql)) $TCurrency[$obj->code] = $obj->code;
5188  }
5189 
5190  $out = '';
5191  $out .= '<select class="flat" name="'.$htmlname.'" id="'.$htmlname.'">';
5192  if ($useempty) $out .= '<option value="">&nbsp;</option>';
5193  // If company current currency not in table, we add it into list. Should always be available.
5194  if (!in_array($conf->currency, $TCurrency) && !$excludeConfCurrency)
5195  {
5196  $TCurrency[$conf->currency] = $conf->currency;
5197  }
5198  if (count($TCurrency) > 0)
5199  {
5200  foreach ($langs->cache_currencies as $code_iso => $currency)
5201  {
5202  if (isset($TCurrency[$code_iso]))
5203  {
5204  if (!empty($selected) && $selected == $code_iso) $out .= '<option value="'.$code_iso.'" selected="selected">';
5205  else $out .= '<option value="'.$code_iso.'">';
5206 
5207  $out .= $currency['label'];
5208  $out .= ' ('.$langs->getCurrencySymbol($code_iso).')';
5209  $out .= '</option>';
5210  }
5211  }
5212  }
5213 
5214  $out .= '</select>';
5215  // Make select dynamic
5216  include_once DOL_DOCUMENT_ROOT.'/core/lib/ajax.lib.php';
5217  $out .= ajax_combobox($htmlname);
5218 
5219  return $out;
5220  }
5221 
5222  // phpcs:disable PEAR.NamingConventions.ValidFunctionName.ScopeNotCamelCaps
5229  public function load_cache_vatrates($country_code)
5230  {
5231  // phpcs:enable
5232  global $langs;
5233 
5234  $num = count($this->cache_vatrates);
5235  if ($num > 0) return $num; // Cache already loaded
5236 
5237  dol_syslog(__METHOD__, LOG_DEBUG);
5238 
5239  $sql = "SELECT DISTINCT t.rowid, t.code, t.taux, t.localtax1, t.localtax1_type, t.localtax2, t.localtax2_type, t.recuperableonly";
5240  $sql .= " FROM ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX."c_tva as t, ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX."c_country as c";
5241  $sql .= " WHERE t.fk_pays = c.rowid";
5242  $sql .= " AND t.active > 0";
5243  $sql .= " AND c.code IN (".$country_code.")";
5244  $sql .= " ORDER BY t.code ASC, t.taux ASC, t.recuperableonly ASC";
5245 
5246  $resql = $this->db->query($sql);
5247  if ($resql)
5248  {
5249  $num = $this->db->num_rows($resql);
5250  if ($num)
5251  {
5252  for ($i = 0; $i < $num; $i++)
5253  {
5254  $obj = $this->db->fetch_object($resql);
5255  $this->cache_vatrates[$i]['rowid'] = $obj->rowid;
5256  $this->cache_vatrates[$i]['code'] = $obj->code;
5257  $this->cache_vatrates[$i]['txtva'] = $obj->taux;
5258  $this->cache_vatrates[$i]['nprtva'] = $obj->recuperableonly;
5259  $this->cache_vatrates[$i]['localtax1'] = $obj->localtax1;
5260  $this->cache_vatrates[$i]['localtax1_type'] = $obj->localtax1_type;
5261  $this->cache_vatrates[$i]['localtax2'] = $obj->localtax2;
5262  $this->cache_vatrates[$i]['localtax2_type'] = $obj->localtax1_type;
5263 
5264  $this->cache_vatrates[$i]['label'] = $obj->taux.'%'.($obj->code ? ' ('.$obj->code.')' : ''); // Label must contains only 0-9 , . % or *
5265  $this->cache_vatrates[$i]['labelallrates'] = $obj->taux.'/'.($obj->localtax1 ? $obj->localtax1 : '0').'/'.($obj->localtax2 ? $obj->localtax2 : '0').($obj->code ? ' ('.$obj->code.')' : ''); // Must never be used as key, only label
5266  $positiverates = '';
5267  if ($obj->taux) $positiverates .= ($positiverates ? '/' : '').$obj->taux;
5268  if ($obj->localtax1) $positiverates .= ($positiverates ? '/' : '').$obj->localtax1;
5269  if ($obj->localtax2) $positiverates .= ($positiverates ? '/' : '').$obj->localtax2;
5270  if (empty($positiverates)) $positiverates = '0';
5271  $this->cache_vatrates[$i]['labelpositiverates'] = $positiverates.($obj->code ? ' ('.$obj->code.')' : ''); // Must never be used as key, only label
5272  }
5273 
5274  return $num;
5275  } else {
5276  $this->error = '<font class="error">'.$langs->trans("ErrorNoVATRateDefinedForSellerCountry", $country_code).'</font>';
5277  return -1;
5278  }
5279  } else {
5280  $this->error = '<font class="error">'.$this->db->error().'</font>';
5281  return -2;
5282  }
5283  }
5284 
5285  // phpcs:disable PEAR.NamingConventions.ValidFunctionName.ScopeNotCamelCaps
5307  public function load_tva($htmlname = 'tauxtva', $selectedrate = '', $societe_vendeuse = '', $societe_acheteuse = '', $idprod = 0, $info_bits = 0, $type = '', $options_only = false, $mode = 0)
5308  {
5309  // phpcs:enable
5310  global $langs, $conf, $mysoc;
5311 
5312  $langs->load('errors');
5313 
5314  $return = '';
5315 
5316  // Define defaultnpr, defaultttx and defaultcode
5317  $defaultnpr = ($info_bits & 0x01);
5318  $defaultnpr = (preg_match('/\*/', $selectedrate) ? 1 : $defaultnpr);
5319  $defaulttx = str_replace('*', '', $selectedrate);
5320  $defaultcode = '';
5321  if (preg_match('/\((.*)\)/', $defaulttx, $reg))
5322  {
5323  $defaultcode = $reg[1];
5324  $defaulttx = preg_replace('/\s*\(.*\)/', '', $defaulttx);
5325  }
5326  //var_dump($selectedrate.'-'.$defaulttx.'-'.$defaultnpr.'-'.$defaultcode);
5327 
5328  // Check parameters
5329  if (is_object($societe_vendeuse) && !$societe_vendeuse->country_code)
5330  {
5331  if ($societe_vendeuse->id == $mysoc->id)
5332  {
5333  $return .= '<font class="error">'.$langs->trans("ErrorYourCountryIsNotDefined").'</font>';
5334  } else {
5335  $return .= '<font class="error">'.$langs->trans("ErrorSupplierCountryIsNotDefined").'</font>';
5336  }
5337  return $return;
5338  }
5339 
5340  //var_dump($societe_acheteuse);
5341  //print "name=$name, selectedrate=$selectedrate, seller=".$societe_vendeuse->country_code." buyer=".$societe_acheteuse->country_code." buyer is company=".$societe_acheteuse->isACompany()." idprod=$idprod, info_bits=$info_bits type=$type";
5342  //exit;
5343 
5344  // Define list of countries to use to search VAT rates to show
5345  // First we defined code_country to use to find list
5346  if (is_object($societe_vendeuse))
5347  {
5348  $code_country = "'".$societe_vendeuse->country_code."'";
5349  } else {
5350  $code_country = "'".$mysoc->country_code."'"; // Pour compatibilite ascendente
5351  }
5352  if (!empty($conf->global->SERVICE_ARE_ECOMMERCE_200238EC)) // If option to have vat for end customer for services is on
5353  {
5354  require_once DOL_DOCUMENT_ROOT.'/core/lib/company.lib.php';
5355  if (!isInEEC($societe_vendeuse) && (!is_object($societe_acheteuse) || (isInEEC($societe_acheteuse) && !$societe_acheteuse->isACompany())))
5356  {
5357  // We also add the buyer
5358  if (is_numeric($type))
5359  {
5360  if ($type == 1) // We know product is a service
5361  {
5362  $code_country .= ",'".$societe_acheteuse->country_code."'";
5363  }
5364  } elseif (!$idprod) // We don't know type of product
5365  {
5366  $code_country .= ",'".$societe_acheteuse->country_code."'";
5367  } else {
5368  $prodstatic = new Product($this->db);
5369  $prodstatic->fetch($idprod);
5370  if ($prodstatic->type == Product::TYPE_SERVICE) // We know product is a service
5371  {
5372  $code_country .= ",'".$societe_acheteuse->country_code."'";
5373  }
5374  }
5375  }
5376  }
5377 
5378  // Now we get list
5379  $num = $this->load_cache_vatrates($code_country); // If no vat defined, return -1 with message into this->error
5380 
5381  if ($num > 0)
5382  {
5383  // Definition du taux a pre-selectionner (si defaulttx non force et donc vaut -1 ou '')
5384  if ($defaulttx < 0 || dol_strlen($defaulttx) == 0)
5385  {
5386  $tmpthirdparty = new Societe($this->db);
5387  $defaulttx = get_default_tva($societe_vendeuse, (is_object($societe_acheteuse) ? $societe_acheteuse : $tmpthirdparty), $idprod);
5388  $defaultnpr = get_default_npr($societe_vendeuse, (is_object($societe_acheteuse) ? $societe_acheteuse : $tmpthirdparty), $idprod);
5389  if (preg_match('/\((.*)\)/', $defaulttx, $reg)) {
5390  $defaultcode = $reg[1];
5391  $defaulttx = preg_replace('/\s*\(.*\)/', '', $defaulttx);
5392  }
5393  if (empty($defaulttx)) $defaultnpr = 0;
5394  }
5395 
5396  // Si taux par defaut n'a pu etre determine, on prend dernier de la liste.
5397  // Comme ils sont tries par ordre croissant, dernier = plus eleve = taux courant
5398  if ($defaulttx < 0 || dol_strlen($defaulttx) == 0)
5399  {
5400  if (empty($conf->global->MAIN_VAT_DEFAULT_IF_AUTODETECT_FAILS)) $defaulttx = $this->cache_vatrates[$num - 1]['txtva'];
5401  else $defaulttx = ($conf->global->MAIN_VAT_DEFAULT_IF_AUTODETECT_FAILS == 'none' ? '' : $conf->global->MAIN_VAT_DEFAULT_IF_AUTODETECT_FAILS);
5402  }
5403 
5404  // Disabled if seller is not subject to VAT
5405  $disabled = false; $title = '';
5406  if (is_object($societe_vendeuse) && $societe_vendeuse->id == $mysoc->id && $societe_vendeuse->tva_assuj == "0")
5407  {
5408  // Override/enable VAT for expense report regardless of global setting - needed if expense report used for business expenses instead
5409  // of using supplier invoices (this is a very bad idea !)
5410  if (empty($conf->global->EXPENSEREPORT_OVERRIDE_VAT))
5411  {
5412  $title = ' title="'.$langs->trans('VATIsNotUsed').'"';
5413  $disabled = true;
5414  }
5415  }
5416 
5417  if (!$options_only) $return .= '<select class="flat minwidth75imp" id="'.$htmlname.'" name="'.$htmlname.'"'.($disabled ? ' disabled' : '').$title.'>';
5418 
5419  $selectedfound = false;
5420  foreach ($this->cache_vatrates as $rate)
5421  {
5422  // Keep only 0 if seller is not subject to VAT
5423  if ($disabled && $rate['txtva'] != 0) continue;
5424 
5425  // Define key to use into select list
5426  $key = $rate['txtva'];
5427  $key .= $rate['nprtva'] ? '*' : '';
5428  if ($mode > 0 && $rate['code']) $key .= ' ('.$rate['code'].')';
5429  if ($mode < 0) $key = $rate['rowid'];
5430 
5431  $return .= '<option value="'.$key.'"';
5432  if (!$selectedfound)
5433  {
5434  if ($defaultcode) // If defaultcode is defined, we used it in priority to select combo option instead of using rate+npr flag
5435  {
5436  if ($defaultcode == $rate['code'])
5437  {
5438  $return .= ' selected';
5439  $selectedfound = true;
5440  }
5441  } elseif ($rate['txtva'] == $defaulttx && $rate['nprtva'] == $defaultnpr)
5442  {
5443  $return .= ' selected';
5444  $selectedfound = true;
5445  }
5446  }
5447  $return .= '>';
5448  //if (! empty($conf->global->MAIN_VAT_SHOW_POSITIVE_RATES))
5449  if ($mysoc->country_code == 'IN' || !empty($conf->global->MAIN_VAT_LABEL_IS_POSITIVE_RATES))
5450  {
5451  $return .= $rate['labelpositiverates'];
5452  } else {
5453  $return .= vatrate($rate['label']);
5454  }
5455  //$return.=($rate['code']?' '.$rate['code']:'');
5456  $return .= (empty($rate['code']) && $rate['nprtva']) ? ' *' : ''; // We show the * (old behaviour only if new vat code is not used)
5457 
5458  $return .= '</option>';
5459  }
5460 
5461  if (!$options_only) $return .= '</select>';
5462  } else {
5463  $return .= $this->error;
5464  }
5465 
5466  $this->num = $num;
5467  return $return;
5468  }
5469 
5470 
5471  // phpcs:disable PEAR.NamingConventions.ValidFunctionName.ScopeNotCamelCaps
5496  public function select_date($set_time = '', $prefix = 're', $h = 0, $m = 0, $empty = 0, $form_name = "", $d = 1, $addnowlink = 0, $nooutput = 0, $disabled = 0, $fullday = '', $addplusone = '', $adddateof = '')
5497  {
5498  // phpcs:enable
5499  $retstring = $this->selectDate($set_time, $prefix, $h, $m, $empty, $form_name, $d, $addnowlink, $disabled, $fullday, $addplusone, $adddateof);
5500  if (!empty($nooutput)) {
5501  return $retstring;
5502  }
5503  print $retstring;
5504  return;
5505  }
5506 
5521  public function selectDateToDate($set_time = '', $set_time_end = '', $prefix = 're', $empty = 0)
5522  {
5523  global $langs;
5524 
5525  $ret = $this->selectDate($set_time, $prefix.'_start', 0, 0, $empty, '', 1, 0, 0, '', '', '', '', 1, '', $langs->trans("from"), 'tzuserrel');
5526  $ret .= '<br>';
5527  $ret .= $this->selectDate($set_time_end, $prefix.'_end', 0, 0, $empty, '', 1, 0, 0, '', '', '', '', 1, '', $langs->trans("to"), 'tzuserrel');
5528  return $ret;
5529  }
5530 
5558  public function selectDate($set_time = '', $prefix = 're', $h = 0, $m = 0, $empty = 0, $form_name = "", $d = 1, $addnowlink = 0, $disabled = 0, $fullday = '', $addplusone = '', $adddateof = '', $openinghours = '', $stepminutes = 1, $labeladddateof = '', $placeholder = '', $gm = 'auto')
5559  {
5560  global $conf, $langs;
5561 
5562  if ($gm === 'auto') {
5563  $gm = (empty($conf) ? 'tzserver' : $conf->tzuserinputkey);
5564  }
5565 
5566  $retstring = '';
5567 
5568  if ($prefix == '') $prefix = 're';
5569  if ($h == '') $h = 0;
5570  if ($m == '') $m = 0;
5571  $emptydate = 0;
5572  $emptyhours = 0;
5573  if ($stepminutes <= 0 || $stepminutes > 30) $stepminutes = 1;
5574  if ($empty == 1) { $emptydate = 1; $emptyhours = 1; }
5575  if ($empty == 2) { $emptydate = 0; $emptyhours = 1; }
5576  $orig_set_time = $set_time;
5577 
5578  if ($set_time === '' && $emptydate == 0)
5579  {
5580  include_once DOL_DOCUMENT_ROOT.'/core/lib/date.lib.php';
5581  if ($gm == 'tzuser' || $gm == 'tzuserrel') {
5582  $set_time = dol_now($gm);
5583  } else {
5584  $set_time = dol_now('tzuser') - (getServerTimeZoneInt('now') * 3600); // set_time must be relative to PHP server timezone
5585  }
5586  }
5587 
5588  // Analysis of the pre-selection date
5589  $reg = array();
5590  if (preg_match('/^([0-9]+)\-([0-9]+)\-([0-9]+)\s?([0-9]+)?:?([0-9]+)?/', $set_time, $reg)) // deprecated usage
5591  {
5592  // Date format 'YYYY-MM-DD' or 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS'
5593  $syear = (!empty($reg[1]) ? $reg[1] : '');
5594  $smonth = (!empty($reg[2]) ? $reg[2] : '');
5595  $sday = (!empty($reg[3]) ? $reg[3] : '');
5596  $shour = (!empty($reg[4]) ? $reg[4] : '');
5597  $smin = (!empty($reg[5]) ? $reg[5] : '');
5598  } elseif (strval($set_time) != '' && $set_time != -1)
5599  {
5600  // set_time est un timestamps (0 possible)
5601  $syear = dol_print_date($set_time, "%Y", $gm);
5602  $smonth = dol_print_date($set_time, "%m", $gm);
5603  $sday = dol_print_date($set_time, "%d", $gm);
5604  if ($orig_set_time != '')
5605  {
5606  $shour = dol_print_date($set_time, "%H", $gm);
5607  $smin = dol_print_date($set_time, "%M", $gm);
5608  $ssec = dol_print_date($set_time, "%S", $gm);
5609  } else {
5610  $shour = '';
5611  $smin = '';
5612  $ssec = '';
5613  }
5614  } else {
5615  // Date est '' ou vaut -1
5616  $syear = '';
5617  $smonth = '';
5618  $sday = '';
5619  $shour = !isset($conf->global->MAIN_DEFAULT_DATE_HOUR) ? ($h == -1 ? '23' : '') : $conf->global->MAIN_DEFAULT_DATE_HOUR;
5620  $smin = !isset($conf->global->MAIN_DEFAULT_DATE_MIN) ? ($h == -1 ? '59' : '') : $conf->global->MAIN_DEFAULT_DATE_MIN;
5621  $ssec = !isset($conf->global->MAIN_DEFAULT_DATE_SEC) ? ($h == -1 ? '59' : '') : $conf->global->MAIN_DEFAULT_DATE_SEC;
5622  }
5623  if ($h == 3) $shour = '';
5624  if ($m == 3) $smin = '';
5625 
5626  $nowgmt = dol_now('gmt');
5627  //var_dump(dol_print_date($nowgmt, 'dayhourinputnoreduce', 'tzuserrel'));
5628 
5629  // You can set MAIN_POPUP_CALENDAR to 'eldy' or 'jquery'
5630  $usecalendar = 'combo';
5631  if (!empty($conf->use_javascript_ajax) && (empty($conf->global->MAIN_POPUP_CALENDAR) || $conf->global->MAIN_POPUP_CALENDAR != "none")) {
5632  $usecalendar = ((empty($conf->global->MAIN_POPUP_CALENDAR) || $conf->global->MAIN_POPUP_CALENDAR == 'eldy') ? 'jquery' : $conf->global->MAIN_POPUP_CALENDAR);
5633  }
5634 
5635  if ($d)
5636  {
5637  // Show date with popup
5638  if ($usecalendar != 'combo')
5639  {
5640  $formated_date = '';
5641  //print "e".$set_time." t ".$conf->format_date_short;
5642  if (strval($set_time) != '' && $set_time != -1)
5643  {
5644  //$formated_date=dol_print_date($set_time,$conf->format_date_short);
5645  $formated_date = dol_print_date($set_time, $langs->trans("FormatDateShortInput"), $gm); // FormatDateShortInput for dol_print_date / FormatDateShortJavaInput that is same for javascript
5646  }
5647 
5648  // Calendrier popup version eldy
5649  if ($usecalendar == "eldy")
5650  {
5651  // Input area to enter date manually
5652  $retstring .= '<input id="'.$prefix.'" name="'.$prefix.'" type="text" class="maxwidthdate" maxlength="11" value="'.$formated_date.'"';
5653  $retstring .= ($disabled ? ' disabled' : '');
5654  $retstring .= ' onChange="dpChangeDay(\''.$prefix.'\',\''.$langs->trans("FormatDateShortJavaInput").'\'); "'; // FormatDateShortInput for dol_print_date / FormatDateShortJavaInput that is same for javascript
5655  $retstring .= '>';
5656 
5657  // Icon calendar
5658  if (!$disabled)
5659  {
5660  $retstring .= '<button id="'.$prefix.'Button" type="button" class="dpInvisibleButtons"';
5661  $base = DOL_URL_ROOT.'/core/';
5662  $retstring .= ' onClick="showDP(\''.$base.'\',\''.$prefix.'\',\''.$langs->trans("FormatDateShortJavaInput").'\',\''.$langs->defaultlang.'\');"';
5663  $retstring .= '>'.img_object($langs->trans("SelectDate"), 'calendarday', 'class="datecallink"').'</button>';
5664  } else $retstring .= '<button id="'.$prefix.'Button" type="button" class="dpInvisibleButtons">'.img_object($langs->trans("Disabled"), 'calendarday', 'class="datecallink"').'</button>';
5665 
5666  $retstring .= '<input type="hidden" id="'.$prefix.'day" name="'.$prefix.'day" value="'.$sday.'">'."\n";
5667  $retstring .= '<input type="hidden" id="'.$prefix.'month" name="'.$prefix.'month" value="'.$smonth.'">'."\n";
5668  $retstring .= '<input type="hidden" id="'.$prefix.'year" name="'.$prefix.'year" value="'.$syear.'">'."\n";
5669  } elseif ($usecalendar == 'jquery')
5670  {
5671  if (!$disabled)
5672  {
5673  // Output javascript for datepicker
5674  $retstring .= "<script type='text/javascript'>";
5675  $retstring .= "$(function(){ $('#".$prefix."').datepicker({
5676  dateFormat: '".$langs->trans("FormatDateShortJQueryInput")."',
5677  autoclose: true,
5678  todayHighlight: true,";
5679  if (!empty($conf->dol_use_jmobile))
5680  {
5681  $retstring .= "
5682  beforeShow: function (input, datePicker) {
5683  input.disabled = true;
5684  },
5685  onClose: function (dateText, datePicker) {
5686  this.disabled = false;
5687  },
5688  ";
5689  }
5690  // Note: We don't need monthNames, monthNamesShort, dayNames, dayNamesShort, dayNamesMin, they are set globally on datepicker component in lib_head.js.php
5691  if (empty($conf->global->MAIN_POPUP_CALENDAR_ON_FOCUS))
5692  {
5693  $retstring .= "
5694  showOn: 'button',
5695  buttonImage: '".DOL_URL_ROOT."/theme/".$conf->theme."/img/object_calendarday.png',
5696  buttonImageOnly: true";
5697  }
5698  $retstring .= "
5699  }) });";
5700  $retstring .= "</script>";
5701  }
5702 
5703  // Zone de saisie manuelle de la date
5704  $retstring .= '<div class="nowrap inline-block">';
5705  $retstring .= '<input id="'.$prefix.'" name="'.$prefix.'" type="text" class="maxwidthdate" maxlength="11" value="'.$formated_date.'"';
5706  $retstring .= ($disabled ? ' disabled' : '');
5707  $retstring .= ($placeholder ? ' placeholder="'.$placeholder.'"' : '');
5708  $retstring .= ' onChange="dpChangeDay(\''.$prefix.'\',\''.$langs->trans("FormatDateShortJavaInput").'\'); "'; // FormatDateShortInput for dol_print_date / FormatDateShortJavaInput that is same for javascript
5709  $retstring .= '>';
5710 
5711  // Icone calendrier
5712  if (!$disabled)
5713  {
5714  /* Not required. Managed by option buttonImage of jquery
5715  $retstring.=img_object($langs->trans("SelectDate"),'calendarday','id="'.$prefix.'id" class="datecallink"');
5716  $retstring.="<script type='text/javascript'>";
5717  $retstring.="jQuery(document).ready(function() {";
5718  $retstring.=' jQuery("#'.$prefix.'id").click(function() {';
5719  $retstring.=" jQuery('#".$prefix."').focus();";
5720  $retstring.=' });';
5721  $retstring.='});';
5722  $retstring.="</script>";*/
5723  } else {
5724  $retstring .= '<button id="'.$prefix.'Button" type="button" class="dpInvisibleButtons">'.img_object($langs->trans("Disabled"), 'calendarday', 'class="datecallink"').'</button>';
5725  }
5726 
5727  $retstring .= '</div>';
5728  $retstring .= '<input type="hidden" id="'.$prefix.'day" name="'.$prefix.'day" value="'.$sday.'">'."\n";
5729  $retstring .= '<input type="hidden" id="'.$prefix.'month" name="'.$prefix.'month" value="'.$smonth.'">'."\n";
5730  $retstring .= '<input type="hidden" id="'.$prefix.'year" name="'.$prefix.'year" value="'.$syear.'">'."\n";
5731  } else {
5732  $retstring .= "Bad value of MAIN_POPUP_CALENDAR";
5733  }
5734  }
5735  // Show date with combo selects
5736  else {
5737  // Day
5738  $retstring .= '<select'.($disabled ? ' disabled' : '').' class="flat valignmiddle maxwidth50imp" id="'.$prefix.'day" name="'.$prefix.'day">';
5739 
5740  if ($emptydate || $set_time == -1)
5741  {
5742  $retstring .= '<option value="0" selected>&nbsp;</option>';
5743  }
5744 
5745  for ($day = 1; $day <= 31; $day++)
5746  {
5747  $retstring .= '<option value="'.$day.'"'.($day == $sday ? ' selected' : '').'>'.$day.'</option>';
5748  }
5749 
5750  $retstring .= "</select>";
5751 
5752  $retstring .= '<select'.($disabled ? ' disabled' : '').' class="flat valignmiddle maxwidth75imp" id="'.$prefix.'month" name="'.$prefix.'month">';
5753  if ($emptydate || $set_time == -1)
5754  {
5755  $retstring .= '<option value="0" selected>&nbsp;</option>';
5756  }
5757 
5758  // Month
5759  for ($month = 1; $month <= 12; $month++)
5760  {
5761  $retstring .= '<option value="'.$month.'"'.($month == $smonth ? ' selected' : '').'>';
5762  $retstring .= dol_print_date(mktime(12, 0, 0, $month, 1, 2000), "%b");
5763  $retstring .= "</option>";
5764  }
5765  $retstring .= "</select>";
5766 
5767  // Year
5768  if ($emptydate || $set_time == -1)
5769  {
5770  $retstring .= '<input'.($disabled ? ' disabled' : '').' placeholder="'.dol_escape_htmltag($langs->trans("Year")).'" class="flat maxwidth50imp valignmiddle" type="number" min="0" max="3000" maxlength="4" id="'.$prefix.'year" name="'.$prefix.'year" value="'.$syear.'">';
5771  } else {
5772  $retstring .= '<select'.($disabled ? ' disabled' : '').' class="flat valignmiddle maxwidth75imp" id="'.$prefix.'year" name="'.$prefix.'year">';
5773 
5774  for ($year = $syear - 10; $year < $syear + 10; $year++)
5775  {
5776  $retstring .= '<option value="'.$year.'"'.($year == $syear ? ' selected' : '').'>'.$year.'</option>';
5777  }
5778  $retstring .= "</select>\n";
5779  }
5780  }
5781  }
5782 
5783  if ($d && $h) {
5784  $retstring .= ($h == 2 ? '<br>' : ' ');
5785  $retstring .= '<span class="nowraponall">';
5786  }
5787 
5788  if ($h)
5789  {
5790  $hourstart = 0;
5791  $hourend = 24;
5792  if ($openinghours != '') {
5793  $openinghours = explode(',', $openinghours);
5794  $hourstart = $openinghours[0];
5795  $hourend = $openinghours[1];
5796  if ($hourend < $hourstart) $hourend = $hourstart;
5797  }
5798  // Show hour
5799  $retstring .= '<select'.($disabled ? ' disabled' : '').' class="flat valignmiddle maxwidth50 '.($fullday ? $fullday.'hour' : '').'" id="'.$prefix.'hour" name="'.$prefix.'hour">';
5800  if ($emptyhours) $retstring .= '<option value="-1">&nbsp;</option>';
5801  for ($hour = $hourstart; $hour < $hourend; $hour++)
5802  {
5803  if (strlen($hour) < 2) $hour = "0".$hour;
5804  $retstring .= '<option value="'.$hour.'"'.(($hour == $shour) ? ' selected' : '').'>'.$hour;
5805  //$retstring .= (empty($conf->dol_optimize_smallscreen) ? '' : 'H');
5806  $retstring .= '</option>';
5807  }
5808  $retstring .= '</select>';
5809  //if ($m && empty($conf->dol_optimize_smallscreen)) $retstring .= ":";
5810  if ($m) $retstring .= ":";
5811  }
5812 
5813  if ($m)
5814  {
5815  // Show minutes
5816  $retstring .= '<select'.($disabled ? ' disabled' : '').' class="flat valignmiddle maxwidth50 '.($fullday ? $fullday.'min' : '').'" id="'.$prefix.'min" name="'.$prefix.'min">';
5817  if ($emptyhours) $retstring .= '<option value="-1">&nbsp;</option>';
5818  for ($min = 0; $min < 60; $min += $stepminutes)
5819  {
5820  if (strlen($min) < 2) $min = "0".$min;
5821  $retstring .= '<option value="'.$min.'"'.(($min == $smin) ? ' selected' : '').'>'.$min.(empty($conf->dol_optimize_smallscreen) ? '' : '').'</option>';
5822  }
5823  $retstring .= '</select>';
5824 
5825  $retstring .= '<input type="hidden" name="'.$prefix.'sec" value="'.$ssec.'">';
5826  }
5827 
5828  if ($d && $h) {
5829  $retstring .= '</span>';
5830  }
5831 
5832  // Add a "Now" link
5833  if ($conf->use_javascript_ajax && $addnowlink)
5834  {
5835  // Script which will be inserted in the onClick of the "Now" link
5836  $reset_scripts = "";
5837  if ($addnowlink == 2) { // local computer time
5838  // pad add leading 0 on numbers
5839  $reset_scripts .= "Number.prototype.pad = function(size) {
5840  var s = String(this);
5841  while (s.length < (size || 2)) {s = '0' + s;}
5842  return s;
5843  };
5844  var d = new Date();";
5845  }
5846 
5847  // Generate the date part, depending on the use or not of the javascript calendar
5848  if ($addnowlink == 1) { // server time expressed in user time setup
5849  $reset_scripts .= 'jQuery(\'#'.$prefix.'\').val(\''.dol_print_date($nowgmt, 'day', 'tzuserrel').'\');';
5850  $reset_scripts .= 'jQuery(\'#'.$prefix.'day\').val(\''.dol_print_date($nowgmt, '%d', 'tzuserrel').'\');';
5851  $reset_scripts .= 'jQuery(\'#'.$prefix.'month\').val(\''.dol_print_date($nowgmt, '%m', 'tzuserrel').'\');';
5852  $reset_scripts .= 'jQuery(\'#'.$prefix.'year\').val(\''.dol_print_date($nowgmt, '%Y', 'tzuserrel').'\');';
5853  } elseif ($addnowlink == 2) {
5854  /* Disabled because the output does not use the string format defined by FormatDateShort key to forge the value into #prefix.
5855  * This break application for foreign languages.
5856  $reset_scripts .= 'jQuery(\'#'.$prefix.'\').val(d.toLocaleDateString(\''.str_replace('_', '-', $langs->defaultlang).'\'));';
5857  $reset_scripts .= 'jQuery(\'#'.$prefix.'day\').val(d.getDate().pad());';
5858  $reset_scripts .= 'jQuery(\'#'.$prefix.'month\').val(parseInt(d.getMonth().pad()) + 1);';
5859  $reset_scripts .= 'jQuery(\'#'.$prefix.'year\').val(d.getFullYear());';
5860  */
5861  $reset_scripts .= 'jQuery(\'#'.$prefix.'\').val(\''.dol_print_date($nowgmt, 'day', 'tzuserrel').'\');';
5862  $reset_scripts .= 'jQuery(\'#'.$prefix.'day\').val(\''.dol_print_date($nowgmt, '%d', 'tzuserrel').'\');';
5863  $reset_scripts .= 'jQuery(\'#'.$prefix.'month\').val(\''.dol_print_date($nowgmt, '%m', 'tzuserrel').'\');';
5864  $reset_scripts .= 'jQuery(\'#'.$prefix.'year\').val(\''.dol_print_date($nowgmt, '%Y', 'tzuserrel').'\');';
5865  }
5866  /*if ($usecalendar == "eldy")
5867  {
5868  $base=DOL_URL_ROOT.'/core/';
5869  $reset_scripts .= 'resetDP(\''.$base.'\',\''.$prefix.'\',\''.$langs->trans("FormatDateShortJavaInput").'\',\''.$langs->defaultlang.'\');';
5870  }
5871  else
5872  {
5873  $reset_scripts .= 'this.form.elements[\''.$prefix.'day\'].value=formatDate(new Date(), \'d\'); ';
5874  $reset_scripts .= 'this.form.elements[\''.$prefix.'month\'].value=formatDate(new Date(), \'M\'); ';
5875  $reset_scripts .= 'this.form.elements[\''.$prefix.'year\'].value=formatDate(new Date(), \'yyyy\'); ';
5876  }*/
5877  // Update the hour part
5878  if ($h)
5879  {
5880  if ($fullday) $reset_scripts .= " if (jQuery('#fullday:checked').val() == null) {";
5881  //$reset_scripts .= 'this.form.elements[\''.$prefix.'hour\'].value=formatDate(new Date(), \'HH\'); ';
5882  if ($addnowlink == 1)
5883  {
5884  $reset_scripts .= 'jQuery(\'#'.$prefix.'hour\').val(\''.dol_print_date($nowgmt, '%H', 'tzuserrel').'\');';
5885  $reset_scripts .= 'jQuery(\'#'.$prefix.'hour\').change();';
5886  } elseif ($addnowlink == 2)
5887  {
5888  $reset_scripts .= 'jQuery(\'#'.$prefix.'hour\').val(d.getHours().pad());';
5889  $reset_scripts .= 'jQuery(\'#'.$prefix.'hour\').change();';
5890  }
5891 
5892  if ($fullday) $reset_scripts .= ' } ';
5893  }
5894  // Update the minute part
5895  if ($m)
5896  {
5897  if ($fullday) $reset_scripts .= " if (jQuery('#fullday:checked').val() == null) {";
5898  //$reset_scripts .= 'this.form.elements[\''.$prefix.'min\'].value=formatDate(new Date(), \'mm\'); ';
5899  if ($addnowlink == 1)
5900  {
5901  $reset_scripts .= 'jQuery(\'#'.$prefix.'min\').val(\''.dol_print_date($nowgmt, '%M', 'tzuserrel').'\');';
5902  $reset_scripts .= 'jQuery(\'#'.$prefix.'min\').change();';
5903  } elseif ($addnowlink == 2)
5904  {
5905  $reset_scripts .= 'jQuery(\'#'.$prefix.'min\').val(d.getMinutes().pad());';
5906  $reset_scripts .= 'jQuery(\'#'.$prefix.'min\').change();';
5907  }
5908  if ($fullday) $reset_scripts .= ' } ';
5909  }
5910  // If reset_scripts is not empty, print the link with the reset_scripts in the onClick
5911  if ($reset_scripts && empty($conf->dol_optimize_smallscreen))
5912  {
5913  $retstring .= ' <button class="dpInvisibleButtons datenowlink" id="'.$prefix.'ButtonNow" type="button" name="_useless" value="now" onClick="'.$reset_scripts.'">';
5914  $retstring .= $langs->trans("Now");
5915  $retstring .= '</button> ';
5916  }
5917  }
5918 
5919  // Add a "Plus one hour" link
5920  if ($conf->use_javascript_ajax && $addplusone)
5921  {
5922  // Script which will be inserted in the onClick of the "Add plusone" link
5923  $reset_scripts = "";
5924 
5925  // Generate the date part, depending on the use or not of the javascript calendar
5926  $reset_scripts .= 'jQuery(\'#'.$prefix.'\').val(\''.dol_print_date($nowgmt, 'dayinputnoreduce', 'tzuserrel').'\');';
5927  $reset_scripts .= 'jQuery(\'#'.$prefix.'day\').val(\''.dol_print_date($nowgmt, '%d', 'tzuserrel').'\');';
5928  $reset_scripts .= 'jQuery(\'#'.$prefix.'month\').val(\''.dol_print_date($nowgmt, '%m', 'tzuserrel').'\');';
5929  $reset_scripts .= 'jQuery(\'#'.$prefix.'year\').val(\''.dol_print_date($nowgmt, '%Y', 'tzuserrel').'\');';
5930  // Update the hour part
5931  if ($h)
5932  {
5933  if ($fullday) $reset_scripts .= " if (jQuery('#fullday:checked').val() == null) {";
5934  $reset_scripts .= 'jQuery(\'#'.$prefix.'hour\').val(\''.dol_print_date($nowgmt, '%H', 'tzuserrel').'\');';
5935  if ($fullday) $reset_scripts .= ' } ';
5936  }
5937  // Update the minute part
5938  if ($m)
5939  {
5940  if ($fullday) $reset_scripts .= " if (jQuery('#fullday:checked').val() == null) {";
5941  $reset_scripts .= 'jQuery(\'#'.$prefix.'min\').val(\''.dol_print_date($nowgmt, '%M', 'tzuserrel').'\');';
5942  if ($fullday) $reset_scripts .= ' } ';
5943  }
5944  // If reset_scripts is not empty, print the link with the reset_scripts in the onClick
5945  if ($reset_scripts && empty($conf->dol_optimize_smallscreen))
5946  {
5947  $retstring .= ' <button class="dpInvisibleButtons datenowlink" id="'.$prefix.'ButtonPlusOne" type="button" name="_useless2" value="plusone" onClick="'.$reset_scripts.'">';
5948  $retstring .= $langs->trans("DateStartPlusOne");
5949  $retstring .= '</button> ';
5950  }
5951  }
5952 
5953  // Add a link to set data
5954  if ($conf->use_javascript_ajax && $adddateof)
5955  {
5956  $tmparray = dol_getdate($adddateof);
5957  if (empty($labeladddateof)) $labeladddateof = $langs->trans("DateInvoice");
5958  $retstring .= ' - <button class="dpInvisibleButtons datenowlink" id="dateofinvoice" type="button" name="_dateofinvoice" value="now" onclick="console.log(\'Click on now link\'); jQuery(\'#re\').val(\''.dol_print_date($adddateof, 'dayinputnoreduce').'\');jQuery(\'#reday\').val(\''.$tmparray['mday'].'\');jQuery(\'#remonth\').val(\''.$tmparray['mon'].'\');jQuery(\'#reyear\').val(\''.$tmparray['year'].'\');">'.$labeladddateof.'</a>';
5959  }
5960 
5961  return $retstring;
5962  }
5963 
5972  public function selectTypeDuration($prefix, $selected = 'i', $excludetypes = array())
5973  {
5974  global $langs;
5975 
5976  $TDurationTypes = array(
5977  'y'=>$langs->trans('Years'),
5978  'm'=>$langs->trans('Month'),
5979  'w'=>$langs->trans('Weeks'),
5980  'd'=>$langs->trans('Days'),
5981  'h'=>$langs->trans('Hours'),
5982  'i'=>$langs->trans('Minutes')
5983  );
5984 
5985  // Removed undesired duration types
5986  foreach ($excludetypes as $value) {
5987  unset($TDurationTypes[$value]);
5988  }
5989 
5990  $retstring = '<select class="flat" id="select_'.$prefix.'type_duration" name="'.$prefix.'type_duration">';
5991  foreach ($TDurationTypes as $key => $typeduration) {
5992  $retstring .= '<option value="'.$key.'"';
5993  if ($key == $selected) {
5994  $retstring .= " selected";
5995  }
5996  $retstring .= ">".$typeduration."</option>";
5997  }
5998  $retstring .= "</select>";
5999 
6000  $retstring .= ajax_combobox('select_'.$prefix.'type_duration');
6001 
6002  return $retstring;
6003  }
6004 
6005  // phpcs:disable PEAR.NamingConventions.ValidFunctionName.ScopeNotCamelCaps
6019  public function select_duration($prefix, $iSecond = '', $disabled = 0, $typehour = 'select', $minunderhours = 0, $nooutput = 0)
6020  {
6021  // phpcs:enable
6022  global $langs;
6023 
6024  $retstring = '';
6025 
6026  $hourSelected = 0; $minSelected = 0;
6027 
6028  // Hours
6029  if ($iSecond != '')
6030  {
6031  require_once DOL_DOCUMENT_ROOT.'/core/lib/date.lib.php';
6032 
6033  $hourSelected = convertSecondToTime($iSecond, 'allhour');
6034  $minSelected = convertSecondToTime($iSecond, 'min');
6035  }
6036 
6037  if ($typehour == 'select') {
6038  $retstring .= '<select class="flat" id="select_'.$prefix.'hour" name="'.$prefix.'hour"'.($disabled ? ' disabled' : '').'>';
6039  for ($hour = 0; $hour < 25; $hour++) // For a duration, we allow 24 hours
6040  {
6041  $retstring .= '<option value="'.$hour.'"';
6042  if ($hourSelected == $hour)
6043  {
6044  $retstring .= " selected";
6045  }
6046  $retstring .= ">".$hour."</option>";
6047  }
6048  $retstring .= "</select>";
6049  } elseif ($typehour == 'text' || $typehour == 'textselect') {
6050  $retstring .= '<input placeholder="'.$langs->trans('HourShort').'" type="number" min="0" name="'.$prefix.'hour"'.($disabled ? ' disabled' : '').' class="flat maxwidth50 inputhour" value="'.(($hourSelected != '') ? ((int) $hourSelected) : '').'">';
6051  } else {
6052  return 'BadValueForParameterTypeHour';
6053  }
6054 
6055  if ($typehour != 'text') $retstring .= ' '.$langs->trans('HourShort');
6056  else $retstring .= '<span class="hideonsmartphone">:</span>';
6057 
6058  // Minutes
6059  if ($minunderhours) $retstring .= '<br>';
6060  else $retstring .= '<span class="hideonsmartphone">&nbsp;</span>';
6061 
6062  if ($typehour == 'select' || $typehour == 'textselect')
6063  {
6064  $retstring .= '<select class="flat" id="select_'.$prefix.'min" name="'.$prefix.'min"'.($disabled ? ' disabled' : '').'>';
6065  for ($min = 0; $min <= 55; $min = $min + 5)
6066  {
6067  $retstring .= '<option value="'.$min.'"';
6068  if ($minSelected == $min) $retstring .= ' selected';
6069  $retstring .= '>'.$min.'</option>';
6070  }
6071  $retstring .= "</select>";
6072  } elseif ($typehour == 'text')
6073  {
6074  $retstring .= '<input placeholder="'.$langs->trans('MinuteShort').'" type="number" min="0" name="'.$prefix.'min"'.($disabled ? ' disabled' : '').' class="flat maxwidth50 inputminute" value="'.(($minSelected != '') ? ((int) $minSelected) : '').'">';
6075  }
6076 
6077  if ($typehour != 'text') $retstring .= ' '.$langs->trans('MinuteShort');
6078 
6079  //$retstring.="&nbsp;";
6080 
6081  if (!empty($nooutput)) return $retstring;
6082 
6083  print $retstring;
6084  return;
6085  }
6086 
6087 
6107  public function selectForForms($objectdesc, $htmlname, $preselectedvalue, $showempty = '', $searchkey = '', $placeholder = '', $morecss = '', $moreparams = '', $forcecombo = 0, $disabled = 0, $selected_input_value = '')
6108  {
6109  global $conf, $user;
6110 
6111  $objecttmp = null;
6112 
6113  $InfoFieldList = explode(":", $objectdesc);
6114  $classname = $InfoFieldList[0];
6115  $classpath = $InfoFieldList[1];
6116  $addcreatebuttonornot = empty($InfoFieldList[2]) ? 0 : $InfoFieldList[2];
6117  $filter = empty($InfoFieldList[3]) ? '' : $InfoFieldList[3];
6118 
6119  if (!empty($classpath))
6120  {
6121  dol_include_once($classpath);
6122 
6123  if ($classname && class_exists($classname))
6124  {
6125  $objecttmp = new $classname($this->db);
6126  // Make some replacement
6127  $sharedentities = getEntity(strtolower($classname));
6128  $objecttmp->filter = str_replace(
6129  array('__ENTITY__', '__SHARED_ENTITIES__', '__USER_ID__'),
6130  array($conf->entity, $sharedentities, $user->id),
6131  $filter);
6132  }
6133  }
6134  if (!is_object($objecttmp))
6135  {
6136  dol_syslog('Error bad setup of type for field '.$InfoFieldList, LOG_WARNING);
6137  return 'Error bad setup of type for field '.join(',', $InfoFieldList);
6138  }
6139 
6140  //var_dump($objecttmp->filter);
6141  $prefixforautocompletemode = $objecttmp->element;
6142  if ($prefixforautocompletemode == 'societe') $prefixforautocompletemode = 'company';
6143  if ($prefixforautocompletemode == 'product') $prefixforautocompletemode = 'produit';
6144  $confkeyforautocompletemode = strtoupper($prefixforautocompletemode).'_USE_SEARCH_TO_SELECT'; // For example COMPANY_USE_SEARCH_TO_SELECT
6145 
6146  dol_syslog(get_class($this)."::selectForForms object->filter=".$objecttmp->filter, LOG_DEBUG);
6147  $out = '';
6148  if (!empty($conf->use_javascript_ajax) && !empty($conf->global->$confkeyforautocompletemode) && !$forcecombo)
6149  {
6150  // No immediate load of all database
6151  $placeholder = '';
6152  if ($preselectedvalue && empty($selected_input_value))
6153  {
6154  $objecttmp->fetch($preselectedvalue);
6155  $selected_input_value = ($prefixforautocompletemode == 'company' ? $objecttmp->name : $objecttmp->ref);
6156  //unset($objecttmp);
6157  }
6158 
6159  $objectdesc = $classname.':'.$classpath.':'.$addcreatebuttonornot.':'.$filter;
6160  $urlforajaxcall = DOL_URL_ROOT.'/core/ajax/selectobject.php';
6161 
6162  // No immediate load of all database
6163  $urloption = 'htmlname='.$htmlname.'&outjson=1&objectdesc='.$objectdesc.'&filter='.urlencode($objecttmp->filter);
6164  // Activate the auto complete using ajax call.
6165  $out .= ajax_autocompleter($preselectedvalue, $htmlname, $urlforajaxcall, $urloption, $conf->global->$confkeyforautocompletemode, 0, array());
6166  $out .= '<style type="text/css">.ui-autocomplete { z-index: 1003; }</style>';
6167  if ($placeholder) $placeholder = ' placeholder="'.$placeholder.'"';
6168  $out .= '<input type="text" class="'.$morecss.'"'.($disabled ? ' disabled="disabled"' : '').' name="search_'.$htmlname.'" id="search_'.$htmlname.'" value="'.$selected_input_value.'"'.$placeholder.' />';
6169  } else {
6170  // Immediate load of table record. Note: filter is inside $objecttmp->filter
6171  $out .= $this->selectForFormsList($objecttmp, $htmlname, $preselectedvalue, $showempty, $searchkey, $placeholder, $morecss, $moreparams, $forcecombo, 0, $disabled);
6172  }
6173 
6174  return $out;
6175  }
6176 
6183  protected static function forgeCriteriaCallback($matches)
6184  {
6185  global $db;
6186 
6187  //dol_syslog("Convert matches ".$matches[1]);
6188  if (empty($matches[1])) return '';
6189  $tmp = explode(':', $matches[1]);
6190  if (count($tmp) < 3) return '';
6191 
6192  $tmpescaped = $tmp[2];
6193  $regbis = array();
6194  if (preg_match('/^\'(.*)\'$/', $tmpescaped, $regbis))
6195  {
6196  $tmpescaped = "'".$db->escape($regbis[1])."'";
6197  } else {
6198  $tmpescaped = $db->escape($tmpescaped);
6199  }
6200  return $db->escape($tmp[0]).' '.strtoupper($db->escape($tmp[1]))." ".$tmpescaped;
6201  }
6202 
6221  public function selectForFormsList($objecttmp, $htmlname, $preselectedvalue, $showempty = '', $searchkey = '', $placeholder = '', $morecss = '', $moreparams = '', $forcecombo = 0, $outputmode = 0, $disabled = 0)
6222  {
6223  global $conf, $langs, $user;
6224 
6225  //print "$objecttmp->filter, $htmlname, $preselectedvalue, $showempty = '', $searchkey = '', $placeholder = '', $morecss = '', $moreparams = '', $forcecombo = 0, $outputmode = 0, $disabled";
6226 
6227  $prefixforautocompletemode = $objecttmp->element;
6228  if ($prefixforautocompletemode == 'societe') $prefixforautocompletemode = 'company';
6229  $confkeyforautocompletemode = strtoupper($prefixforautocompletemode).'_USE_SEARCH_TO_SELECT'; // For example COMPANY_USE_SEARCH_TO_SELECT
6230 
6231  if (!empty($objecttmp->fields)) // For object that declare it, it is better to use declared fields (like societe, contact, ...)
6232  {
6233  $tmpfieldstoshow = '';
6234  foreach ($objecttmp->fields as $key => $val)
6235  {
6236  if (!dol_eval($val['enabled'], 1, 1)) continue;
6237  if ($val['showoncombobox']) $tmpfieldstoshow .= ($tmpfieldstoshow ? ',' : '').'t.'.$key;
6238  }
6239  if ($tmpfieldstoshow) $fieldstoshow = $tmpfieldstoshow;
6240  } else {
6241  // For backward compatibility
6242  $objecttmp->fields['ref'] = array('type'=>'varchar(30)', 'label'=>'Ref', 'showoncombobox'=>1);
6243  }
6244 
6245  if (empty($fieldstoshow))
6246  {
6247  if (isset($objecttmp->fields['ref'])) {
6248  $fieldstoshow = 't.ref';
6249  } else {
6250  $langs->load("errors");
6251  $this->error = $langs->trans("ErrorNoFieldWithAttributeShowoncombobox");
6252  return $langs->trans('ErrorNoFieldWithAttributeShowoncombobox');
6253  }
6254  }
6255 
6256  $out = '';
6257  $outarray = array();
6258 
6259  $num = 0;
6260 
6261  // Search data
6262  $sql = "SELECT t.rowid, ".$fieldstoshow." FROM ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX.$objecttmp->table_element." as t";
6263  if (isset($objecttmp->ismultientitymanaged) && !is_numeric($objecttmp->ismultientitymanaged)) {
6264  $tmparray = explode('@', $objecttmp->ismultientitymanaged);
6265  $sql .= ' INNER JOIN '.MAIN_DB_PREFIX.$tmparray[1].' as parenttable ON parenttable.rowid = t.'.$tmparray[0];
6266  }
6267  if ($objecttmp->ismultientitymanaged === 'fk_soc@societe')
6268  if (!$user->rights->societe->client->voir && !$user->socid) $sql .= ", ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX."societe_commerciaux as sc";
6269  $sql .= " WHERE 1=1";
6270  if (isset($objecttmp->ismultientitymanaged) && $objecttmp->ismultientitymanaged == 1) $sql .= " AND t.entity IN (".getEntity($objecttmp->table_element).")";
6271  if (isset($objecttmp->ismultientitymanaged) && !is_numeric($objecttmp->ismultientitymanaged)) {
6272  $sql .= ' AND parenttable.entity = t.'.$tmparray[0];
6273  }
6274  if ($objecttmp->ismultientitymanaged == 1 && !empty($user->socid)) {
6275  if ($objecttmp->element == 'societe') $sql .= " AND t.rowid = ".$user->socid;
6276  else $sql .= " AND t.fk_soc = ".$user->socid;
6277  }
6278  if ($searchkey != '') $sql .= natural_search(explode(',', $fieldstoshow), $searchkey);
6279  if ($objecttmp->ismultientitymanaged === 'fk_soc@societe') {
6280  if (!$user->rights->societe->client->voir && !$user->socid) $sql .= " AND t.rowid = sc.fk_soc AND sc.fk_user = ".$user->id;
6281  }
6282  if ($objecttmp->filter) { // Syntax example "(t.ref:like:'SO-%') and (t.date_creation:<:'20160101')"
6283  /*if (! DolibarrApi::_checkFilters($objecttmp->filter))
6284  {
6285  throw new RestException(503, 'Error when validating parameter sqlfilters '.$objecttmp->filter);
6286  }*/
6287  $regexstring = '\(([^:\'\(\)]+:[^:\'\(\)]+:[^:\(\)]+)\)';
6288  $sql .= " AND (".preg_replace_callback('/'.$regexstring.'/', 'Form::forgeCriteriaCallback', $objecttmp->filter).")";
6289  }
6290  $sql .= $this->db->order($fieldstoshow, "ASC");
6291  //$sql.=$this->db->plimit($limit, 0);
6292  //print $sql;
6293 
6294  // Build output string
6295  $resql = $this->db->query($sql);
6296  if ($resql)
6297  {
6298  // Construct $out and $outarray
6299  $out .= '<select id="'.$htmlname.'" class="flat'.($morecss ? ' '.$morecss : '').'"'.($disabled ? ' disabled="disabled"' : '').($moreparams ? ' '.$moreparams : '').' name="'.$htmlname.'">'."\n";
6300 
6301  // Warning: Do not use textifempty = ' ' or '&nbsp;' here, or search on key will search on ' key'. Seems it is no more true with selec2 v4
6302  $textifempty = '&nbsp;';
6303 
6304  //if (! empty($conf->use_javascript_ajax) || $forcecombo) $textifempty='';
6305  if (!empty($conf->global->$confkeyforautocompletemode))
6306  {
6307  if ($showempty && !is_numeric($showempty)) $textifempty = $langs->trans($showempty);
6308  else $textifempty .= $langs->trans("All");
6309  }
6310  if ($showempty) $out .= '<option value="-1">'.$textifempty.'</option>'."\n";
6311 
6312  $num = $this->db->num_rows($resql);
6313  $i = 0;
6314  if ($num)
6315  {
6316  while ($i < $num)
6317  {
6318  $obj = $this->db->fetch_object($resql);
6319  $label = '';
6320  $tmparray = explode(',', $fieldstoshow);
6321  foreach ($tmparray as $key => $val)
6322  {
6323  $val = preg_replace('/t\./', '', $val);
6324  $label .= (($label && $obj->$val) ? ' - ' : '').$obj->$val;
6325  }
6326  if (empty($outputmode))
6327  {
6328  if ($preselectedvalue > 0 && $preselectedvalue == $obj->rowid) {
6329  $out .= '<option value="'.$obj->rowid.'" selected>'.$label.'</option>';
6330  } else {
6331  $out .= '<option value="'.$obj->rowid.'">'.$label.'</option>';
6332  }
6333  } else {
6334  array_push($outarray, array('key'=>$obj->rowid, 'value'=>$label, 'label'=>$label));
6335  }
6336 
6337  $i++;
6338  if (($i % 10) == 0) $out .= "\n";
6339  }
6340  }
6341 
6342  $out .= '</select>'."\n";
6343 
6344  if (!$forcecombo) {
6345  include_once DOL_DOCUMENT_ROOT.'/core/lib/ajax.lib.php';
6346  $out .= ajax_combobox($htmlname, null, $conf->global->$confkeyforautocompletemode);
6347  }
6348  } else {
6349  dol_print_error($this->db);
6350  }
6351 
6352  $this->result = array('nbofelement'=>$num);
6353 
6354  if ($outputmode) return $outarray;
6355  return $out;
6356  }
6357 
6358 
6382  public static function selectarray($htmlname, $array, $id = '', $show_empty = 0, $key_in_label = 0, $value_as_key = 0, $moreparam = '', $translate = 0, $maxlen = 0, $disabled = 0, $sort = '', $morecss = '', $addjscombo = 0, $moreparamonempty = '', $disablebademail = 0, $nohtmlescape = 0)
6383  {
6384  global $conf, $langs;
6385 
6386  // Do we want a multiselect ?
6387  //$jsbeautify = 0;
6388  //if (preg_match('/^multi/',$htmlname)) $jsbeautify = 1;
6389  $jsbeautify = 1;
6390 
6391  if ($value_as_key) $array = array_combine($array, $array);
6392 
6393  $out = '';
6394 
6395  // Add code for jquery to use multiselect
6396  if ($addjscombo && $jsbeautify)
6397  {
6398  $minLengthToAutocomplete = 0;
6399  $tmpplugin = empty($conf->global->MAIN_USE_JQUERY_MULTISELECT) ? (constant('REQUIRE_JQUERY_MULTISELECT') ?constant('REQUIRE_JQUERY_MULTISELECT') : 'select2') : $conf->global->MAIN_USE_JQUERY_MULTISELECT;
6400 
6401  // Enhance with select2
6402  include_once DOL_DOCUMENT_ROOT.'/core/lib/ajax.lib.php';
6403  $out .= ajax_combobox($htmlname);
6404  }
6405 
6406  $out .= '<select id="'.preg_replace('/^\./', '', $htmlname).'" '.($disabled ? 'disabled="disabled" ' : '').'class="flat '.(preg_replace('/^\./', '', $htmlname)).($morecss ? ' '.$morecss : '').'"';
6407  $out .= ' name="'.preg_replace('/^\./', '', $htmlname).'" '.($moreparam ? $moreparam : '');
6408  $out .= '>';
6409 
6410  if ($show_empty)
6411  {
6412  $textforempty = ' ';
6413  if (!empty($conf->use_javascript_ajax)) $textforempty = '&nbsp;'; // If we use ajaxcombo, we need &nbsp; here to avoid to have an empty element that is too small.
6414  if (!is_numeric($show_empty)) $textforempty = $show_empty;
6415  $out .= '<option class="optiongrey" '.($moreparamonempty ? $moreparamonempty.' ' : '').'value="'.($show_empty < 0 ? $show_empty : -1).'"'.($id == $show_empty ? ' selected' : '').'>'.$textforempty.'</option>'."\n";
6416  }
6417 
6418  if (is_array($array))
6419  {
6420  // Translate
6421  if ($translate)
6422  {
6423  foreach ($array as $key => $value)
6424  {
6425  if (!is_array($value)) $array[$key] = $langs->trans($value);
6426  else $array[$key]['label'] = $langs->trans($value['label']);
6427  }
6428  }
6429 
6430  // Sort
6431  if ($sort == 'ASC') asort($array);
6432  elseif ($sort == 'DESC') arsort($array);
6433 
6434  foreach ($array as $key => $tmpvalue)
6435  {
6436  if (is_array($tmpvalue)) {
6437  $value = $tmpvalue['label'];
6438  $disabled = empty($tmpvalue['disabled']) ? '' : ' disabled';
6439  $style = empty($tmpvalue['css']) ? ' class="'.$tmpvalue['css'].'"' : '';
6440  } else {
6441  $value = $tmpvalue;
6442  $disabled = ''; $style = '';
6443  }
6444  if (!empty($disablebademail)) {
6445  if (($disablebademail == 1 && !preg_match('/&lt;.+@.+&gt;/', $value))
6446  || ($disablebademail == 2 && preg_match('/---/', $value)))
6447  {
6448  $disabled = ' disabled';
6449  $style = ' class="warning"';
6450  }
6451  }
6452 
6453  if ($key_in_label) {
6454  if (empty($nohtmlescape)) $selectOptionValue = dol_escape_htmltag($key.' - '.($maxlen ?dol_trunc($value, $maxlen) : $value));
6455  else $selectOptionValue = $key.' - '.($maxlen ?dol_trunc($value, $maxlen) : $value);
6456  } else {
6457  if (empty($nohtmlescape)) $selectOptionValue = dol_escape_htmltag($maxlen ?dol_trunc($value, $maxlen) : $value);
6458  else $selectOptionValue = $maxlen ?dol_trunc($value, $maxlen) : $value;
6459  if ($value == '' || $value == '-') $selectOptionValue = '&nbsp;';
6460  }
6461 
6462  $out .= '<option value="'.$key.'"';
6463  $out .= $style.$disabled;
6464  if (is_array($id)) {
6465  if (in_array($key, $id) && !$disabled) $out .= ' selected'; // To preselect a value
6466  } else {
6467  $id = (string) $id; // if $id = 0, then $id = '0'
6468  if ($id != '' && $id == $key && !$disabled) $out .= ' selected'; // To preselect a value
6469  }
6470  if ($nohtmlescape) $out .= ' data-html="'.dol_escape_htmltag($selectOptionValue).'"';
6471  if (is_array($tmpvalue))
6472  {
6473  foreach ($tmpvalue as $keyforvalue => $valueforvalue)
6474  {
6475  if (preg_match('/^data-/', $keyforvalue)) $out .= ' '.$keyforvalue.'="'.$valueforvalue.'"';
6476  }
6477  }
6478  $out .= '>';
6479  //var_dump($selectOptionValue);
6480  $out .= $selectOptionValue;
6481  $out .= "</option>\n";
6482  }
6483  }
6484 
6485  $out .= "</select>";
6486  return $out;
6487  }
6488 
6489
