6508  public static function selectArrayAjax($htmlname, $url, $id = '', $moreparam = '', $moreparamtourl = '', $disabled = 0, $minimumInputLength = 1, $morecss = '', $callurlonselect = 0, $placeholder = '', $acceptdelayedhtml = 0)
6509  {
6510  global $conf, $langs;
6511  global $delayedhtmlcontent;
6512 
6513  // TODO Use an internal dolibarr component instead of select2
6514  if (empty($conf->global->MAIN_USE_JQUERY_MULTISELECT) && !defined('REQUIRE_JQUERY_MULTISELECT')) return '';
6515 
6516  $out = '<select type="text" class="'.$htmlname.($morecss ? ' '.$morecss : '').'" '.($moreparam ? $moreparam.' ' : '').'name="'.$htmlname.'"></select>';
6517 
6518  $tmpplugin = 'select2';
6519  $outdelayed = "\n".'<!-- JS CODE TO ENABLE '.$tmpplugin.' for id '.$htmlname.' -->
6520  <script>
6521  $(document).ready(function () {
6522 
6523  '.($callurlonselect ? 'var saveRemoteData = [];' : '').'
6524 
6525  $(".'.$htmlname.'").select2({
6526  ajax: {
6527  dir: "ltr",
6528  url: "'.$url.'",
6529  dataType: \'json\',
6530  delay: 250,
6531  data: function (params) {
6532  return {
6533  q: params.term, // search term
6534  page: params.page
6535  };
6536  },
6537  processResults: function (data) {
6538  // parse the results into the format expected by Select2.
6539  // since we are using custom formatting functions we do not need to alter the remote JSON data
6540  //console.log(data);
6541  saveRemoteData = data;
6542  /* format json result for select2 */
6543  result = []
6544  $.each( data, function( key, value ) {
6545  result.push({id: key, text: value.text});
6546  });
6547  //return {results:[{id:\'none\', text:\'aa\'}, {id:\'rrr\', text:\'Red\'},{id:\'bbb\', text:\'Search a into projects\'}], more:false}
6548  //console.log(result);
6549  return {results: result, more: false}
6550  },
6551  cache: true
6552  },
6553  language: select2arrayoflanguage,
6554  containerCssClass: \':all:\', /* Line to add class of origin SELECT propagated to the new <span class="select2-selection...> tag */
6555  placeholder: "'.dol_escape_js($placeholder).'",
6556  escapeMarkup: function (markup) { return markup; }, // let our custom formatter work
6557  minimumInputLength: '.$minimumInputLength.',
6558  formatResult: function(result, container, query, escapeMarkup) {
6559  return escapeMarkup(result.text);
6560  },
6561  });
6562 
6563  '.($callurlonselect ? '
6564  /* Code to execute a GET when we select a value */
6565  $(".'.$htmlname.'").change(function() {
6566  var selected = $(".'.$htmlname.'").val();
6567  console.log("We select in selectArrayAjax the entry "+selected)
6568  $(".'.$htmlname.'").val(""); /* reset visible combo value */
6569  $.each( saveRemoteData, function( key, value ) {
6570  if (key == selected)
6571  {
6572  console.log("selectArrayAjax - Do a redirect to "+value.url)
6573  location.assign(value.url);
6574  }
6575  });
6576  });' : '').'
6577 
6578  });
6579  </script>';
6580 
6581  if ($acceptdelayedhtml)
6582  {
6583  $delayedhtmlcontent .= $outdelayed;
6584  } else {
6585  $out .= $outdelayed;
6586  }
6587  return $out;
6588  }
6589 
6608  public static function selectArrayFilter($htmlname, $array, $id = '', $moreparam = '', $disableFiltering = 0, $disabled = 0, $minimumInputLength = 1, $morecss = '', $callurlonselect = 0, $placeholder = '', $acceptdelayedhtml = 0)
6609  {
6610  global $conf, $langs;
6611  global $delayedhtmlcontent;
6612 
6613  // TODO Use an internal dolibarr component instead of select2
6614  if (empty($conf->global->MAIN_USE_JQUERY_MULTISELECT) && !defined('REQUIRE_JQUERY_MULTISELECT')) return '';
6615 
6616  $out = '<select type="text" class="'.$htmlname.($morecss ? ' '.$morecss : '').'" '.($moreparam ? $moreparam.' ' : '').'name="'.$htmlname.'"><option></option></select>';
6617 
6618  $formattedarrayresult = array();
6619 
6620  foreach ($array as $key => $value) {
6621  $o = new stdClass();
6622  $o->id = $key;
6623  $o->text = $value['text'];
6624  $o->url = $value['url'];
6625  $formattedarrayresult[] = $o;
6626  }
6627 
6628  $tmpplugin = 'select2';
6629  $outdelayed = "\n".'<!-- JS CODE TO ENABLE '.$tmpplugin.' for id '.$htmlname.' -->
6630  <script>
6631  $(document).ready(function () {
6632  var data = '.json_encode($formattedarrayresult).';
6633 
6634  '.($callurlonselect ? 'var saveRemoteData = '.json_encode($array).';' : '').'
6635 
6636  $(".'.$htmlname.'").select2({
6637  data: data,
6638  language: select2arrayoflanguage,
6639  containerCssClass: \':all:\', /* Line to add class of origin SELECT propagated to the new <span class="select2-selection...> tag */
6640  placeholder: "'.dol_escape_js($placeholder).'",
6641  escapeMarkup: function (markup) { return markup; }, // let our custom formatter work
6642  minimumInputLength: '.$minimumInputLength.',
6643  formatResult: function(result, container, query, escapeMarkup) {
6644  return escapeMarkup(result.text);
6645  },
6646  matcher: function (params, data) {
6647 
6648  if(! data.id) return null;';
6649 
6650  if ($callurlonselect) {
6651  $outdelayed .= '
6652 
6653  var urlBase = data.url;
6654  var separ = urlBase.indexOf("?") >= 0 ? "&" : "?";
6655  /* console.log("params.term="+params.term); */
6656  /* console.log("params.term encoded="+encodeURIComponent(params.term)); */
6657  saveRemoteData[data.id].url = urlBase + separ + "sall=" + encodeURIComponent(params.term.replace(/\"/g, ""));';
6658  }
6659 
6660  if (!$disableFiltering) {
6661  $outdelayed .= '
6662 
6663  if(data.text.match(new RegExp(params.term))) {
6664  return data;
6665  }
6666 
6667  return null;';
6668  } else {
6669  $outdelayed .= '
6670 
6671  return data;';
6672  }
6673 
6674  $outdelayed .= '
6675  }
6676  });
6677 
6678  '.($callurlonselect ? '
6679  /* Code to execute a GET when we select a value */
6680  $(".'.$htmlname.'").change(function() {
6681  var selected = $(".'.$htmlname.'").val();
6682  console.log("We select "+selected)
6683 
6684  $(".'.$htmlname.'").val(""); /* reset visible combo value */
6685  $.each( saveRemoteData, function( key, value ) {
6686  if (key == selected)
6687  {
6688  console.log("selectArrayFilter - Do a redirect to "+value.url)
6689  location.assign(value.url);
6690  }
6691  });
6692  });' : '').'
6693 
6694  });
6695  </script>';
6696 
6697  if ($acceptdelayedhtml)
6698  {
6699  $delayedhtmlcontent .= $outdelayed;
6700  } else {
6701  $out .= $outdelayed;
6702  }
6703  return $out;
6704  }
6705 
6724  public static function multiselectarray($htmlname, $array, $selected = array(), $key_in_label = 0, $value_as_key = 0, $morecss = '', $translate = 0, $width = 0, $moreattrib = '', $elemtype = '', $placeholder = '', $addjscombo = -1)
6725  {
6726  global $conf, $langs;
6727 
6728  $out = '';
6729 
6730  if ($addjscombo < 0) {
6731  if (empty($conf->global->MAIN_OPTIMIZEFORTEXTBROWSER)) $addjscombo = 1;
6732  else $addjscombo = 0;
6733  }
6734 
6735  // Add code for jquery to use multiselect
6736  if (!empty($conf->global->MAIN_USE_JQUERY_MULTISELECT) || defined('REQUIRE_JQUERY_MULTISELECT'))
6737  {
6738  $out .= "\n".'<!-- JS CODE TO ENABLE select for id '.$htmlname.', addjscombo='.$addjscombo.' -->
6739  <script>'."\n";
6740  if ($addjscombo == 1)
6741  {
6742  $tmpplugin = empty($conf->global->MAIN_USE_JQUERY_MULTISELECT) ?constant('REQUIRE_JQUERY_MULTISELECT') : $conf->global->MAIN_USE_JQUERY_MULTISELECT;
6743  $out .= 'function formatResult(record) {'."\n";
6744  if ($elemtype == 'category')
6745  {
6746  $out .= 'return \'<span><img src="'.DOL_URL_ROOT.'/theme/eldy/img/object_category.png"> \'+record.text+\'</span>\';';
6747  } else {
6748  $out .= 'return record.text;';
6749  }
6750  $out .= '};'."\n";
6751  $out .= 'function formatSelection(record) {'."\n";
6752  if ($elemtype == 'category')
6753  {
6754  $out .= 'return \'<span><img src="'.DOL_URL_ROOT.'/theme/eldy/img/object_category.png"> \'+record.text+\'</span>\';';
6755  } else {
6756  $out .= 'return record.text;';
6757  }
6758  $out .= '};'."\n";
6759  $out .= '$(document).ready(function () {
6760  $(\'#'.$htmlname.'\').'.$tmpplugin.'({
6761  dir: \'ltr\',
6762  // Specify format function for dropdown item
6763  formatResult: formatResult,
6764  templateResult: formatResult, /* For 4.0 */
6765  // Specify format function for selected item
6766  formatSelection: formatSelection,
6767  templateSelection: formatSelection /* For 4.0 */
6768  });
6769 
6770  /* Add also morecss to the css .select2 that is after the #htmlname, for component that are show dynamically after load, because select2 set
6771  the size only if component is not hidden by default on load */
6772  $(\'#'.$htmlname.' + .select2\').addClass(\''.$morecss.'\');
6773  });'."\n";
6774  } elseif ($addjscombo == 2 && !defined('DISABLE_MULTISELECT'))
6775  {
6776  // Add other js lib
6777  // TODO external lib multiselect/jquery.multi-select.js must have been loaded to use this multiselect plugin
6778  // ...
6779  $out .= 'console.log(\'addjscombo=2 for htmlname='.$htmlname.'\');';
6780  $out .= '$(document).ready(function () {
6781  $(\'#'.$htmlname.'\').multiSelect({
6782  containerHTML: \'<div class="multi-select-container">\',
6783  menuHTML: \'<div class="multi-select-menu">\',
6784  buttonHTML: \'<span class="multi-select-button '.$morecss.'">\',
6785  menuItemHTML: \'<label class="multi-select-menuitem">\',
6786  activeClass: \'multi-select-container--open\',
6787  noneText: \''.$placeholder.'\'
6788  });
6789  })';
6790  }
6791  $out .= '</script>';
6792  }
6793 
6794  // Try also magic suggest
6795  $out .= '<select id="'.$htmlname.'" class="multiselect'.($morecss ? ' '.$morecss : '').'" multiple name="'.$htmlname.'[]"'.($moreattrib ? ' '.$moreattrib : '').($width ? ' style="width: '.(preg_match('/%/', $width) ? $width : $width.'px').'"' : '').'>'."\n";
6796  if (is_array($array) && !empty($array))
6797  {
6798  if ($value_as_key) $array = array_combine($array, $array);
6799 
6800  if (!empty($array))
6801  {
6802  foreach ($array as $key => $value)
6803  {
6804  $newval = ($translate ? $langs->trans($value) : $value);
6805  $newval = ($key_in_label ? $key.' - '.$newval : $newval);
6806 
6807  $out .= '<option value="'.$key.'"';
6808  if (is_array($selected) && !empty($selected) && in_array((string) $key, $selected) && ((string) $key != ''))
6809  {
6810  $out .= ' selected';
6811  }
6812  $out .= ' data-html="'.dol_escape_htmltag($newval).'"';
6813  $out .= '>';
6814  $out .= dol_htmlentitiesbr($newval);
6815  $out .= '</option>'."\n";
6816  }
6817  }
6818  }
6819  $out .= '</select>'."\n";
6820 
6821  return $out;
6822  }
6823 
6824 
6834  public static function multiSelectArrayWithCheckbox($htmlname, &$array, $varpage)
6835  {
6836  global $conf, $langs, $user, $extrafields;
6837 
6838  if (!empty($conf->global->MAIN_OPTIMIZEFORTEXTBROWSER)) return '';
6839 
6840  $tmpvar = "MAIN_SELECTEDFIELDS_".$varpage; // To get list of saved seleteced properties
6841  if (!empty($user->conf->$tmpvar))
6842  {
6843  $tmparray = explode(',', $user->conf->$tmpvar);
6844  foreach ($array as $key => $val)
6845  {
6846  //var_dump($key);
6847  //var_dump($tmparray);
6848  if (in_array($key, $tmparray)) $array[$key]['checked'] = 1;
6849  else $array[$key]['checked'] = 0;
6850  }
6851  }
6852 
6853  $lis = '';
6854  $listcheckedstring = '';
6855 
6856  foreach ($array as $key => $val)
6857  {
6858  /* var_dump($val);
6859  var_dump(array_key_exists('enabled', $val));
6860  var_dump(!$val['enabled']);*/
6861  if (array_key_exists('enabled', $val) && isset($val['enabled']) && !$val['enabled'])
6862  {
6863  unset($array[$key]); // We don't want this field
6864  continue;
6865  }
6866  if ($val['label'])
6867  {
6868  if (!empty($val['langfile']) && is_object($langs)) {
6869  $langs->load($val['langfile']);
6870  }
6871 
6872  $lis .= '<li><input type="checkbox" id="checkbox'.$key.'" value="'.$key.'"'.(empty($val['checked']) ? '' : ' checked="checked"').'/><label for="checkbox'.$key.'">'.dol_escape_htmltag($langs->trans($val['label'])).'</label></li>';
6873  $listcheckedstring .= (empty($val['checked']) ? '' : $key.',');
6874  }
6875  }
6876 
6877  $out = '<!-- Component multiSelectArrayWithCheckbox '.$htmlname.' -->
6878 
6879  <dl class="dropdown">
6880  <dt>
6881  <a href="#'.$htmlname.'">
6882  '.img_picto('', 'list').'
6883  </a>
6884  <input type="hidden" class="'.$htmlname.'" name="'.$htmlname.'" value="'.$listcheckedstring.'">
6885  </dt>
6886  <dd class="dropdowndd">
6887  <div class="multiselectcheckbox'.$htmlname.'">
6888  <ul class="ul'.$htmlname.'">
6889  '.$lis.'
6890  </ul>
6891  </div>
6892  </dd>
6893  </dl>
6894 
6895  <script type="text/javascript">
6896  jQuery(document).ready(function () {
6897  $(\'.multiselectcheckbox'.$htmlname.' input[type="checkbox"]\').on(\'click\', function () {
6898  console.log("A new field was added/removed, we edit field input[name=formfilteraction]");
6899 
6900  $("input:hidden[name=formfilteraction]").val(\'listafterchangingselectedfields\'); // Update field so we know we changed something on selected fields after POST
6901 
6902  var title = $(this).val() + ",";
6903  if ($(this).is(\':checked\')) {
6904  $(\'.'.$htmlname.'\').val(title + $(\'.'.$htmlname.'\').val());
6905  }
6906  else {
6907  $(\'.'.$htmlname.'\').val( $(\'.'.$htmlname.'\').val().replace(title, \'\') )
6908  }
6909  // Now, we submit page
6910  //$(this).parents(\'form:first\').submit();
6911  });
6912 
6913 
6914  });
6915  </script>
6916 
6917  ';
6918  return $out;
6919  }
6920 
6930  public function showCategories($id, $type, $rendermode = 0, $nolink = 0)
6931  {
6932  global $db;
6933 
6934  include_once DOL_DOCUMENT_ROOT.'/categories/class/categorie.class.php';
6935 
6936  $cat = new Categorie($db);
6937  $categories = $cat->containing($id, $type);
6938 
6939  if ($rendermode == 1)
6940  {
6941  $toprint = array();
6942  foreach ($categories as $c)
6943  {
6944  $ways = $c->print_all_ways(' &gt;&gt; ', ($nolink ? 'none' : ''), 0, 1); // $ways[0] = "ccc2 >> ccc2a >> ccc2a1" with html formated text
6945  foreach ($ways as $way)
6946  {
6947  $toprint[] = '<li class="select2-search-choice-dolibarr noborderoncategories"'.($c->color ? ' style="background: #'.$c->color.';"' : ' style="background: #bbb"').'>'.$way.'</li>';
6948  }
6949  }
6950  return '<div class="select2-container-multi-dolibarr" style="width: 90%;"><ul class="select2-choices-dolibarr">'.implode(' ', $toprint).'</ul></div>';
6951  }
6952 
6953  if ($rendermode == 0)
6954  {
6955  $arrayselected = array();
6956  $cate_arbo = $this->select_all_categories($type, '', 'parent', 64, 0, 1);
6957  foreach ($categories as $c) {
6958  $arrayselected[] = $c->id;
6959  }
6960 
6961  return $this->multiselectarray('categories', $cate_arbo, $arrayselected, '', 0, '', 0, '100%', 'disabled', 'category');
6962  }
6963 
6964  return 'ErrorBadValueForParameterRenderMode'; // Should not happened
6965  }
6966 
6975  public function showLinkedObjectBlock($object, $morehtmlright = '', $compatibleImportElementsList = false)
6976  {
6977  global $conf, $langs, $hookmanager;
6978  global $bc, $action;
6979 
6980  $object->fetchObjectLinked();
6981 
6982  // Bypass the default method
6983  $hookmanager->initHooks(array('commonobject'));
6984  $parameters = array(
6985  'morehtmlright' => $morehtmlright,
6986  'compatibleImportElementsList' => &$compatibleImportElementsList,
6987  );
6988  $reshook = $hookmanager->executeHooks('showLinkedObjectBlock', $parameters, $object, $action); // Note that $action and $object may have been modified by hook
6989 
6990  if (empty($reshook))
6991  {
6992  $nbofdifferenttypes = count($object->linkedObjects);
6993 
6994  print '<!-- showLinkedObjectBlock -->';
6995  print load_fiche_titre($langs->trans('RelatedObjects'), $morehtmlright, '', 0, 0, 'showlinkedobjectblock');
6996 
6997 
6998  print '<div class="div-table-responsive-no-min">';
6999  print '<table class="noborder allwidth" data-block="showLinkedObject" data-element="'.$object->element.'" data-elementid="'.$object->id.'" >';
7000 
7001  print '<tr class="liste_titre">';
7002  print '<td>'.$langs->trans("Type").'</td>';
7003  print '<td>'.$langs->trans("Ref").'</td>';
7004  print '<td class="center"></td>';
7005  print '<td class="center">'.$langs->trans("Date").'</td>';
7006  print '<td class="right">'.$langs->trans("AmountHTShort").'</td>';
7007  print '<td class="right">'.$langs->trans("Status").'</td>';
7008  print '<td></td>';
7009  print '</tr>';
7010 
7011  $nboftypesoutput = 0;
7012 
7013  foreach ($object->linkedObjects as $objecttype => $objects)
7014  {
7015  $tplpath = $element = $subelement = $objecttype;
7016 
7017  // to display inport button on tpl
7018  $showImportButton = false;
7019  if (!empty($compatibleImportElementsList) && in_array($element, $compatibleImportElementsList)) {
7020  $showImportButton = true;
7021  }
7022 
7023  $regs = array();
7024  if ($objecttype != 'supplier_proposal' && preg_match('/^([^_]+)_([^_]+)/i', $objecttype, $regs))
7025  {
7026  $element = $regs[1];
7027  $subelement = $regs[2];
7028  $tplpath = $element.'/'.$subelement;
7029  }
7030  $tplname = 'linkedobjectblock';
7031 
7032  // To work with non standard path
7033  if ($objecttype == 'facture') {
7034  $tplpath = 'compta/'.$element;
7035  if (empty($conf->facture->enabled)) continue; // Do not show if module disabled
7036  } elseif ($objecttype == 'facturerec') {
7037  $tplpath = 'compta/facture';
7038  $tplname = 'linkedobjectblockForRec';
7039  if (empty($conf->facture->enabled)) continue; // Do not show if module disabled
7040  } elseif ($objecttype == 'propal') {
7041  $tplpath = 'comm/'.$element;
7042  if (empty($conf->propal->enabled)) continue; // Do not show if module disabled
7043  } elseif ($objecttype == 'supplier_proposal') {
7044  if (empty($conf->supplier_proposal->enabled)) continue; // Do not show if module disabled
7045  } elseif ($objecttype == 'shipping' || $objecttype == 'shipment') {
7046  $tplpath = 'expedition';
7047  if (empty($conf->expedition->enabled)) continue; // Do not show if module disabled
7048  } elseif ($objecttype == 'reception') {
7049  $tplpath = 'reception';
7050  if (empty($conf->reception->enabled)) continue; // Do not show if module disabled
7051  } elseif ($objecttype == 'delivery') {
7052  $tplpath = 'delivery';
7053  if (empty($conf->expedition->enabled)) continue; // Do not show if module disabled
7054  } elseif ($objecttype == 'invoice_supplier') {
7055  $tplpath = 'fourn/facture';
7056  } elseif ($objecttype == 'order_supplier') {
7057  $tplpath = 'fourn/commande';
7058  } elseif ($objecttype == 'expensereport') {
7059  $tplpath = 'expensereport';
7060  } elseif ($objecttype == 'subscription') {
7061  $tplpath = 'adherents';
7062  }
7063 
7064  global $linkedObjectBlock;
7065  $linkedObjectBlock = $objects;
7066 
7067 
7068  // Output template part (modules that overwrite templates must declare this into descriptor)
7069  $dirtpls = array_merge($conf->modules_parts['tpl'], array('/'.$tplpath.'/tpl'));
7070  foreach ($dirtpls as $reldir)
7071  {
7072  if ($nboftypesoutput == ($nbofdifferenttypes - 1)) // No more type to show after
7073  {
7074  global $noMoreLinkedObjectBlockAfter;
7075  $noMoreLinkedObjectBlockAfter = 1;
7076  }
7077 
7078  $res = @include dol_buildpath($reldir.'/'.$tplname.'.tpl.php');
7079  if ($res)
7080  {
7081  $nboftypesoutput++;
7082  break;
7083  }
7084  }
7085  }
7086 
7087  if (!$nboftypesoutput)
7088  {
7089  print '<tr><td class="impair opacitymedium" colspan="7">'.$langs->trans("None").'</td></tr>';
7090  }
7091 
7092  print '</table>';
7093 
7094  if (!empty($compatibleImportElementsList))
7095  {
7096  $res = @include dol_buildpath('core/tpl/ajax/objectlinked_lineimport.tpl.php');
7097  }
7098 
7099 
7100  print '</div>';
7101 
7102  return $nbofdifferenttypes;
7103  }
7104  }
7105 
7114  public function showLinkToObjectBlock($object, $restrictlinksto = array(), $excludelinksto = array())
7115  {
7116  global $conf, $langs, $hookmanager;
7117  global $bc, $action;
7118 
7119  $linktoelem = '';
7120  $linktoelemlist = '';
7121  $listofidcompanytoscan = '';
7122 
7123  if (!is_object($object->thirdparty)) $object->fetch_thirdparty();
7124 
7125  $possiblelinks = array();
7126  if (is_object($object->thirdparty) && !empty($object->thirdparty->id) && $object->thirdparty->id > 0)
7127  {
7128  $listofidcompanytoscan = $object->thirdparty->id;
7129  if (($object->thirdparty->parent > 0) && !empty($conf->global->THIRDPARTY_INCLUDE_PARENT_IN_LINKTO)) $listofidcompanytoscan .= ','.$object->thirdparty->parent;
7130  if (($object->fk_project > 0) && !empty($conf->global->THIRDPARTY_INCLUDE_PROJECT_THIRDPARY_IN_LINKTO))
7131  {
7132  include_once DOL_DOCUMENT_ROOT.'/projet/class/project.class.php';
7133  $tmpproject = new Project($this->db);
7134  $tmpproject->fetch($object->fk_project);
7135  if ($tmpproject->socid > 0 && ($tmpproject->socid != $object->thirdparty->id)) $listofidcompanytoscan .= ','.$tmpproject->socid;
7136  unset($tmpproject);
7137  }
7138 
7139  $possiblelinks = array(
7140  'propal'=>array('enabled'=>$conf->propal->enabled, 'perms'=>1, 'label'=>'LinkToProposal', 'sql'=>"SELECT s.rowid as socid, s.nom as name, s.client, t.rowid, t.ref, t.ref_client, t.total_ht FROM ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX."societe as s, ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX."propal as t WHERE t.fk_soc = s.rowid AND t.fk_soc IN (".$listofidcompanytoscan.') AND t.entity IN ('.getEntity('propal').')'),
7141  'order'=>array('enabled'=>$conf->commande->enabled, 'perms'=>1, 'label'=>'LinkToOrder', 'sql'=>"SELECT s.rowid as socid, s.nom as name, s.client, t.rowid, t.ref, t.ref_client, t.total_ht FROM ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX."societe as s, ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX."commande as t WHERE t.fk_soc = s.rowid AND t.fk_soc IN (".$listofidcompanytoscan.') AND t.entity IN ('.getEntity('commande').')'),
7142  'invoice'=>array('enabled'=>$conf->facture->enabled, 'perms'=>1, 'label'=>'LinkToInvoice', 'sql'=>"SELECT s.rowid as socid, s.nom as name, s.client, t.rowid, t.ref, t.ref_client, t.total as total_ht FROM ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX."societe as s, ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX."facture as t WHERE t.fk_soc = s.rowid AND t.fk_soc IN (".$listofidcompanytoscan.') AND t.entity IN ('.getEntity('invoice').')'),
7143  'invoice_template'=>array('enabled'=>$conf->facture->enabled, 'perms'=>1, 'label'=>'LinkToTemplateInvoice', 'sql'=>"SELECT s.rowid as socid, s.nom as name, s.client, t.rowid, t.titre as ref, t.total as total_ht FROM ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX."societe as s, ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX."facture_rec as t WHERE t.fk_soc = s.rowid AND t.fk_soc IN (".$listofidcompanytoscan.') AND t.entity IN ('.getEntity('invoice').')'),
7144  'contrat'=>array('enabled'=>$conf->contrat->enabled, 'perms'=>1, 'label'=>'LinkToContract',
7145  'sql'=>"SELECT s.rowid as socid, s.nom as name, s.client, t.rowid, t.ref, t.ref_customer as ref_client, t.ref_supplier, SUM(td.total_ht) as total_ht FROM ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX."societe as s, ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX."contrat as t, ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX."contratdet as td WHERE t.fk_soc = s.rowid AND td.fk_contrat = t.rowid AND t.fk_soc IN (".$listofidcompanytoscan.') AND t.entity IN ('.getEntity('contract').')'),
7146  'fichinter'=>array('enabled'=>$conf->ficheinter->enabled, 'perms'=>1, 'label'=>'LinkToIntervention', 'sql'=>"SELECT s.rowid as socid, s.nom as name, s.client, t.rowid, t.ref FROM ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX."societe as s, ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX."fichinter as t WHERE t.fk_soc = s.rowid AND t.fk_soc IN (".$listofidcompanytoscan.') AND t.entity IN ('.getEntity('intervention').')'),
7147  'supplier_proposal'=>array('enabled'=>$conf->supplier_proposal->enabled, 'perms'=>1, 'label'=>'LinkToSupplierProposal', 'sql'=>"SELECT s.rowid as socid, s.nom as name, s.client, t.rowid, t.ref, '' as ref_supplier, t.total_ht FROM ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX."societe as s, ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX."supplier_proposal as t WHERE t.fk_soc = s.rowid AND t.fk_soc IN (".$listofidcompanytoscan.') AND t.entity IN ('.getEntity('supplier_proposal').')'),
7148  'order_supplier'=>array('enabled'=>$conf->supplier_order->enabled, 'perms'=>1, 'label'=>'LinkToSupplierOrder', 'sql'=>"SELECT s.rowid as socid, s.nom as name, s.client, t.rowid, t.ref, t.ref_supplier, t.total_ht FROM ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX."societe as s, ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX."commande_fournisseur as t WHERE t.fk_soc = s.rowid AND t.fk_soc IN (".$listofidcompanytoscan.') AND t.entity IN ('.getEntity('commande_fournisseur').')'),
7149  'invoice_supplier'=>array('enabled'=>$conf->supplier_invoice->enabled, 'perms'=>1, 'label'=>'LinkToSupplierInvoice', 'sql'=>"SELECT s.rowid as socid, s.nom as name, s.client, t.rowid, t.ref, t.ref_supplier, t.total_ht FROM ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX."societe as s, ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX."facture_fourn as t WHERE t.fk_soc = s.rowid AND t.fk_soc IN (".$listofidcompanytoscan.') AND t.entity IN ('.getEntity('facture_fourn').')'),
7150  'ticket'=>array('enabled'=>$conf->ticket->enabled, 'perms'=>1, 'label'=>'LinkToTicket', 'sql'=>"SELECT s.rowid as socid, s.nom as name, s.client, t.rowid, t.ref, t.track_id, '0' as total_ht FROM ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX."societe as s, ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX."ticket as t WHERE t.fk_soc = s.rowid AND t.fk_soc IN (".$listofidcompanytoscan.') AND t.entity IN ('.getEntity('ticket').')')
7151  );
7152  }
7153 
7154  // Can complete the possiblelink array
7155  $hookmanager->initHooks(array('commonobject'));
7156  $parameters = array('listofidcompanytoscan' => $listofidcompanytoscan);
7157 
7158  if (!empty($listofidcompanytoscan)) // If empty, we don't have criteria to scan the object we can link to
7159  {
7160  $reshook = $hookmanager->executeHooks('showLinkToObjectBlock', $parameters, $object, $action); // Note that $action and $object may have been modified by hook
7161  }
7162 
7163  if (empty($reshook))
7164  {
7165  if (is_array($hookmanager->resArray) && count($hookmanager->resArray))
7166  {
7167  $possiblelinks = array_merge($possiblelinks, $hookmanager->resArray);
7168  }
7169  } elseif ($reshook > 0)
7170  {
7171  if (is_array($hookmanager->resArray) && count($hookmanager->resArray))
7172  {
7173  $possiblelinks = $hookmanager->resArray;
7174  }
7175  }
7176 
7177  foreach ($possiblelinks as $key => $possiblelink)
7178  {
7179  $num = 0;
7180 
7181  if (empty($possiblelink['enabled'])) continue;
7182 
7183  if (!empty($possiblelink['perms']) && (empty($restrictlinksto) || in_array($key, $restrictlinksto)) && (empty($excludelinksto) || !in_array($key, $excludelinksto)))
7184  {
7185  print '<div id="'.$key.'list"'.(empty($conf->use_javascript_ajax) ? '' : ' style="display:none"').'>';
7186  $sql = $possiblelink['sql'];
7187 
7188  $resqllist = $this->db->query($sql);
7189  if ($resqllist)
7190  {
7191  $num = $this->db->num_rows($resqllist);
7192  $i = 0;
7193 
7194  print '<br>';
7195  print '<form action="'.$_SERVER["PHP_SELF"].'" method="POST" name="formlinked'.$key.'">';
7196  print '<input type="hidden" name="action" value="addlink">';
7197  print '<input type="hidden" name="token" value="'.newToken().'">';
7198  print '<input type="hidden" name="id" value="'.$object->id.'">';
7199  print '<input type="hidden" name="addlink" value="'.$key.'">';
7200  print '<table class="noborder">';
7201  print '<tr class="liste_titre">';
7202  print '<td class="nowrap"></td>';
7203  print '<td class="center">'.$langs->trans("Ref").'</td>';
7204  print '<td class="left">'.$langs->trans("RefCustomer").'</td>';
7205  print '<td class="right">'.$langs->trans("AmountHTShort").'</td>';
7206  print '<td class="left">'.$langs->trans("Company").'</td>';
7207  print '</tr>';
7208  while ($i < $num)
7209  {
7210  $objp = $this->db->fetch_object($resqllist);
7211 
7212  print '<tr class="oddeven">';
7213  print '<td class="left">';
7214  print '<input type="radio" name="idtolinkto" value='.$objp->rowid.'>';
7215  print '</td>';
7216  print '<td class="center">'.$objp->ref.'</td>';
7217  print '<td>'.(!empty($objp->ref_client) ? $objp->ref_client : $objp->ref_supplier).'</td>';
7218  print '<td class="right">';
7219  if ($possiblelink['label'] == 'LinkToContract') {
7220  $form = new Form($db);
7221  print $form->textwithpicto('', $langs->trans("InformationOnLinkToContract")).' ';
7222  }
7223  print price($objp->total_ht).'</td>';
7224  print '<td>'.$objp->name.'</td>';
7225  print '</tr>';
7226  $i++;
7227  }
7228  print '</table>';
7229  print '<div class="center"><input type="submit" class="button valignmiddle" value="'.$langs->trans('ToLink').'">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<input type="submit" class="button button-cancel" name="cancel" value="'.$langs->trans("Cancel").'"></div>';
7230 
7231  print '</form>';
7232  $this->db->free($resqllist);
7233  } else {
7234  dol_print_error($this->db);
7235  }
7236  print '</div>';
7237  if ($num > 0)
7238  {
7239  }
7240 
7241  //$linktoelem.=($linktoelem?' &nbsp; ':'');
7242  if ($num > 0) $linktoelemlist .= '<li><a href="#linkto'.$key.'" class="linkto dropdowncloseonclick" rel="'.$key.'">'.$langs->trans($possiblelink['label']).' ('.$num.')</a></li>';
7243  //else $linktoelem.=$langs->trans($possiblelink['label']);
7244  else $linktoelemlist .= '<li><span class="linktodisabled">'.$langs->trans($possiblelink['label']).' (0)</span></li>';
7245  }
7246  }
7247 
7248  if ($linktoelemlist)
7249  {
7250  $linktoelem = '
7251  <dl class="dropdown" id="linktoobjectname">
7252  ';
7253  if (!empty($conf->use_javascript_ajax)) $linktoelem .= '<dt><a href="#linktoobjectname">'.$langs->trans("LinkTo").'...</a></dt>';
7254  $linktoelem .= '<dd>
7255  <div class="multiselectlinkto">
7256  <ul class="ulselectedfields">'.$linktoelemlist.'
7257  </ul>
7258  </div>
7259  </dd>
7260  </dl>';
7261  } else {
7262  $linktoelem = '';
7263  }
7264 
7265  if (!empty($conf->use_javascript_ajax))
7266  {
7267  print '<!-- Add js to show linkto box -->
7268  <script>
7269  jQuery(document).ready(function() {
7270  jQuery(".linkto").click(function() {
7271  console.log("We choose to show/hide link for rel="+jQuery(this).attr(\'rel\'));
7272  jQuery("#"+jQuery(this).attr(\'rel\')+"list").toggle();
7273  });
7274  });
7275  </script>
7276  ';
7277  }
7278 
7279  return $linktoelem;
7280  }
7281 
7293  public function selectyesno($htmlname, $value = '', $option = 0, $disabled = false, $useempty = 0, $addjscombo = 0)
7294  {
7295  global $langs;
7296 
7297  $yes = "yes"; $no = "no";
7298  if ($option)
7299  {
7300  $yes = "1";
7301  $no = "0";
7302  }
7303 
7304  $disabled = ($disabled ? ' disabled' : '');
7305 
7306  $resultyesno = '<select class="flat width75" id="'.$htmlname.'" name="'.$htmlname.'"'.$disabled.'>'."\n";
7307  if ($useempty) $resultyesno .= '<option value="-1"'.(($value < 0) ? ' selected' : '').'>&nbsp;</option>'."\n";
7308  if (("$value" == 'yes') || ($value == 1))
7309  {
7310  $resultyesno .= '<option value="'.$yes.'" selected>'.$langs->trans("Yes").'</option>'."\n";
7311  $resultyesno .= '<option value="'.$no.'">'.$langs->trans("No").'</option>'."\n";
7312  } else {
7313  $selected = (($useempty && $value != '0' && $value != 'no') ? '' : ' selected');
7314  $resultyesno .= '<option value="'.$yes.'">'.$langs->trans("Yes").'</option>'."\n";
7315  $resultyesno .= '<option value="'.$no.'"'.$selected.'>'.$langs->trans("No").'</option>'."\n";
7316  }
7317  $resultyesno .= '</select>'."\n";
7318 
7319  if ($addjscombo) {
7320  $resultyesno .= ajax_combobox($htmlname);
7321  }
7322 
7323  return $resultyesno;
7324  }
7325 
7326  // phpcs:disable PEAR.NamingConventions.ValidFunctionName.ScopeNotCamelCaps
7336  public function select_export_model($selected = '', $htmlname = 'exportmodelid', $type = '', $useempty = 0)
7337  {
7338  // phpcs:enable
7339  $sql = "SELECT rowid, label";
7340  $sql .= " FROM ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX."export_model";
7341  $sql .= " WHERE type = '".$this->db->escape($type)."'";
7342  $sql .= " ORDER BY rowid";
7343  $result = $this->db->query($sql);
7344  if ($result)
7345  {
7346  print '<select class="flat" id="select_'.$htmlname.'" name="'.$htmlname.'">';
7347  if ($useempty)
7348  {
7349  print '<option value="-1">&nbsp;</option>';
7350  }
7351 
7352  $num = $this->db->num_rows($result);
7353  $i = 0;
7354  while ($i < $num)
7355  {
7356  $obj = $this->db->fetch_object($result);
7357  if ($selected == $obj->rowid)
7358  {
7359  print '<option value="'.$obj->rowid.'" selected>';
7360  } else {
7361  print '<option value="'.$obj->rowid.'">';
7362  }
7363  print $obj->label;
7364  print '</option>';
7365  $i++;
7366  }
7367  print "</select>";
7368  } else {
7369  dol_print_error($this->db);
7370  }
7371  }
7372 
7391  public function showrefnav($object, $paramid, $morehtml = '', $shownav = 1, $fieldid = 'rowid', $fieldref = 'ref', $morehtmlref = '', $moreparam = '', $nodbprefix = 0, $morehtmlleft = '', $morehtmlstatus = '', $morehtmlright = '')
7392  {
7393  global $langs, $conf, $hookmanager, $extralanguages;
7394 
7395  $ret = '';
7396  if (empty($fieldid)) $fieldid = 'rowid';
7397  if (empty($fieldref)) $fieldref = 'ref';
7398 
7399  // Add where from hooks
7400  if (is_object($hookmanager))
7401  {
7402  $parameters = array();
7403  $reshook = $hookmanager->executeHooks('printFieldListWhere', $parameters, $object); // Note that $action and $object may have been modified by hook
7404  $object->next_prev_filter .= $hookmanager->resPrint;
7405  }
7406  $previous_ref = $next_ref = '';
7407  if ($shownav)
7408  {
7409  //print "paramid=$paramid,morehtml=$morehtml,shownav=$shownav,$fieldid,$fieldref,$morehtmlref,$moreparam";
7410  $object->load_previous_next_ref((isset($object->next_prev_filter) ? $object->next_prev_filter : ''), $fieldid, $nodbprefix);
7411 
7412  $navurl = $_SERVER["PHP_SELF"];
7413  // Special case for project/task page
7414  if ($paramid == 'project_ref')
7415  {
7416  if (preg_match('/\/tasks\/(task|contact|note|document)\.php/', $navurl)) // TODO Remove this when nav with project_ref on task pages are ok
7417  {
7418  $navurl = preg_replace('/\/tasks\/(task|contact|time|note|document)\.php/', '/tasks.php', $navurl);
7419  $paramid = 'ref';
7420  }
7421  }
7422 
7423  // accesskey is for Windows or Linux: ALT + key for chrome, ALT + SHIFT + KEY for firefox
7424  // accesskey is for Mac: CTRL + key for all browsers
7425  $stringforfirstkey = $langs->trans("KeyboardShortcut");
7426  if ($conf->browser->name == 'chrome')
7427  {
7428  $stringforfirstkey .= ' ALT +';
7429  } elseif ($conf->browser->name == 'firefox')
7430  {
7431  $stringforfirstkey .= ' ALT + SHIFT +';
7432  } else {
7433  $stringforfirstkey .= ' CTL +';
7434  }
7435 
7436  $previous_ref = $object->ref_previous ? '<a accesskey="p" title="'.$stringforfirstkey.' p" class="classfortooltip" href="'.$navurl.'?'.$paramid.'='.urlencode($object->ref_previous).$moreparam.'"><i class="fa fa-chevron-left"></i></a>' : '<span class="inactive"><i class="fa fa-chevron-left opacitymedium"></i></span>';
7437  $next_ref = $object->ref_next ? '<a accesskey="n" title="'.$stringforfirstkey.' n" class="classfortooltip" href="'.$navurl.'?'.$paramid.'='.urlencode($object->ref_next).$moreparam.'"><i class="fa fa-chevron-right"></i></a>' : '<span class="inactive"><i class="fa fa-chevron-right opacitymedium"></i></span>';
7438  }
7439 
7440  //print "xx".$previous_ref."x".$next_ref;
7441  $ret .= '<!-- Start banner content --><div style="vertical-align: middle">';
7442 
7443  // Right part of banner
7444  if ($morehtmlright) $ret .= '<div class="inline-block floatleft">'.$morehtmlright.'</div>';
7445 
7446  if ($previous_ref || $next_ref || $morehtml)
7447  {
7448  $ret .= '<div class="pagination paginationref"><ul class="right">';
7449  }
7450  if ($morehtml)
7451  {
7452  $ret .= '<li class="noborder litext'.(($shownav && $previous_ref && $next_ref) ? ' clearbothonsmartphone' : '').'">'.$morehtml.'</li>';
7453  }
7454  if ($shownav && ($previous_ref || $next_ref))
7455  {
7456  $ret .= '<li class="pagination">'.$previous_ref.'</li>';
7457  $ret .= '<li class="pagination">'.$next_ref.'</li>';
7458  }
7459  if ($previous_ref || $next_ref || $morehtml)
7460  {
7461  $ret .= '</ul></div>';
7462  }
7463 
7464  $parameters = array();
7465  $reshook = $hookmanager->executeHooks('moreHtmlStatus', $parameters, $object); // Note that $action and $object may have been modified by hook
7466  if (empty($reshook)) $morehtmlstatus .= $hookmanager->resPrint;
7467  else $morehtmlstatus = $hookmanager->resPrint;
7468  if ($morehtmlstatus) $ret .= '<div class="statusref">'.$morehtmlstatus.'</div>';
7469 
7470  $parameters = array();
7471  $reshook = $hookmanager->executeHooks('moreHtmlRef', $parameters, $object); // Note that $action and $object may have been modified by hook
7472  if (empty($reshook)) $morehtmlref .= $hookmanager->resPrint;
7473  elseif ($reshook > 0) $morehtmlref = $hookmanager->resPrint;
7474 
7475  // Left part of banner
7476  if ($morehtmlleft)
7477  {
7478  if ($conf->browser->layout == 'phone') $ret .= '<!-- morehtmlleft --><div class="floatleft">'.$morehtmlleft.'</div>'; // class="center" to have photo in middle
7479  else $ret .= '<!-- morehtmlleft --><div class="inline-block floatleft">'.$morehtmlleft.'</div>';
7480  }
7481 
7482  //if ($conf->browser->layout == 'phone') $ret.='<div class="clearboth"></div>';
7483  $ret .= '<div class="inline-block floatleft valignmiddle maxwidth750 marginbottomonly refid'.(($shownav && ($previous_ref || $next_ref)) ? ' refidpadding' : '').'">';
7484 
7485  // For thirdparty, contact, user, member, the ref is the id, so we show something else
7486  if ($object->element == 'societe')
7487  {
7488  $ret .= dol_htmlentities($object->name);
7489 
7490  // List of extra languages
7491  $arrayoflangcode = array();
7492  if (!empty($conf->global->PDF_USE_ALSO_LANGUAGE_CODE)) $arrayoflangcode[] = $conf->global->PDF_USE_ALSO_LANGUAGE_CODE;
7493 
7494  if (is_array($arrayoflangcode) && count($arrayoflangcode)) {
7495  if (!is_object($extralanguages)) {
7496  include_once DOL_DOCUMENT_ROOT.'/core/class/extralanguages.class.php';
7497  $extralanguages = new ExtraLanguages($this->db);
7498  }
7499  $extralanguages->fetch_name_extralanguages('societe');
7500 
7501  if (!empty($extralanguages->attributes['societe']['name']))
7502  {
7503  $object->fetchValuesForExtraLanguages();
7504 
7505  $htmltext = '';
7506  // If there is extra languages
7507  foreach ($arrayoflangcode as $extralangcode) {
7508  $htmltext .= picto_from_langcode($extralangcode, 'class="pictoforlang paddingright"');
7509  if ($object->array_languages['name'][$extralangcode]) {
7510  $htmltext .= $object->array_languages['name'][$extralangcode];
7511  } else {
7512  $htmltext .= '<span class="opacitymedium">'.$langs->trans("SwitchInEditModeToAddTranslation").'</span>';
7513  }
7514  }
7515  $ret .= '<!-- Show translations of name -->'."\n";
7516  $ret .= $this->textwithpicto('', $htmltext, -1, 'language', 'opacitymedium paddingleft');
7517  }
7518  }
7519  } elseif ($object->element == 'member')
7520  {
7521  $ret .= $object->ref.'<br>';
7522  $fullname = $object->getFullName($langs);
7523  if ($object->morphy == 'mor' && $object->societe) {
7524  $ret .= dol_htmlentities($object->societe).((!empty($fullname) && $object->societe != $fullname) ? ' ('.dol_htmlentities($fullname).')' : '');
7525  } else {
7526  $ret .= dol_htmlentities($fullname).((!empty($object->societe) && $object->societe != $fullname) ? ' ('.dol_htmlentities($object->societe).')' : '');
7527  }
7528  } elseif (in_array($object->element, array('contact', 'user', 'usergroup')))
7529  {
7530  $ret .= dol_htmlentities($object->getFullName($langs));
7531  } elseif (in_array($object->element, array('action', 'agenda')))
7532  {
7533  $ret .= $object->ref.'<br>'.$object->label;
7534  } elseif (in_array($object->element, array('adherent_type')))
7535  {
7536  $ret .= $object->label;
7537  } elseif ($object->element == 'ecm_directories')
7538  {
7539  $ret .= '';
7540  } elseif ($fieldref != 'none')
7541  {
7542  $ret .= dol_htmlentities($object->$fieldref);
7543  }
7544 
7545  if ($morehtmlref)
7546  {
7547  // don't add a additional space, when "$morehtmlref" starts with a HTML div tag
7548  if (substr($morehtmlref, 0, 4) != '<div')
7549  {
7550  $ret .= ' ';
7551  }
7552 
7553  $ret .= $morehtmlref;
7554  }
7555 
7556  $ret .= '</div>';
7557 
7558  $ret .= '</div><!-- End banner content -->';
7559 
7560  return $ret;
7561  }
7562 
7563 
7571  public function showbarcode(&$object, $width = 100)
7572  {
7573  global $conf;
7574 
7575  //Check if barcode is filled in the card
7576  if (empty($object->barcode)) return '';
7577 
7578  // Complete object if not complete
7579  if (empty($object->barcode_type_code) || empty($object->barcode_type_coder))
7580  {
7581  $result = $object->fetch_barcode();
7582  //Check if fetch_barcode() failed
7583  if ($result < 1) return '<!-- ErrorFetchBarcode -->';
7584  }
7585 
7586  // Barcode image
7587  $url = DOL_URL_ROOT.'/viewimage.php?modulepart=barcode&generator='.urlencode($object->barcode_type_coder).'&code='.urlencode($object->barcode).'&encoding='.urlencode($object->barcode_type_code);
7588  $out = '<!-- url barcode = '.$url.' -->';
7589  $out .= '<img src="'.$url.'">';
7590  return $out;
7591  }
7592 
7609  public static function showphoto($modulepart, $object, $width = 100, $height = 0, $caneditfield = 0, $cssclass = 'photowithmargin', $imagesize = '', $addlinktofullsize = 1, $cache = 0, $forcecapture = '', $noexternsourceoverwrite = 0)
7610  {
7611  global $conf, $langs;
7612 
7613  $entity = (!empty($object->entity) ? $object->entity : $conf->entity);
7614  $id = (!empty($object->id) ? $object->id : $object->rowid);
7615 
7616  $ret = ''; $dir = ''; $file = ''; $originalfile = ''; $altfile = ''; $email = ''; $capture = '';
7617  if ($modulepart == 'societe')
7618  {
7619  $dir = $conf->societe->multidir_output[$entity];
7620  if (!empty($object->logo)) {
7621  if ((string) $imagesize == 'mini') $file = get_exdir(0, 0, 0, 0, $object, 'thirdparty').'logos/'.getImageFileNameForSize($object->logo, '_mini'); // getImageFileNameForSize include the thumbs
7622  elseif ((string) $imagesize == 'small') $file = get_exdir(0, 0, 0, 0, $object, 'thirdparty').'logos/'.getImageFileNameForSize($object->logo, '_small');
7623  else $file = get_exdir(0, 0, 0, 0, $object, 'thirdparty').'logos/'.$object->logo;
7624  $originalfile = get_exdir(0, 0, 0, 0, $object, 'thirdparty').'logos/'.$object->logo;
7625  }
7626  $email = $object->email;
7627  } elseif ($modulepart == 'contact') {
7628  $dir = $conf->societe->multidir_output[$entity].'/contact';
7629  if (!empty($object->photo))
7630  {
7631  if ((string) $imagesize == 'mini') $file = get_exdir(0, 0, 0, 0, $object, 'contact').'photos/'.getImageFileNameForSize($object->photo, '_mini');
7632  elseif ((string) $imagesize == 'small') $file = get_exdir(0, 0, 0, 0, $object, 'contact').'photos/'.getImageFileNameForSize($object->photo, '_small');
7633  else $file = get_exdir(0, 0, 0, 0, $object, 'contact').'photos/'.$object->photo;
7634  $originalfile = get_exdir(0, 0, 0, 0, $object, 'contact').'photos/'.$object->photo;
7635  }
7636  $email = $object->email;
7637  $capture = 'user';
7638  } elseif ($modulepart == 'userphoto') {
7639  $dir = $conf->user->dir_output;
7640  if (!empty($object->photo))
7641  {
7642  if ((string) $imagesize == 'mini') $file = get_exdir(0, 0, 0, 0, $object, 'user').getImageFileNameForSize($object->photo, '_mini');
7643  elseif ((string) $imagesize == 'small') $file = get_exdir(0, 0, 0, 0, $object, 'user').getImageFileNameForSize($object->photo, '_small');
7644  else $file = get_exdir(0, 0, 0, 0, $object, 'user').$object->photo;
7645  $originalfile = get_exdir(0, 0, 0, 0, $object, 'user').$object->photo;
7646  }
7647  if (!empty($conf->global->MAIN_OLD_IMAGE_LINKS)) $altfile = $object->id.".jpg"; // For backward compatibility
7648  $email = $object->email;
7649  $capture = 'user';
7650  } elseif ($modulepart == 'memberphoto') {
7651  $dir = $conf->adherent->dir_output;
7652  if (!empty($object->photo))
7653  {
7654  if ((string) $imagesize == 'mini') $file = get_exdir(0, 0, 0, 0, $object, 'member').'photos/'.getImageFileNameForSize($object->photo, '_mini');
7655  elseif ((string) $imagesize == 'small') $file = get_exdir(0, 0, 0, 0, $object, 'member').'photos/'.getImageFileNameForSize($object->photo, '_small');
7656  else $file = get_exdir(0, 0, 0, 0, $object, 'member').'photos/'.$object->photo;
7657  $originalfile = get_exdir(0, 0, 0, 0, $object, 'member').'photos/'.$object->photo;
7658  }
7659  if (!empty($conf->global->MAIN_OLD_IMAGE_LINKS)) $altfile = $object->id.".jpg"; // For backward compatibility
7660  $email = $object->email;
7661  $capture = 'user';
7662  } else {
7663  // Generic case to show photos
7664  $dir = $conf->$modulepart->dir_output;
7665  if (!empty($object->photo))
7666  {
7667  if ((string) $imagesize == 'mini') $file = get_exdir($id, 2, 0, 0, $object, $modulepart).'photos/'.getImageFileNameForSize($object->photo, '_mini');
7668  elseif ((string) $imagesize == 'small') $file = get_exdir($id, 2, 0, 0, $object, $modulepart).'photos/'.getImageFileNameForSize($object->photo, '_small');
7669  else $file = get_exdir($id, 2, 0, 0, $object, $modulepart).'photos/'.$object->photo;
7670  $originalfile = get_exdir($id, 2, 0, 0, $object, $modulepart).'photos/'.$object->photo;
7671  }
7672  if (!empty($conf->global->MAIN_OLD_IMAGE_LINKS)) $altfile = $object->id.".jpg"; // For backward compatibility
7673  $email = $object->email;
7674  }
7675 
7676  if ($forcecapture) $capture = $forcecapture;
7677 
7678  if ($dir)
7679  {
7680  if ($file && file_exists($dir."/".$file))
7681  {
7682  if ($addlinktofullsize) {
7683  $urladvanced = getAdvancedPreviewUrl($modulepart, $originalfile, 0, '&entity='.$entity);
7684  if ($urladvanced) $ret .= '<a href="'.$urladvanced.'">';
7685  else $ret .= '<a href="'.DOL_URL_ROOT.'/viewimage.php?modulepart='.$modulepart.'&entity='.$entity.'&file='.urlencode($originalfile).'&cache='.$cache.'">';
7686  }
7687  $ret .= '<img alt="Photo" class="photo'.$modulepart.($cssclass ? ' '.$cssclass : '').' photologo'.(preg_replace('/[^a-z]/i', '_', $file)).'" '.($width ? ' width="'.$width.'"' : '').($height ? ' height="'.$height.'"' : '').' src="'.DOL_URL_ROOT.'/viewimage.php?modulepart='.$modulepart.'&entity='.$entity.'&file='.urlencode($file).'&cache='.$cache.'">';
7688  if ($addlinktofullsize) $ret .= '</a>';
7689  } elseif ($altfile && file_exists($dir."/".$altfile)) {
7690  if ($addlinktofullsize) {
7691  $urladvanced = getAdvancedPreviewUrl($modulepart, $originalfile, 0, '&entity='.$entity);
7692  if ($urladvanced) $ret .= '<a href="'.$urladvanced.'">';
7693  else $ret .= '<a href="'.DOL_URL_ROOT.'/viewimage.php?modulepart='.$modulepart.'&entity='.$entity.'&file='.urlencode($originalfile).'&cache='.$cache.'">';
7694  }
7695  $ret .= '<img class="photo'.$modulepart.($cssclass ? ' '.$cssclass : '').'" alt="Photo alt" id="photologo'.(preg_replace('/[^a-z]/i', '_', $file)).'" class="'.$cssclass.'" '.($width ? ' width="'.$width.'"' : '').($height ? ' height="'.$height.'"' : '').' src="'.DOL_URL_ROOT.'/viewimage.php?modulepart='.$modulepart.'&entity='.$entity.'&file='.urlencode($altfile).'&cache='.$cache.'">';
7696  if ($addlinktofullsize) $ret .= '</a>';
7697  } else {
7698  $nophoto = '/public/theme/common/nophoto.png';
7699  if (in_array($modulepart, array('userphoto', 'contact', 'memberphoto'))) { // For module that are "physical" users
7700  if ($modulepart == 'memberphoto' && strpos($object->morphy, 'mor') !== false) {
7701  $nophoto = '/public/theme/common/company.png';
7702  } else {
7703  $nophoto = '/public/theme/common/user_anonymous.png';
7704  if ($object->gender == 'man') $nophoto = '/public/theme/common/user_man.png';
7705  if ($object->gender == 'woman') $nophoto = '/public/theme/common/user_woman.png';
7706  }
7707  }
7708 
7709  if (!empty($conf->gravatar->enabled) && $email && empty($noexternsourceoverwrite)) {
7710  // see https://gravatar.com/site/implement/images/php/
7711  global $dolibarr_main_url_root;
7712  $ret .= '<!-- Put link to gravatar -->';
7713  //$defaultimg=urlencode(dol_buildpath($nophoto,3));
7714  $defaultimg = 'mm';
7715  $ret .= '<img class="photo'.$modulepart.($cssclass ? ' '.$cssclass : '').'" alt="Gravatar avatar" title="'.$email.' Gravatar avatar" '.($width ? ' width="'.$width.'"' : '').($height ? ' height="'.$height.'"' : '').' src="https://www.gravatar.com/avatar/'.md5(strtolower(trim($email))).'?s='.$width.'&d='.$defaultimg.'">'; // gravatar need md5 hash
7716  } else {
7717  $ret .= '<img class="photo'.$modulepart.($cssclass ? ' '.$cssclass : '').'" alt="No photo" '.($width ? ' width="'.$width.'"' : '').($height ? ' height="'.$height.'"' : '').' src="'.DOL_URL_ROOT.$nophoto.'">';
7718  }
7719  }
7720 
7721  if ($caneditfield)
7722  {
7723  if ($object->photo) $ret .= "<br>\n";
7724  $ret .= '<table class="nobordernopadding centpercent">';
7725  if ($object->photo) $ret .= '<tr><td><input type="checkbox" class="flat photodelete" name="deletephoto" id="photodelete"> '.$langs->trans("Delete").'<br><br></td></tr>';
7726  $ret .= '<tr><td class="tdoverflow"><input type="file" class="flat maxwidth200onsmartphone" name="photo" id="photoinput" accept="image/*"'.($capture ? ' capture="'.$capture.'"' : '').'></td></tr>';
7727  $ret .= '</table>';
7728  }
7729  } else dol_print_error('', 'Call of showphoto with wrong parameters modulepart='.$modulepart);
7730 
7731  return $ret;
7732  }
7733 
7734  // phpcs:disable PEAR.NamingConventions.ValidFunctionName.ScopeNotCamelCaps
7751  public function select_dolgroups($selected = '', $htmlname = 'groupid', $show_empty = 0, $exclude = '', $disabled = 0, $include = '', $enableonly = '', $force_entity = '0', $multiple = false, $morecss = '')
7752  {
7753  // phpcs:enable
7754  global $conf, $user, $langs;
7755 
7756  // Permettre l'exclusion de groupes
7757  if (is_array($exclude)) $excludeGroups = implode("','", $exclude);
7758  // Permettre l'inclusion de groupes
7759  if (is_array($include)) $includeGroups = implode("','", $include);
7760 
7761  if (!is_array($selected)) $selected = array($selected);
7762 
7763  $out = '';
7764 
7765  // On recherche les groupes
7766  $sql = "SELECT ug.rowid, ug.nom as name";
7767  if (!empty($conf->multicompany->enabled) && $conf->entity == 1 && $user->admin && !$user->entity)
7768  {
7769  $sql .= ", e.label";
7770  }
7771  $sql .= " FROM ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX."usergroup as ug ";
7772  if (!empty($conf->multicompany->enabled) && $conf->entity == 1 && $user->admin && !$user->entity)
7773  {
7774  $sql .= " LEFT JOIN ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX."entity as e ON e.rowid=ug.entity";
7775  if ($force_entity) $sql .= " WHERE ug.entity IN (0, ".$force_entity.")";
7776  else $sql .= " WHERE ug.entity IS NOT NULL";
7777  } else {
7778  $sql .= " WHERE ug.entity IN (0, ".$conf->entity.")";
7779  }
7780  if (is_array($exclude) && $excludeGroups) $sql .= " AND ug.rowid NOT IN ('".$excludeGroups."')";
7781  if (is_array($include) && $includeGroups) $sql .= " AND ug.rowid IN ('".$includeGroups."')";
7782  $sql .= " ORDER BY ug.nom ASC";
7783 
7784  dol_syslog(get_class($this)."::select_dolgroups", LOG_DEBUG);
7785  $resql = $this->db->query($sql);
7786  if ($resql)
7787  {
7788  // Enhance with select2
7789  include_once DOL_DOCUMENT_ROOT.'/core/lib/ajax.lib.php';
7790  $out .= ajax_combobox($htmlname);
7791 
7792  $out .= '<select class="flat minwidth200'.($morecss ? ' '.$morecss : '').'" id="'.$htmlname.'" name="'.$htmlname.($multiple ? '[]' : '').'" '.($multiple ? 'multiple' : '').' '.($disabled ? ' disabled' : '').'>';
7793 
7794  $num = $this->db->num_rows($resql);
7795  $i = 0;
7796  if ($num)
7797  {
7798  if ($show_empty && !$multiple) $out .= '<option value="-1"'.(in_array(-1, $selected) ? ' selected' : '').'>&nbsp;</option>'."\n";
7799 
7800  while ($i < $num)
7801  {
7802  $obj = $this->db->fetch_object($resql);
7803  $disableline = 0;
7804  if (is_array($enableonly) && count($enableonly) && !in_array($obj->rowid, $enableonly)) $disableline = 1;
7805 
7806  $out .= '<option value="'.$obj->rowid.'"';
7807  if ($disableline) $out .= ' disabled';
7808  if ((is_object($selected[0]) && $selected[0]->id == $obj->rowid) || (!is_object($selected[0]) && in_array($obj->rowid, $selected)))
7809  {
7810  $out .= ' selected';
7811  }
7812  $out .= '>';
7813 
7814  $out .= $obj->name;
7815  if (!empty($conf->multicompany->enabled) && empty($conf->global->MULTICOMPANY_TRANSVERSE_MODE) && $conf->entity == 1)
7816  {
7817  $out .= " (".$obj->label.")";
7818  }
7819 
7820  $out .= '</option>';
7821  $i++;
7822  }
7823  } else {
7824  if ($show_empty) $out .= '<option value="-1"'.(in_array(-1, $selected) ? ' selected' : '').'></option>'."\n";
7825  $out .= '<option value="" disabled>'.$langs->trans("NoUserGroupDefined").'</option>';
7826  }
7827  $out .= '</select>';
7828  } else {
7829  dol_print_error($this->db);
7830  }
7831 
7832  return $out;
7833  }
7834 
7835 
7841  public function showFilterButtons()
7842  {
7843  $out = '<div class="nowrap">';
7844  $out .= '<button type="submit" class="liste_titre button_search" name="button_search_x" value="x"><span class="fa fa-search"></span></button>';
7845  $out .= '<button type="submit" class="liste_titre button_removefilter" name="button_removefilter_x" value="x"><span class="fa fa-remove"></span></button>';
7846  $out .= '</div>';
7847 
7848  return $out;
7849  }
7850 
7859  public function showCheckAddButtons($cssclass = 'checkforaction', $calljsfunction = 0, $massactionname = "massaction")
7860  {
7861  global $conf, $langs;
7862 
7863  $out = '';
7864 
7865  if (!empty($conf->use_javascript_ajax)) $out .= '<div class="inline-block checkallactions"><input type="checkbox" id="'.$cssclass.'s" name="'.$cssclass.'s" class="checkallactions"></div>';
7866  $out .= '<script>
7867  $(document).ready(function() {
7868  $("#' . $cssclass.'s").click(function() {
7869  if($(this).is(\':checked\')){
7870  console.log("We check all '.$cssclass.' and trigger the change method");
7871  $(".'.$cssclass.'").prop(\'checked\', true).trigger(\'change\');
7872  }
7873  else
7874  {
7875  console.log("We uncheck all");
7876  $(".'.$cssclass.'").prop(\'checked\', false).trigger(\'change\');
7877  }'."\n";
7878  if ($calljsfunction) $out .= 'if (typeof initCheckForSelect == \'function\') { initCheckForSelect(0, "'.$massactionname.'", "'.$cssclass.'"); } else { console.log("No function initCheckForSelect found. Call won\'t be done."); }';
7879  $out .= ' });
7880  $(".' . $cssclass.'").change(function() {
7881  $(this).closest("tr").toggleClass("highlight", this.checked);
7882  });
7883  });
7884  </script>';
7885 
7886  return $out;
7887  }
7888 
7898  public function showFilterAndCheckAddButtons($addcheckuncheckall = 0, $cssclass = 'checkforaction', $calljsfunction = 0, $massactionname = "massaction")
7899  {
7900  $out = $this->showFilterButtons();
7901  if ($addcheckuncheckall)
7902  {
7903  $out .= $this->showCheckAddButtons($cssclass, $calljsfunction, $massactionname);
7904  }
7905  return $out;
7906  }
7907 
7921  public function selectExpenseCategories($selected = '', $htmlname = 'fk_c_exp_tax_cat', $useempty = 0, $excludeid = array(), $target = '', $default_selected = 0, $params = array(), $info_admin = 1)
7922  {
7923  global $db, $langs, $user;
7924 
7925  $out = '';
7926  $sql = 'SELECT rowid, label FROM '.MAIN_DB_PREFIX.'c_exp_tax_cat WHERE active = 1';
7927  $sql .= ' AND entity IN (0,'.getEntity('exp_tax_cat').')';
7928  if (!empty($excludeid)) $sql .= ' AND rowid NOT IN ('.implode(',', $excludeid).')';
7929  $sql .= ' ORDER BY label';
7930 
7931  $resql = $db->query($sql);
7932  if ($resql)
7933  {
7934  $out = '<select id="select_'.$htmlname.'" name="'.$htmlname.'" class="'.$htmlname.' flat minwidth75imp maxwidth200">';
7935  if ($useempty) $out .= '<option value="0">&nbsp;</option>';
7936 
7937  while ($obj = $db->fetch_object($resql))
7938  {
7939  $out .= '<option '.($selected == $obj->rowid ? 'selected="selected"' : '').' value="'.$obj->rowid.'">'.$langs->trans($obj->label).'</option>';
7940  }
7941  $out .= '</select>';
7942  $out .= ajax_combobox('select_'.$htmlname);
7943 
7944  if (!empty($htmlname) && $user->admin && $info_admin) $out .= ' '.info_admin($langs->trans("YouCanChangeValuesForThisListFromDictionarySetup"), 1);
7945 
7946  if (!empty($target))
7947  {
7948  $sql = "SELECT c.id FROM ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX."c_type_fees as c WHERE c.code = 'EX_KME' AND c.active = 1";
7949  $resql = $db->query($sql);
7950  if ($resql)
7951  {
7952  if ($db->num_rows($resql) > 0)
7953  {
7954  $obj = $db->fetch_object($resql);
7955  $out .= '<script>
7956  $(function() {
7957  $("select[name='.$target.']").on("change", function() {
7958  var current_val = $(this).val();
7959  if (current_val == '.$obj->id.') {';
7960  if (!empty($default_selected) || !empty($selected)) $out .= '$("select[name='.$htmlname.']").val("'.($default_selected > 0 ? $default_selected : $selected).'");';
7961 
7962  $out .= '
7963  $("select[name='.$htmlname.']").change();
7964  }
7965  });
7966 
7967  $("select[name='.$htmlname.']").change(function() {
7968 
7969  if ($("select[name='.$target.']").val() == '.$obj->id.') {
7970  // get price of kilometer to fill the unit price
7971  var data = '.json_encode($params).';
7972  data.fk_c_exp_tax_cat = $(this).val();
7973 
7974  $.ajax({
7975  method: "POST",
7976  dataType: "json",
7977  data: data,
7978  url: "'.(DOL_URL_ROOT.'/expensereport/ajax/ajaxik.php').'",
7979  }).done(function( data, textStatus, jqXHR ) {
7980  console.log(data);
7981  if (typeof data.up != "undefined") {
7982  $("input[name=value_unit]").val(data.up);
7983  $("select[name='.$htmlname.']").attr("title", data.title);
7984  } else {
7985  $("input[name=value_unit]").val("");
7986  $("select[name='.$htmlname.']").attr("title", "");
7987  }
7988  });
7989  }
7990  });
7991  });
7992  </script>';
7993  }
7994  }
7995  }
7996  } else {
7997  dol_print_error($db);
7998  }
7999 
8000  return $out;
8001  }
8002 
8011  public function selectExpenseRanges($selected = '', $htmlname = 'fk_range', $useempty = 0)
8012  {
8013  global $db, $conf, $langs;
8014 
8015  $out = '';
8016  $sql = 'SELECT rowid, range_ik FROM '.MAIN_DB_PREFIX.'c_exp_tax_range';
8017  $sql .= ' WHERE entity = '.$conf->entity.' AND active = 1';
8018 
8019  $resql = $db->query($sql);
8020  if ($resql)
8021  {
8022  $out = '<select id="select_'.$htmlname.'" name="'.$htmlname.'" class="'.$htmlname.' flat minwidth75imp">';
8023  if ($useempty) $out .= '<option value="0"></option>';
8024 
8025  while ($obj = $db->fetch_object($resql))
8026  {
8027  $out .= '<option '.($selected == $obj->rowid ? 'selected="selected"' : '').' value="'.$obj->rowid.'">'.price($obj->range_ik, 0, $langs, 1, 0).'</option>';
8028  }
8029  $out .= '</select>';
8030  } else {
8031  dol_print_error($db);
8032  }
8033 
8034  return $out;
8035  }
8036 
8047  public function selectExpense($selected = '', $htmlname = 'fk_c_type_fees', $useempty = 0, $allchoice = 1, $useid = 0)
8048  {
8049  global $db, $langs;
8050 
8051  $out = '';
8052  $sql = 'SELECT id, code, label FROM '.MAIN_DB_PREFIX.'c_type_fees';
8053  $sql .= ' WHERE active = 1';
8054 
8055  $resql = $db->query($sql);
8056  if ($resql)
8057  {
8058  $out = '<select id="select_'.$htmlname.'" name="'.$htmlname.'" class="'.$htmlname.' flat minwidth75imp">';
8059  if ($useempty) $out .= '<option value="0"></option>';
8060  if ($allchoice) $out .= '<option value="-1">'.$langs->trans('AllExpenseReport').'</option>';
8061 
8062  $field = 'code';
8063  if ($useid) $field = 'id';
8064 
8065  while ($obj = $db->fetch_object($resql))
8066  {
8067  $key = $langs->trans($obj->code);
8068  $out .= '<option '.($selected == $obj->{$field} ? 'selected="selected"' : '').' value="'.$obj->{$field}.'">'.($key != $obj->code ? $key : $obj->label).'</option>';
8069  }
8070  $out .= '</select>';
8071  } else {
8072  dol_print_error($db);
8073  }
8074 
8075  return $out;
8076  }
8077 
8096  public function selectInvoice($socid = -1, $selected = '', $htmlname = 'invoiceid', $maxlength = 24, $option_only = 0, $show_empty = '1', $discard_closed = 0, $forcefocus = 0, $disabled = 0, $morecss = 'maxwidth500', $projectsListId = '', $showproject = 'all', $usertofilter = null)
8097  {
8098  global $user, $conf, $langs;
8099 
8100  require_once DOL_DOCUMENT_ROOT.'/projet/class/project.class.php';
8101 
8102  if (is_null($usertofilter))
8103  {
8104  $usertofilter = $user;
8105  }
8106 
8107  $out = '';
8108 
8109  $hideunselectables = false;
8110  if (!empty($conf->global->PROJECT_HIDE_UNSELECTABLES)) $hideunselectables = true;
8111 
8112  if (empty($projectsListId))
8113  {
8114  if (empty($usertofilter->rights->projet->all->lire))
8115  {
8116  $projectstatic = new Project($this->db);
8117  $projectsListId = $projectstatic->getProjectsAuthorizedForUser($usertofilter, 0, 1);
8118  }
8119  }
8120 
8121  // Search all projects
8122  $sql = "SELECT f.rowid, f.ref as fref, 'nolabel' as flabel, p.rowid as pid, f.ref,
8123  p.title, p.fk_soc, p.fk_statut, p.public,";
8124  $sql .= ' s.nom as name';
8125  $sql .= ' FROM '.MAIN_DB_PREFIX.'projet as p';
8126  $sql .= ' LEFT JOIN '.MAIN_DB_PREFIX.'societe as s ON s.rowid = p.fk_soc,';
8127  $sql .= ' '.MAIN_DB_PREFIX.'facture as f';
8128  $sql .= " WHERE p.entity IN (".getEntity('project').")";
8129  $sql .= " AND f.fk_projet = p.rowid AND f.fk_statut=0"; //Brouillons seulement
8130  //if ($projectsListId) $sql.= " AND p.rowid IN (".$projectsListId.")";
8131  //if ($socid == 0) $sql.= " AND (p.fk_soc=0 OR p.fk_soc IS NULL)";
8132  //if ($socid > 0) $sql.= " AND (p.fk_soc=".$socid." OR p.fk_soc IS NULL)";
8133  $sql .= " ORDER BY p.ref, f.ref ASC";
8134 
8135  $resql = $this->db->query($sql);
8136  if ($resql)
8137  {
8138  // Use select2 selector
8139  if (!empty($conf->use_javascript_ajax))
8140  {
8141  include_once DOL_DOCUMENT_ROOT.'/core/lib/ajax.lib.php';
8142  $comboenhancement = ajax_combobox($htmlname, '', 0, $forcefocus);
8143  $out .= $comboenhancement;
8144  $morecss = 'minwidth200imp maxwidth500';
8145  }
8146 
8147  if (empty($option_only)) {
8148  $out .= '<select class="valignmiddle flat'.($morecss ? ' '.$morecss : '').'"'.($disabled ? ' disabled="disabled"' : '').' id="'.$htmlname.'" name="'.$htmlname.'">';
8149  }
8150  if (!empty($show_empty)) {
8151  $out .= '<option value="0" class="optiongrey">';
8152  if (!is_numeric($show_empty)) $out .= $show_empty;
8153  else $out .= '&nbsp;';
8154  $out .= '</option>';
8155  }
8156  $num = $this->db->num_rows($resql);
8157  $i = 0;
8158  if ($num)
8159  {
8160  while ($i < $num)
8161  {
8162  $obj = $this->db->fetch_object($resql);
8163  // If we ask to filter on a company and user has no permission to see all companies and project is linked to another company, we hide project.
8164  if ($socid > 0 && (empty($obj->fk_soc) || $obj->fk_soc == $socid) && empty($usertofilter->rights->societe->lire))
8165  {
8166  // Do nothing
8167  } else {
8168  if ($discard_closed == 1 && $obj->fk_statut == Project::STATUS_CLOSED)
8169  {
8170  $i++;
8171  continue;
8172  }
8173 
8174  $labeltoshow = '';
8175 
8176  if ($showproject == 'all')
8177  {
8178  $labeltoshow .= dol_trunc($obj->ref, 18); // Invoice ref
8179  if ($obj->name) $labeltoshow .= ' - '.$obj->name; // Soc name
8180 
8181  $disabled = 0;
8182  if ($obj->fk_statut == Project::STATUS_DRAFT)
8183  {
8184  $disabled = 1;
8185  $labeltoshow .= ' - '.$langs->trans("Draft");
8186  } elseif ($obj->fk_statut == Project::STATUS_CLOSED)
8187  {
8188  if ($discard_closed == 2) $disabled = 1;
8189  $labeltoshow .= ' - '.$langs->trans("Closed");
8190  } elseif ($socid > 0 && (!empty($obj->fk_soc) && $obj->fk_soc != $socid))
8191  {
8192  $disabled = 1;
8193  $labeltoshow .= ' - '.$langs->trans("LinkedToAnotherCompany");
8194  }
8195  }
8196 
8197  if (!empty($selected) && $selected == $obj->rowid)
8198  {
8199  $out .= '<option value="'.$obj->rowid.'" selected';
8200  //if ($disabled) $out.=' disabled'; // with select2, field can't be preselected if disabled
8201  $out .= '>'.$labeltoshow.'</option>';
8202  } else {
8203  if ($hideunselectables && $disabled && ($selected != $obj->rowid))
8204  {
8205  $resultat = '';
8206  } else {
8207  $resultat = '<option value="'.$obj->rowid.'"';
8208  if ($disabled) $resultat .= ' disabled';
8209  //if ($obj->public) $labeltoshow.=' ('.$langs->trans("Public").')';
8210  //else $labeltoshow.=' ('.$langs->trans("Private").')';
8211  $resultat .= '>';
8212  $resultat .= $labeltoshow;
8213  $resultat .= '</option>';
8214  }
8215  $out .= $resultat;
8216  }
8217  }
8218  $i++;
8219  }
8220  }
8221  if (empty($option_only)) {
8222  $out .= '</select>';
8223  }
8224 
8225  print $out;
8226 
8227  $this->db->free($resql);
8228  return $num;
8229  } else {
8230  dol_print_error($this->db);
8231  return -1;
8232  }
8233  }
8234 
8243  public function searchComponent($arrayofcriterias, $search_component_params, $arrayofinputfieldsalreadyoutput = array())
8244  {
8245  global $langs;
8246 
8247  $ret = '';
8248 
8249  $ret .= '<div class="nowrap centpercent">';
8250  //$ret .= '<button type="submit" class="liste_titre button_removefilter" name="button_removefilter_x" value="x"><span class="fa fa-remove"></span></button>';
8251  $ret .= '<a href="#" class="dropdownsearch-toggle unsetcolor paddingright">';
8252  $ret .= '<span class="fas fa-filter linkobject boxfilter" title="Filter" id="idsubimgproductdistribution"></span>';
8253  $ret .= $langs->trans("Filters");
8254  $ret .= '</a>';
8255  //$ret .= '<button type="submit" class="liste_titre button_search paddingleftonly" name="button_search_x" value="x"><span class="fa fa-search"></span></button>';
8256  $ret .= '<div name="search_component_params" class="search_component_params inline-block minwidth500 maxwidth300onsmartphone valignmiddle">';
8257  $texttoshow = '<div class="opacitymedium inline-block search_component_searchtext">'.$langs->trans("Search").'</div>';
8258 
8259  $ret .= '<div class="search_component inline-block valignmiddle">'.$texttoshow.'</div>';
8260  $ret .= '</div>';
8261  $ret .= '<input type="hidden" name="search_component_params_hidden" class="search_component_params_hidden" value="'.GETPOST("search_component_params_hidden").'">';
8262  // For compatibility with forms that show themself the search criteria in addition of this component, we output the fields
8263  foreach ($arrayofcriterias as $criterias) {
8264  foreach ($criterias as $criteriafamilykey => $criteriafamilyval) {
8265  if (in_array('search_'.$criteriafamilykey, $arrayofinputfieldsalreadyoutput)) continue;
8266  if (in_array($criteriafamilykey, array('rowid', 'ref_ext', 'entity', 'extraparams'))) continue;
8267  if (in_array($criteriafamilyval['type'], array('date', 'datetime', 'timestamp'))) {
8268  $ret .= '<input type="hidden" name="search_'.$criteriafamilykey.'_start">';
8269  $ret .= '<input type="hidden" name="search_'.$criteriafamilykey.'_startyear">';
8270  $ret .= '<input type="hidden" name="search_'.$criteriafamilykey.'_startmonth">';
8271  $ret .= '<input type="hidden" name="search_'.$criteriafamilykey.'_startday">';
8272  $ret .= '<input type="hidden" name="search_'.$criteriafamilykey.'_end">';
8273  $ret .= '<input type="hidden" name="search_'.$criteriafamilykey.'_endyear">';
8274  $ret .= '<input type="hidden" name="search_'.$criteriafamilykey.'_endmonth">';
8275  $ret .= '<input type="hidden" name="search_'.$criteriafamilykey.'_endday">';
8276  } else {
8277  $ret .= '<input type="hidden" name="search_'.$criteriafamilykey.'">';
8278  }
8279  }
8280  }
8281  $ret .= '</div>';
8282 
8283 
8284  return $ret;
8285  }
8286 
8296  public function selectModelMail($prefix, $modelType = '', $default = 0, $addjscombo = 0)
8297  {
8298  global $langs, $db, $user;
8299 
8300  $retstring = '';
8301 
8302  $TModels = array();
8303 
8304  include_once DOL_DOCUMENT_ROOT.'/core/class/html.formmail.class.php';
8305  $formmail = new FormMail($db);
8306  $result = $formmail->fetchAllEMailTemplate($modelType, $user, $langs);
8307 
8308  if ($default) $TModels[0] = $langs->trans('DefaultMailModel');
8309  if ($result > 0) {
8310  foreach ($formmail->lines_model as $model) {
8311  $TModels[$model->id] = $model->label;
8312  }
8313  }
8314 
8315  $retstring .= '<select class="flat" id="select_'.$prefix.'model_mail" name="'.$prefix.'model_mail">';
8316 
8317  foreach ($TModels as $id_model=>$label_model) {
8318  $retstring .= '<option value="'.$id_model.'"';
8319  $retstring .= ">".$label_model."</option>";
8320  }
8321 
8322  $retstring .= "</select>";
8323 
8324  if ($addjscombo) $retstring .= ajax_combobox('select_'.$prefix.'model_mail');
8325 
8326  return $retstring;
8327  }
8328 }
